moni.quest.0002BA59214CE34A.description1: 固体の&6ケイ素&rは&6HV回路&rに必要な&6トランジスタ&rの作成に必要です。&6ケイ素インゴット&rのレシピには&d2,273 K&rが必要です。&6カンタルコイル&rを先に作成したのはそのためです。&6キュプロニッケルコイル&rではその温度に達することができないからです。
moni.quest.0002BA59214CE34A.description2: 様々な素材を電解して得られる&6ケイ素の粉&rを直接焼く方法もありますが、時間とエネルギーを大量に消費します。別の方法として、生産中の&6ガラス&rから取り出した&6二酸化ケイ素&rと&6炭素の粉&rを一緒に加熱する方法があります。この方法だと、&6ケイ素インゴット&rが&d5倍以上&rの速度で作成でき、副産物として様々な化学レシピに使用できる&e一酸化炭素&rも得られます。
moni.quest.0006FEA1843FEA0A.description1: Mobの殺害をシミュレートすると、そのMobの種類の&6予測素材(Prediction)&rが時々手に入ります。
moni.quest.0006FEA1843FEA0A.description2: &6Mobの予測素材(Prediction)&rを&3戦利品作成機(Loot Fabricator)&rに投入すると、そのMobに関連するさまざまなアイテムの1つを入手することができます。
moni.quest.0006FEA1843FEA0A.description3: &3解析室(Simulation Chamber)&rと同様に、戦利品製造機(Loot Fabricator)は&a無面&rであり、&a全ての面&rからの搬入と搬出が可能です。
moni.quest.00203B07F8A930DA.description1: おう、&6ネザースター&rをクラフトできるんだぜ？イカしてるだろ？
moni.quest.00203B07F8A930DA.description2: パック全体を通して、ネザースターは、平均的なプレイヤーがウィザーを討伐する能力をはるかに超える量を要求されます。&eクラフトで作成してください。ファームしようとする必要はありません。
moni.quest.00203B07F8A930DA.subtitle: みんな...集合！
moni.quest.00203B07F8A930DA.title: クラフト可能なネザースター
moni.quest.004344AC70AE88F1.description1: &6ルミネッセンス(Luminessence)&rはさまざまな用途に使用されますが、現時点では &aExtended Craftingの作業台&rのコンポーネントに使用されます。
moni.quest.007B1B457AA3F497.title: 元素番号110番:ダームスタチウム
moni.quest.013C3CD6D8C727CE.description1: &2小型コイルの後継であるインダクタは、必要となるもう1つの回路部品です。
moni.quest.013C3CD6D8C727CE.description2: &2最良のクラフト結果を得るには、ニッケル亜鉛フェライトと、なまし銅を使用して作成してください。
moni.quest.013C3CD6D8C727CE.description3: &2ただし、最初にどのセットアップを構築するかに応じて、SMDバージョンよりも基本バージョンを多く作成する必要がない場合があります。
moni.quest.013C3CD6D8C727CE.title: インダクタ
moni.quest.0143E903317263D4.description1: &2ポリテトラフルオロエチレン(PTFE、またはテフロン)は、炭素とフッ素から作られたポリマーです。
moni.quest.0143E903317263D4.description2: &2このポリマーは、大型化学反応炉の作成に最も多く使用されます。また、IVおよびLuVのマシン筐体にも必要であり、場合によってはより良いクラフト結果を得るために代用することもできます。
moni.quest.0143E903317263D4.title: &2ポリテトラフルオロエチレン
moni.quest.016054D07025C8B1.title: 元素番号073番:タンタル
moni.quest.01CC71429CFCAE0B.description1: このラインに沿った回路は全てHV回路であり、レシピですべて置き換えることができます。
moni.quest.01CC71429CFCAE0B.description2: パターンは同じです。右端の回路の方が数量が多く、全体的に製造が容易です。
moni.quest.01CC71429CFCAE0B.title: HV時代の回路
moni.quest.01E542E1C9DAF5B4.description1: 唯一の新しい素材は&6トリタニウムの足場&rです。
moni.quest.01E542E1C9DAF5B4.title: 最初のTier 9回路
moni.quest.01F946C4A4BF4FFE.description1: 究極ティアの&bExtended Crafting&rに使用されます。
moni.quest.01F946C4A4BF4FFE.description2: しばらく作れなくても心配しないでください。おそらくIV時代あたりで作れるようになるでしょう。
moni.quest.023197AB7CDBDD6E.description1: &6ナクアダ鉱石と&2カエマナイト鉱石&r(&6トリニウム&rのため)は、&6安定したプルトニウム&rミッションで入手できます。その後、&6グラシオ&rからナクアダを入手できるようになります。
このマイクロマイナーは、後々&2安定したオガネソン&rの唯一の供給源として重要になります。
moni.quest.023197AB7CDBDD6E.description2: このマイクロマイナーが提供できる他の物の例としては、&6ベリリウム、パラジウム&r、&6希少金属混合物&r などがあります。
moni.quest.023197AB7CDBDD6E.title: &2Tier 5 マイクロマイナー
moni.quest.025092551C0A20B6.description1: &6イリジウム&rは、マイクロマイナーに使用される発展的な材料であり、&6オスミウム&rと合金化して&6オスミリジウム&rを作成するためにも使用されます。
moni.quest.025092551C0A20B6.description2: &6白金泥族の粉&rからも大量に入手できます。
moni.quest.025092551C0A20B6.description3: &2オスミリジウム 80/20鉱石およびイリドスミン 80/20鉱石&r は、Tier 6 マイクロマイナーから再生可能な形で入手可能であり、また Tier 5 マイクロマイナーからは半再生可能な形で入手可能です。
moni.quest.025092551C0A20B6.title: イリジウム
moni.quest.025543EDB0A4AC22.description1: &6ケイ素の粉&rと&6スチール&rから作られた、精製されたスチールの一種。
moni.quest.025543EDB0A4AC22.description2: この材料は電子機器やデジタル機器によく使用されます。
moni.quest.02782201B4D4DB5C.title: 元素番号009番:フッ素
moni.quest.02EFF3E87346EDF4.title: 元素番号051番:アンチモニー
moni.quest.03819818FD208DEE.title: 元素番号007番:窒素
moni.quest.0381DCD3FD3C9ED2.description1: &6プログラム回路&rは、機械の設定に使用されるアイテムです。基本的には、特定の入力から複数のものを作成できる場合に、機械に何を作成するかを指示します。
moni.quest.0381DCD3FD3C9ED2.description2: 例えば、&3ワイヤー作成機&r は、設定に応じて異なる太さの &6ワイヤー&rを作成します。&e回路設定値1&rは&61倍ワイヤー&rを生成し、&e回路設定値4&rは&64倍ワイヤー&rを生成する、というようになります。&eEMI&rレシピは、必要な回路構成を示します。
moni.quest.0381DCD3FD3C9ED2.description3: 各機械とアイテムの入力バスには、&2ノーコストのゴースト回路&rが付属しています。このゴースト回路にアクセスするには、GUIの&9左下&rにある回路スロットをクリックしてください。設定を調整するには、左クリックまたは右クリック、あるいはスクロールしてください。
moni.quest.0381DCD3FD3C9ED2.description4: そうは言っても、プログラム回路アイテム (単一の&6LV回路&r から作成)にはまだ用途があります。
moni.quest.0381DCD3FD3C9ED2.description5: - プログラムされた回路を持っている間に、機械をShiftキーを押しながら右クリックして、機械の回路スロットに同じ構成の&bゴースト回路&rを設定します。
moni.quest.0381DCD3FD3C9ED2.description6: - 機械に投入するアイテムに競合がないことが確実であれば、機械に&e複数の回路構成&rを投入できます。そうすることで、それらの構成を必要とするレシピを処理できるようになります。これは&3合金高炉&rのような機械に便利ですが、しばらくはそのような機械には遭遇しないでしょう。
moni.quest.0381DCD3FD3C9ED2.title: &9プログラム回路
moni.quest.038D06BCA022C1BF.description1: &3抽出機&rは物を溶かして液体にするのに非常に便利です。例えば、インゴットを溶かして液体金属にしたり、&6ゴムシート&rを溶かして&9液化ゴム&rにしたりできます。
moni.quest.038D06BCA022C1BF.description2: &6スチール&rから金型を作成し、&3液体成型機&rを使用して&6歯車&rなどのさまざまな部品を液体からより効率的に成形することができます。
moni.quest.038D06BCA022C1BF.subtitle: &2抽出機と液体抽出機の機能が1つの機械に統合されました！
moni.quest.038D06BCA022C1BF.title: &2抽出機
moni.quest.039F70814051413E.description1: 「ドラゴンの卵？」と聞かれるかもしれません。はい。
moni.quest.039F70814051413E.description2: 次の回路テーマ、「ウェットウェア」ではこれらを大量に消費することになります。
moni.quest.039F70814051413E.description3: Tier 6 マイクロマイナーは卵を入手する最初の手段です。(このクエストに必要な量がまさにそうです)。&6ドラゴンの革&rを貯めながらも、Tier 8 マイクロマイナーからもかなりの量を入手することができます。
moni.quest.039F70814051413E.title: 卵を割る
moni.quest.040B3FCD82533BD9.description1: 物理法則を曲げるのは簡単なことではありません。ありがたいことに、マイクロマイナーに収まるほどコンパクトな解決策を考案されました。
moni.quest.040B3FCD82533BD9.description2: お察しの通り、めちゃんこ高価です。
moni.quest.040B3FCD82533BD9.subtitle: お取扱いにご注意を。宇宙を破壊する可能性を秘めています。
moni.quest.040B3FCD82533BD9.title: &9フィールド安定化オムニックパルサーコンパウンド
moni.quest.044553423097C3C7.description1: &2ベースパックには、白金泥族(PGS)処理の基本的なバージョンが存在していました。PGS処理は、ルテニウム、ロジウム、パラジウム、オスミウム、イリジウム、プラチナといった白金族金属と金の強力な供給源となります。これらの元素はすべて、IVティア以上の材料に使用されます。
moni.quest.044553423097C3C7.description2: &r特定の鉱石を&9硝酸&rで処理して&6PGS&rを得る必要があります。&6シェルドナイト&rが最適です。その後、&3HV+遠心分離機&rと&9王水&rを使ってPGS塩に分解し、さらにその塩を金属に還元します。
moni.quest.044553423097C3C7.description3: &9&9これはオプションクエストではありません。最初の&6イリジウム&9と&6オスミウム&9を入手するには、白金泥族処理が必要です。ただし、それ以前にマイクロバースの&6ラウラ鉱&rと&6硫銅ロジウム鉱&rから&6ルテニウム&rと&6ロジウム&rを入手できます。
moni.quest.044553423097C3C7.subtitle: これが「Gregtech PGS」の人たちが言っていることなのでしょうか？
moni.quest.044553423097C3C7.title: &2白金族処理
moni.quest.04475771966A92C3.description1: &aExtended Craftingの究極型作業台&r やその他のゲーム終盤のレシピに使用される高度な素材です。
moni.quest.0472A05CFBF4A2F0.description1: このラインに沿った回路は全てZPM回路であり、レシピですべて置き換えることができます。
moni.quest.0472A05CFBF4A2F0.title: ZPM時代の回路
moni.quest.04A0863937695AC4.description1: &aクレセントハンマー&rは&bThermal Expansion&fの機械で使用するためのものですが、ほぼすべてのModのブロックとの基本的なレンチ操作に使用できます。&9Gregtechのパイプも調整できるようになりました。
&aクレセントハンマー&rは&bThermal Expansion&fの機械で使用するためのものですが、ほぼすべてのModのブロックとの基本的なレンチ操作に使用できます。&9Gregtechのパイプも調整できるようになりました、
&aクレセントハンマー&rは&bThermal Expansion&fの機械で使用するためのものですが、ほぼすべてのModのブロックとの基本的なレンチ操作に使用できます。&9Gregtechのパイプも調整できるようになりました、
moni.quest.04A0863937695AC4.description2: &aイェタレンチ(Yeta Wrench)&は&bEnder IO&fの機械および導管(conduits)で使用され、いくつかの特殊な表示モードがあります(切り替えるには&6スニーク+マウスホイール&f)。
&aイェタレンチ(Yeta Wrench)&は&bEnder IO&fの機械および導管(conduits)で使用され、いくつかの特殊な表示モードがあります(切り替えるには&6スニーク+マウスホイール&f)。
&aイェタレンチ(Yeta Wrench)&rは&bEnder IO&fの機械および導管(conduits)で使用され、いくつかの特殊な表示モードがあります(切り替えるには&6スニーク+マウスホイール&f)。
moni.quest.04A0863937695AC4.description3: &aGregTechレンチ&rは、GregTech機械を回転させ、出力側を再定義するために使用されます。&2 また、他のレンチの一部の機能も備えています。&r
moni.quest.04A0863937695AC4.description4: ツールチップの下部にある&9青いテキスト&fで、マシンがどのModのものか確認できます。
moni.quest.04A0863937695AC4.subtitle: レンチについて頭ごっちゃになってない？？大丈夫？
moni.quest.04A0863937695AC4.title: &9たくさんのレンチ
moni.quest.04BDE09518C184E4.description1: &9ナフサ&rは、その構成成分を得るために水蒸気分解と蒸留に最もよく利用されます。
moni.quest.04BDE09518C184E4.description2: 特に、より多くの&9ディーゼル&rを製造するための&9軽質燃料&rと&9重質燃料&rが含まれているほか、さまざまな目的に使用できる他の多くの有用な化学物質も含まれています。
moni.quest.04BDE09518C184E4.title: ナフサ
moni.quest.04EABD3D2C72D2C5.description1: &2ウェットウェアおよびクリスタル関連のプロセスでは、異なる種類の滅菌が必要です。&r
moni.quest.04EABD3D2C72D2C5.description2: これらのレシピを実行するには、別の&3クリーンルーム&rを建設する必要があります。上面には&3フィルター外装&rの代わりに&3滅菌フィルター外装&rを使用してください。
moni.quest.04EABD3D2C72D2C5.description3: この外装は高価です！&6トリタニウム&rを入手するには&3核融合炉 MK II&rが必要です。
moni.quest.04EABD3D2C72D2C5.description4: &e滅菌クリーンルームでは、通常のクリーンルームを必要とするレシピを処理できないことに注意してください。&r
moni.quest.04EABD3D2C72D2C5.title: &2同じようで違うクリーン
moni.quest.0508D3CCB6C876A3.description1: &2ナクアダの加工に必要な材料は、濃縮ナクアダ(Nq+)、ナクアドリア(Nq*)、トリニウム(Ke) の3つです。
moni.quest.0508D3CCB6C876A3.description2: ナクアダを処理する方法は2つあり、それぞれ精製される物が異なります。&r
moni.quest.0508D3CCB6C876A3.description3: 1つ目の選択肢は、&6Tier 5 マイクロマイナー&rから手に入る&9鉱石を処理&rすることです。&6ナクアダ鉱石&rからは&6濃縮ナクアダ&r(&3電磁分離機&r経由)が得られ、&6カエマナイト鉱石&rからは&6トリニウム&rが得られます。
moni.quest.0508D3CCB6C876A3.description4: 2つ目の選択肢は、人類が知る中で2番目に強い酸である&9フルオロアンチモン酸&rを用いて&6ナクアダの粉&rをCEuで完全に処理することです。これはかなり複雑なプロセスですが、他の2つのNq材料をすべて生成できるだけでなく、&6チタン、硫黄、インジウム、リン、バリウム、ガリウム&rという副産物も得られます。
moni.quest.0508D3CCB6C876A3.title: ナクアダ処理
moni.quest.0523F4AB9A794390.description1: &2CEuの特定のマルチブロックには、メンテナンスハッチやマフラーハッチが必要です。これらは、マルチブロック間で共有できません。GT5uでメンテナンスについて知っていたとしても、心配する必要はありません。CEuでは、メンテナンスの仕組みはそれほど厳しくありません。
moni.quest.0523F4AB9A794390.description2: &r- &aマフラー&r:このハッチは、美しい煙の粒子を排出するために、&c煙の排出を遮る物がない&rようにする必要があります。レシピを実行すると、&3マフラーハッチ&rからボーナスアイテム(通常は小さな灰の粉)が出現する確率がわずかですがあります。満杯になると余分な灰は排出されるので、機械の稼働が停止する心配はありません。
moni.quest.0523F4AB9A794390.description3: - &aメンテナンス&r:マルチブロックを稼働させるには、メンテナンスを行う必要があります。メンテナンスを行うには、インベントリ内に&9レンチ&r、&9スクリュードライバー&r、&9ソフトマレット&r、&9ハンマー&r、&9ワイヤーカッター&r、&9バール&rを用意し、メンテナンスハッチを開いて&e中央のスロットを一度クリックします&r。 &cツールを個別にドラッグする必要はありません。&rまた、メンテナンスハッチに&9テープ&rを置くことでも同様の結果が得られます。
moni.quest.0523F4AB9A794390.description4: メンテナンスの問題は、&9実際のアクティビティ時間48時間後&rに発生する可能性があります。言うまでもなく、これは非常に稀なケースです。問題が発生するたびに、レシピの所要時間が10%%増加します。問題の修正は上記と同じ方法で行います。
moni.quest.0523F4AB9A794390.description5: 後ほど、手動での問題解決を強制しない他のメンテナンスハッチがアンロックされます。どちらも&6メンテナンス不要&rで始まります。
moni.quest.0523F4AB9A794390.description6: - &3制御可能なメンテナンスハッチ&r (&6HV&r):レシピの&a所要時間を10%%&rをカットするように設定できますが、メンテナンスの問題が3倍の速さで発生することになります。これは実際のアクティビティ時間&916時間&rに相当します。&9テープ&rはこのハッチでも問題を解決できます。
moni.quest.0523F4AB9A794390.description7: - &3自動メンテナンスハッチ&r(&9HV&r):メンテナンスの必要性を&6永久&rに排除します。
moni.quest.0523F4AB9A794390.description8: - &3クリーニングメンテナンスハッチ&r(&9IV&r):&3自動メンテナンスハッチ&rとして機能し、通常は&2クリーンルーム&rで実行する必要があるレシピをクリーンルーム外のマルチブロックで実行できるようにします。
moni.quest.0523F4AB9A794390.title: &2メンテナンスとマフラーの仕組み
moni.quest.053DDDCD2505E20B.description1: &9JEANガソリンは最も強力な燃焼燃料であり、いくつかの特殊な成分を使用することで、1mBあたり81,920 EUという驚異的なエネルギーを生み出します。ただし、その代償として、非常に複雑な処理ラインを構築する必要があります。

moni.quest.08B36E2C37C417E5.description2: より優れたゴムが2種類あり、最終的には両方とも作成することになります。&eこれらは、より少ない液体量で低電圧用ワイヤーをより効率的に絶縁するためにも使用できます！&r
moni.quest.08B36E2C37C417E5.description3: &9&2スチレンブタジエンゴム(SBR)とシリコンゴム(SiR)はあらゆるケーブルティアを被覆できます。&rSBRは石油化学関係のインフラ整備が必須となりますが、まだ整備されていないかもしれません、が嬉しいことにSBRはゲーム終盤までは必須ではありません。一方、SiRは既に使いまくっている化学物質から簡単に作る事ができます。ちな、今からSBRを準備しとけば後でワイヤー被覆材変える必要なくなるよ。
moni.quest.08B36E2C37C417E5.description4: シリコンゴムを作るには、いくつかの方法で&6ポリジメチルシロキサンの粉&rを作り、&3化学反応器&rで&6硫黄&rと混ぜ合わせます。その後、&3組立機&rでワイヤーに塗布します。

moni.quest.0A24D3A038861936.description2: Mobのスポーンと捕獲を自動化するために使用されます。他の&bEnder IO&r機械と同様に、コンデンサが必要です。コンデンサのランクが高いほど、範囲、スポーン率、捕獲率が向上します。
moni.quest.0A24D3A038861936.description3: 欲しいMob種の&6電動スポナー&rを作成するには、そのMob種の&6壊れたスポナー(Broken Spawner)&rを使ってクラフトする必要があります。一度クラフトするとMob種を変更することはできません。
moni.quest.0A24D3A038861936.description4: この&6壊れたスポナー&rは、任意の&6Broken Spawner&rと、欲しいMobの&6魂の小瓶(Soul Vial)&rを&aソウルバインダー(Soul Binder)&rに入れ、&a経験値&rと混ぜることで作成できます。壊れたスポナーはMobスポナーを壊すと入手できます。&eヒント:スポナーブロックはロストシティの至る所にあります。&r
moni.quest.0A24D3A038861936.description5: スポナーには二つのモードがあります:捕獲とスポーン
moni.quest.0A24D3A038861936.description6: 捕獲モードでは、&6魂の小瓶&rを機械に入れると、魂の小瓶がセットされたMobの&a魂&rを捕獲します。このモードではMobはスポーンしないため、ピースフルでもあらゆるMobに効果があります。
moni.quest.0A24D3A038861936.description7: スポーンモードでは、スポナーは、スペースがなくなるまで、またはその範囲にモブがあふれるまで、設定されたMobをスポーンします。

moni.quest.0B6196692F9E176D.title: &9Cryolobus Double Plates
moni.quest.0B62AD25CDD86A6B.description1: Remember to keep the MV area separate from your LV area. &eHooking up an LV machine to MV current will result in the machine being destroyed! Also, LV cables will burn up if you put MV current through them&r. That's why it's probably best to keep the areas separate until you're comfortable and confident with voltages. Eventually, you can use transformers to switch voltages within a single setup, but don't feel forced to try that until you've got a grasp on the basics.
moni.quest.0B62AD25CDD86A6B.description2: All RF power is the same (it has no voltages), so you can use RF conduits to route power from wherever you're generating and converting to EU with &3Energy Converters&r for each voltage. You don't have to use this setup, but it's the most foolproof one for a beginner. And if you're an expert, well... you don't need my advice.
moni.quest.0B62AD25CDD86A6B.description3: For your MV cables, you can use &6Copper&r to start with. &6Energetic Alloy cables&r are lossless though, so consider them if you're able to mass produce those ingots.
moni.quest.0B62AD25CDD86A6B.title: MV Energy Converter
moni.quest.0B6ACDE565DB7862.description1: &6&6Redstone&r, &6Saltpeter&r, and &6Blitz Powder&r creates &6Aerotheum Dust&r, a mixture imbued with potent elemental air.
moni.quest.0B8CE3FBF62B099D.description1: &6Epoxy Circuit Boards&r are a more advanced substrate type that gives you access to &2Nanocircuits, which span tiers three through six.
moni.quest.0B8CE3FBF62B099D.title: &2Epoxy Substrate
moni.quest.0B923E8ED6161CA8.description1: Circuits along this line are UEV, and can all be substituted in recipes.
moni.quest.0B923E8ED6161CA8.title: &9UEV Circuits
moni.quest.0B9D5F865C3F8B31.description1: Made by adding some Iridium and Osmium to your HSS-G.
moni.quest.0B9D5F865C3F8B31.title: High Speed Steel Type S
moni.quest.0BB798ACFE684AA9.description1: With your &2Rhodium Plated Lumium-Palladium&r-based machine hulls, Assembling Machine built, and &6Quantum Processor Mainframes&r squared away, you can finally get on the path to making a Ludicrous Voltage &3Circuit Assembling Machine&r.
moni.quest.0BB798ACFE684AA9.description2: This tier of Assembling Machine unlocks &6Crystal Circuits&r, as well as handling crafting recipes up to 32768 EU/t. It can also optionally overclock recipes that consume up to 8192 EU/t for improved speed at the cost of relatively more power.
moni.quest.0BB798ACFE684AA9.description3: Alternatively, you can make a &6LuV Energy Hatch&r and use the &3Large Circuit Assembling Factory&r instead.
moni.quest.0BB798ACFE684AA9.title: &2LuV Circuit Assembler
moni.quest.0BEEC4D7F9839411.title: 元素番号016番:硫黄
moni.quest.0C08F09EBCDFDAD0.description2: These Crafting Units can be crafted with &eMEGA Cell Storage Components&r to make even larger crafting units, or can be crafted with &6Engineering Processors&r and &6Standard AE2 Storage Components&r to make denser &9Crafting Co-Processors&r.
moni.quest.0C08F09EBCDFDAD0.title: &9MEGA Crafting
moni.quest.0C10EC03A01E7334.description2: &6Uraninite Ore&r is the first source of &6Pulsating Dust&r but is not a very good one in the long term. Instead you should make &6Resonant Clathrates&r, which are an infinitely-renewable and effective source of Pulsating Dust.
moni.quest.0C10EC03A01E7334.description3: Resonant Clathrates are made by melting &6Ender Pearls&r with a &3Fluid Extractor&r into &9Resonant Ender&r, then mixing that with &6Nether Quartz&r in an MV or better &3Chemical Reactor&r. Smelting this clathrate gives Pulsating Dust.
moni.quest.0C10EC03A01E7334.description4: With Resonant Clathrates now accessible, everything you need for crafting &6Pulsating Prediction Matrix&r can be automated in a net-positive loop.&r Doing so is the first step in automation of &bHostile Neural Networks&r, which is &ea primary source of important materials for the rest of the pack&r.
moni.quest.0C10EC03A01E7334.description5: The exact implementation is up to you. Make use of the various LV and MV machines you have, and look through &bEMI&r and the Processing Lines Tab for the ways to get infinite sources of each ingredient (like &aEnderman Models&r for pearls).
moni.quest.0C10EC03A01E7334.rich_descrip: This is an important part of a Processing Line. Visit the
tab to have more info, useful tips, and a visual representation of how to passively automate this.
moni.quest.0C173EF148EFEF8E.description2: These are quests for a full stack of many of the materials in the game. Those are the materials you'll need to synthesize &5Omnium&r, the basic endgame resource. It's the pack's way of letting you know what materials you should be prepared to mass produce as you approach the end.
moni.quest.0C173EF148EFEF8E.description3: Of course, it's not necessary or even advisable to try to finish up all of these quests the moment they become available. Some will be incredibly easy (like &6Iron&f and &6Copper&f), while others will be brutally grindy at early tech levels. The rewards are all the same: &91 Moniquarter each&f, so use your best judgement on which ones to complete and which to ignore for later.

Of course, it's not necessary or even advisable to try to finish up all of these quests the moment they become available. Some will be incredibly easy (like &6Iron&f and &6Copper&f), others will be brutally grindy at early tech levels.

Of course, it's not necessary or even advisable to try to finish up all of these quests the moment they become available. Some will be incredibly easy (like &6Iron&f and &6Copper&f), others will be brutally grindy at early tech levels.
moni.quest.0C173EF148EFEF8E.rich_descrip: Click to go to the chapter
Elements and Alloys quest book tab
. This might seem a bit premature to suggest, but it has a reason.
moni.quest.0C173EF148EFEF8E.title: Elements and Alloys
moni.quest.0C4E18B05F9E68DE.description1: &2The next tier of Assembling Machine. This one can make quite a few nice things - check the surrounding quests.
moni.quest.0C4E18B05F9E68DE.title: HV Assembler
moni.quest.0C50D78D8F63CAFE.description1: Circuits along this line are UHV, and can all be substituted in recipes.
moni.quest.0C50D78D8F63CAFE.title: &9UHV Circuits
moni.quest.0C9A9F33EEA3AB5E.title: &9The Second Tier Eleven Circuit
moni.quest.0C9E7E4644084C94.description1: The Eighth and a Half Micro Miner.
moni.quest.0C9E7E4644084C94.description2: An alternative source for &6Duranium&r (via &6Dulysite Ore&r, mission with &aGemstone Sensors&r), and an alternative source for &6Darmstadtium&r (via &6Darmstadtite Ore&r, mission with &aIridium Neutron Reflectors&r).
moni.quest.0CEF53164D8B6496.description1: Once you scan and make your first &6UV Circuits&r and &6ZPM Field Generators&r, you can upgrade your &3HPCA Computing Components&r to &3Advanced Components&r. These produce &d16 CWU/t&r each and require &d4 Cooling&r each.
moni.quest.0CEF53164D8B6496.description2: With them, you can upgrade a single HPCA to produce &d32 CWU/t&r total - enough for basic &6UV components&r and the &3Network Switch&r, which will allow you to go higher.
moni.quest.0CEF53164D8B6496.title: &2Advanced HPCA
moni.quest.0D0A0C18ED958511.description1: Mixing &9Diesel&r (or less efficiently, &9Bio Diesel&r) with &9Tetranitromethane&r in an &3HV Mixer&r &2or Large Chemical Reactor&r produces &2Cetane-Boosted Diesel&r, an extremely potent fuel needed later for &6Cryolobus&r production.
moni.quest.0D0A0C18ED958511.description2: If you have a very robust petrochemical infrastructure and can afford to burn it, this fuel along with proper oxygenation &2is a potent fuel in the Large Combustion Engine and Extreme Combustion Engine, producing &2720 EU/mB of fuel.
moni.quest.0D0A0C18ED958511.subtitle: You will need either Diesel or Biodiesel
moni.quest.0D0A0C18ED958511.title: &2CETANE-BOOSTED DIESEL!!
moni.quest.0D1A64EBBA742196.description1: &bApplied Energistics&r does not allow you to use tags when creating &6Processing Patterns&r. This can become annoying when dealing with recipes that use Gregtech Circuits, as normally you would have to remake your patterns when you unlock a new tier of circuit.
moni.quest.0D1A64EBBA742196.description2: &eIf you find this to be an issue, use &9Universal Circuits&e for Processing Patterns that would otherwise use GregTech circuits.&r
moni.quest.0D1A64EBBA742196.description3: All normal circuits can be converted to their &9Universal Circuit&r equivalent, and thus when a more efficient circuit can be made, only the recipe for the &9Universal Circuit&r needs to be changed.
moni.quest.0D1A64EBBA742196.title: &9Universal Circuits
moni.quest.0D552ECAE4FC617B.title: 元素番号023番:バナジウム
moni.quest.0D6C8FFD01BE5C21.description1: The main function of this oven is to increase the fuel values of your wood and coal while also recovering some of the various potentially useful waste products.
moni.quest.0D6C8FFD01BE5C21.description2: Turning &6Coal&r into &6Coal Coke&r will not only make it more useful as fuel, but will also produce &9Phenol&r, which you'll need for circuits.
moni.quest.0D6C8FFD01BE5C21.description3: The Pyrolyse Oven is also the source of several other fluids that can be distilled for useful ingredients.
moni.quest.0D6C8FFD01BE5C21.description4: Remember that Hatches and Buses can be replaced by Hatches and Buses of any tier, although the Input Bus must be at least LV, as there are 2 inputs, and that you can &6sneak-right click&r the controller to enable the in-world preview.
moni.quest.0D6C8FFD01BE5C21.description5: &2As stated in the tooltip, higher tier coils will make this faster.
moni.quest.0D6C8FFD01BE5C21.title: &2Pyrolyse Oven
moni.quest.0D732BC5312234B4.title: 元素番号041番:ニオブ
moni.quest.0DB13ACF2241345E.title: 元素番号060番:ネオジム
moni.quest.0DB8063A7972E1C0.description1: With access to &6Crystaltine components&r, &3Auto Crafting Tables&r are now an option for automation of any size of crafting table - including 3x3.
moni.quest.0DB8063A7972E1C0.description2: Every &3Auto Crafting Table&r comes with three recipe slots in the top-right corner. To configure a recipe, the crafting grid must be filled with the recipe you wish to automate, and then saved to the table by &8Shift-Left-Clicking&r one of those recipe slots.
moni.quest.0DB8063A7972E1C0.description3: Saved recipes must then be selected with a &8Left-Click&r to indicate that that recipe should be crafted. Only one recipe can be selected at a time.
moni.quest.0DB8063A7972E1C0.description4: Lastly, place an inventory atop the table - The &3Auto Crafting Table&r cannot be inserted to, and &ecan only pull items from that inventory&r. At this point you can put ingredients in the inventory and &aRF&r power in the table to begin automated crafting.
moni.quest.0DB8063A7972E1C0.description5: In compensation for the cost of the &6Crystaltine Ingots&r and confusing logistics, these tables have throughput capabilities comparable to fully-accelerated &3Molecular Assemblers&r.
moni.quest.0DB8063A7972E1C0.title: Auto Crafting Tables
moni.quest.0DE1BF1648CAF6D6.description1: Thankfully, &9Holmium&r itself does not require any special processing, and can just be smelted.
moni.quest.0DE1BF1648CAF6D6.description2: &9Holmium&r will see use in the next tier of SMDs, as well as things requiring strong magnetic fields.
moni.quest.0DE1BF1648CAF6D6.subtitle: Tastes like batteries.
moni.quest.0DE1BF1648CAF6D6.title: &9Holmium
moni.quest.0DE9B264A3BA75BB.rich_descrip: , allowing for quick, customizable, and easy sorting of any inventory! The keybind is
moni.quest.0DE9B264A3BA75BB.subtitle: Clean your inventory
moni.quest.0DE9B264A3BA75BB.title: Inventory Sorting
moni.quest.0E010F5348FC89BF.description1: &6Sulfur&r will be used in a variety of upcoming chemical reactions.
moni.quest.0E010F5348FC89BF.description2: It can be electrolyzed easily from &6Sphalerite&r (which also provides &6Gallium&r), &6Cinnabar&r, and &6Pyrite&r. Alternately, Sulfur can be acquired through &bHNN&r- look into that quest line if you haven't already.
moni.quest.0E010F5348FC89BF.title: Sulfur
moni.quest.0E20199737DFE4AC.description1: &2Light Fuel's distillates are now more useful, and it is the only source of Octane for High-Octane Gasoline.
moni.quest.0E20199737DFE4AC.description2: But if you choose to produce Diesel, a large proportion of the Light Fuel you produce still has to go into Diesel production.
moni.quest.0E20199737DFE4AC.title: &2Light Fuel
moni.quest.0E419DD2C6D58F49.description1: Bits of a &6Blizz Rod&r. Using a &3Macerator&r doubles your yield.
moni.quest.0E5E5E647F378D02.description2: Low-Enriched Curium 243, or &6LECM-243&r, is made from &6Curium 243&r and &6Curium 246&r. You will also need &6Curium&r in large amounts for &eSunnarium&r.
moni.quest.0E5E5E647F378D02.description3: &6Depleted LECm-243 Fuel&r gives mostly Curium 246 back, but also small quantities of &6Berkelium&r and &6Californium&r isotopes.
moni.quest.0E5E5E647F378D02.description4: &6HECM-247&r is a better alternative for strictly Californium, if your reactor can withstand the heat.
moni.quest.0ED041E2114F7C84.description1: A bioalloy, this material sees use in UEV Tier components.
moni.quest.0ED041E2114F7C84.description2: This material is primarly made up of a &6Sculk Microstructure Pulp&r and a bit &6Prussian Blue&r, and is activated in a discharger.
moni.quest.0ED041E2114F7C84.subtitle: Slightly... Gooey?
moni.quest.0ED041E2114F7C84.title: &9S.C.U.L.K. Bioalloy
moni.quest.0EDFB0C24B9129AB.description1: &2This isn't new in CEu either, but in this version, you will use this to break Cobblestone into Gravel and Gravel into Sand. It's also used to combine 2 Rods into 1 Long Rod.
moni.quest.0EDFB0C24B9129AB.title: &2Forge Hammer
moni.quest.0EF85170074E70B3.description1: This quest teaches you the basics about &bApplied Energistics 2&r autocrafting. If you are new to this mod, it is highly recommended that you watch a video or &3&lread the built-in guide&r&r. Just remember that channels are disabled by default in this pack.

Eventually, you'll need a lot of &6Patterns&r, lots of CPUs, and ones with more storage, and lots of &6&6&6Pattern Providers&r&r&r. If you run out of pattern slots in an &6Pattern Provider&r, you can add more &6Pattern Providers&r, or use &6Extended Pattern Providers&r, which have 36 slots each.
moni.quest.0EF85170074E70B3.description2: By now, you should have &6ME Pattern Providers, &6Molecular Assemblers, Crafting Units, Patterns&r and a &6Pattern Encoding Terminal&r.
moni.quest.0EF85170074E70B3.description3: First, for all crafts, you'll need a &eCrafting CPU&r. These are structures that must be in a solid rectangular prism composed of:
moni.quest.0EF85170074E70B3.description4: &6* Crafting Storages&r, which determine how big a craft can be. For now, &64k Crafting Storages&r should be enough. You must have at least one per CPU.
moni.quest.0EF85170074E70B3.description5: &6* Co-Processing Units&r, which are used to craft multiple things at once. These are optional.
moni.quest.0EF85170074E70B3.description6: &6* Crafting Monitors&r, used to see what is crafting. Not needed, and you can right-click on the CPU to find out what is crafting anyways, so this is pretty much just decoration.
moni.quest.0EF85170074E70B3.description7: &6* Crafting Units&r, which aren't needed at all, and are just used to fill holes if you have a lack of materials.
moni.quest.0EF85170074E70B3.description8: Second, you'll need the place for the autocrafting. For Crafting Table recipes, you'll need &6Molecular Assemblers&r. &6Pattern Providers&r are placed next to them. Autocrafting with &bGregTech&r is explained later, in the quest following this one.
moni.quest.0EF85170074E70B3.description9: Finally, you'll need a &6Pattern&r. In order to make this, put empty &6Patterns&r in the &6Pattern Encoding Terminal&r, and find the recipe in &bEMI&r, while still in the &6Pattern Encoding Terminal&r. Then, click '+' in &bEMI&r, and press the arrow to encode the recipe. This goes in the &6Pattern Provider&r that you set up in the last step. You can use &6Pattern Access Terminals&r to access &6Pattern Providers'&r pattern slots.
moni.quest.0F251AF2286FCE0D.description1: The first of a couple creative datas that will allow you to replicate extremely powerful marvels, such as &9Omnium&r.
moni.quest.0F56F4E642BC2B85.description1: Crafted from the aforementioned Circuit Boards, these Processing Units will be used to create &6Matter Circuits&r.
moni.quest.0F56F4E642BC2B85.title: &9Matter Processing Unit
moni.quest.0F6B344C265D1FBB.description1: Each craft in an &3LuV Chemical Reactor&r takes five minutes, so it's probably a good idea to have more than one machine running this recipe. At least you're guaranteed &264 from a craft.
moni.quest.0F6B344C265D1FBB.subtitle: Just ignore the protesters outside your base.
moni.quest.0F779BEEED8E67BB.description1: &2Large Turbines have been improved in CEu. They are quite complex to run, but can generate lots of power when done well and scale very well.&r
The best &6Large Steam Turbine&r fuel is a closely-guarded government secret.
moni.quest.0F779BEEED8E67BB.description2: Right now, you can make the &6Large Steam Turbine&r and &6Large Gas Turbine&r. Once you get a &3Fusion Reactor&r going, you can make the &6Large Plasma Turbine&r.
moni.quest.0F779BEEED8E67BB.description3: Each Large Turbine will need a &3Rotor Holder&r of the same or higher tier than the Large Turbine itself, and a &3Dynamo Hatch&r capable of handling the energy output. Each &3Rotor Holder&r tier above the Large Turbine &9doubles&r the energy production and adds 10%% to fuel efficiency.
moni.quest.0F779BEEED8E67BB.description4: You will need a &aRotor&r to go into each &3Rotor Holder&r&r. The Rotor will grant multiplicative Power and Efficiency bonuses depending on its material. Each Rotor also has a Durability, which is the number of seconds it will last.
moni.quest.0F779BEEED8E67BB.description5: &aExample: &r&6Large Gas Turbine&r, with &3HSS-E Rotor&r and &3IV Rotor Holder&r:
moni.quest.0F779BEEED8E67BB.description9: You can run the &6Large Gas Turbine&r off &9LPG&r and &9Methane&r from &3Fluid Rigs&r, or &9Nitrobenzene&r from &6Wood&r.
moni.quest.0F779BEEED8E67BB.title: &2Large Turbines
moni.quest.0FA4CAD4F68BC0F8.description1: This version of the Pattern Provider boosts the pattern capacity from 9 to 36. It can be made directly, or it can be upgraded to using a &6Pattern Provider Upgrade&r.
moni.quest.0FA4CAD4F68BC0F8.subtitle: A very useful upgrade to the Pattern Provider.
moni.quest.0FA4CAD4F68BC0F8.title: &9Extended Pattern Provider
moni.quest.0FA959478905FFF3.description1: &2The Alloy Blast Smelter directly smelts dust combinations into molten Alloys, skipping the Mixer step, and applying a 3/4 discount to your EBF time. Some molten alloys may need to be cooled in a Vacuum Freezer before being usable.
moni.quest.0FA959478905FFF3.description2: &rThis is the only way to create some of the advanced alloys used in multiblock machines. You can also use it for most normal alloys if you want. In particular, &ethe speed and energy efficiency are better than the equivalent EBF recipe.&r
moni.quest.0FA959478905FFF3.description3: You can also use the ABS for most Alloy Smelter alloys (apart from &6Steel&r) like &eInvar&r, &e&eConductive Iron&r&r, and &e&eDark Steel&r&r.
moni.quest.0FA959478905FFF3.title: &2Alloy Blast Smelter
moni.quest.0FD703A1A1E5055E.description1: Run the materials through &3Inscribers&r with &aPresses&r to make the printed variant, then combine the printed materials and circuit to form the Engineering Processor.
moni.quest.0FD703A1A1E5055E.subtitle: &6Engineering Processors&r are made from a &6Printed Engineering Circuit&r, &6Printed Silicon&r, and any tier one circuit.
moni.quest.0FD703A1A1E5055E.title: Engineering Processor
moni.quest.0FD9B533BB402B17.description1: Using the &6Shattered Universe Data&r and a Tier Eleven Micro Miner, Scrap can be retrieved. Scrap can be sifted into various bits of ruined tech, each of which go through their own miniature processing line to be recycled into &6Holmium&r.
moni.quest.0FD9B533BB402B17.description2: Scrap processing can also yield a variety of other important elements.
moni.quest.0FD9B533BB402B17.title: &9Scrapping
moni.quest.0FF18D13CD42F48A.description1: Feeding a &3Steam Dynamo&f with water by hand is a pretty silly idea.
Feeding &3Steam producers&r with water by hand is a pretty silly idea.
Feeding &3Steam producers&r with water by hand is a pretty silly idea.
moni.quest.0FF18D13CD42F48A.description2: A &6Water Collector&f will take care of that for you, albeit slowly. It does, however, auto-output the water, making it simple to use.
A &2Primitive Water Pump&r will take care of that for you.
A &2Primitive Water Pump&r will take care of that for you.
moni.quest.0FF18D13CD42F48A.description3: &2GTCEu has a Primitive Water Pump, which can do it faster. However, it requires Treated Wood, which requires Creosote from a Coke Oven.
moni.quest.0FF18D13CD42F48A.title: &9Infinite Water
moni.quest.102BE3675105B9F5.title: 元素番号015番:リン
moni.quest.1040D941027962B1.description1: &aME Pattern Providers&r and &aME Interfaces&r are extremely important for automation. You'll be making a lot of these, if you're playing the pack right.
moni.quest.1040D941027962B1.description2: These can be filled with encoded &aPatterns&r to perform on-demand autocrafting. Any item pushed into an &aME Pattern Provider&r is digitized and placed in your ME Network storage.
moni.quest.1040D941027962B1.description3: When adjacent to one or more &aMolecular Assemblers&r, &3Crafting Table&r and &3Stonecutter&r patterns can be crafted. It will use as many adjacent &aMolecular Assemblers&r as possible, restricted by availability and number of &aCo-processors&r in your crafting CPU multiblock.
moni.quest.1040D941027962B1.description4: When adjacent to any other block, you can use &aprocessing patterns&r with a machine to insert items into the machine. Processing patterns require that the finished item is inserted back into the ME Network through &aInterfaces&r or &aPattern Providers&r.
moni.quest.1040D941027962B1.description5: &aME Pattern Providers&r can be wrenched to ensure they only communicate with a particular adjacent block, or can be crafted into a micropart form to fit multiple in the same block space (each micropart only interacting with the adjacent block face).
moni.quest.1040D941027962B1.subtitle: &lNot&r an Interface
moni.quest.1040D941027962B1.title: &9Pattern Provider
moni.quest.1062A387E899434C.description1: Just as with Overworldian mob data, there's no huge rush or need to focus on these. Just run them while you work on other projects.
moni.quest.1062A387E899434C.title: &4Nether&r Mobs
moni.quest.10722CBC4DAD28F4.description1: You'll need &9Chlorine&r at this point. It is an important ingredient in many chemical processes, and you can currently get it from electrolyzing either &6Salt&r or &6Rock Salt&r.
moni.quest.10722CBC4DAD28F4.description2: &2Later, you can use Fluid Rigs or break down Ghast Tears to obtain Salt Water, and electrolyze it to Chlorine.
moni.quest.10722CBC4DAD28F4.description3: &rUsing Fluid Rigs is the best way to obtain mass amounts of Chlorine.
moni.quest.10722CBC4DAD28F4.title: &2Chlorine
moni.quest.10C4A6FF23A4DF17.description1: No, your monitor doesn't have a dead pixel on it, this is just a quest to track if you've made Diesel or Bio-Diesel cause FTB quests can't do proper logic gates.
moni.quest.10C4A6FF23A4DF17.description2: (Yeah I could just make this quest invisible, but then the dependency lines don't render, kind of a lose-lose here)
moni.quest.10C4A6FF23A4DF17.description3: Now get back to making that (bio)diesel!
moni.quest.10C4A6FF23A4DF17.title: Diesel or Bio-Diesel
moni.quest.1109CFC5D47FC011.description1: The &3Research Station&r is an advanced Scanner which consumes &dComputation Work&r provided by connected &3High Performance Computing Arrays&r to research &cZPM&r and higher items.
moni.quest.1109CFC5D47FC011.description2: The function of this multiblock is similar to the Scanner. Place the &6Data Orb&r or &6Data Module&r into the &3Object Holder&r alongside the item to be scanned. After sufficient &dCWU&r has been drawn, the item will be &cconsumed&r and the corresponding data will be written to the data item. Ensure your &3HPCA&r is supplying sufficient &dCWU/t&r - check the scan recipe in &eEMI&r for how much is required.
moni.quest.1109CFC5D47FC011.description3: &3Energy&r, &3Maintenance&r, and &3Computation Hatches&r can only replace the 9 &aComputer Casings&r between the &aComputer Heat Vents&r at the back of the structure. The &3Object Holder&r &cmust face&r the &3Research Station&r controller block.
moni.quest.1109CFC5D47FC011.description4: The Research Station can be accelerated with excess &dCWU/t&r, but it &cdoes not overclock&r with extra &dEU/t&r. Initial recipes run on &dLuV&r power, but &cZPM&r will be required soon, and higher tiers of energy will be required for more advanced scans. As most Research scans take a long time, you should start this process early.
moni.quest.1109CFC5D47FC011.title: &2Research Station
moni.quest.11154356854B64DA.description1: You'll need an HV or better &3Chemical Bath&r to make these. The recipe is quite slow, so invest in the highest tier Chemical Baths you can and consider parallelizing the recipe.
moni.quest.11154356854B64DA.subtitle: When &6Ender Eyes&r just aren't creepy enough.
moni.quest.113E9543ADB1666B.description1: This highly advanced alloy will require you to extensively process Ancient Debris and combine the results with a few other items in an Omnic Forge.
moni.quest.113E9543ADB1666B.title: &9Activated Netherite
moni.quest.115B96B2092D671E.description1: The &6Crystal Processor Mainframe&r is the first Tier Eight circuit.
moni.quest.115B96B2092D671E.description2: Along with things you already know how to make, this needs &6HSS-E Frames&r.
moni.quest.115B96B2092D671E.description3: These are required for crafting the &3ZPM Circuit Assembler&r. As usual, these are extremely expensive: invest in the next theme of circuits instead of trying to mass-produce these.
moni.quest.115B96B2092D671E.title: &2The First Tier Eight Circuits
moni.quest.115D2BEB18929C7C.description1: While there are no types of veins that are extremely rare, you're likely to struggle with finding at least one of the less common vein types. This isn't really avoidable.
moni.quest.115D2BEB18929C7C.rich_descrip: You will accumulate a lot of
Search for various ores (generally the first one listed in
) to find the coin recipes for them. Alternatively, hover your cursor over a coin and press
to see what you can buy with it.
moni.quest.115D2BEB18929C7C.subtitle: Don't be a hoarder!
moni.quest.115D2BEB18929C7C.title: Spend Your Coins!
moni.quest.1175ED9EF0AB82F6.description1: Accessing &bApplied Energistics 2&r wirelessly saves a huge amount of time, and is highly recommended to set up.
moni.quest.1175ED9EF0AB82F6.description2: First, you will need a &6Wireless Access Point&r. Connect it to your network. Like the &6Terminal&r, the Wireless Access Point is a &emicropart&r, so you must place it on a &6ME Cable&r.
moni.quest.1175ED9EF0AB82F6.description3: Next, you need a &6Wireless Terminal&r, or any of its variants. You can have as many Wireless Terminals connected to the system as you want.
moni.quest.1175ED9EF0AB82F6.description4: Finally, put your &6Wireless Terminal&r into the &6Wireless Access Point&r. This will connect it to the system.
moni.quest.1175ED9EF0AB82F6.description5: You can equip these as a bauble, and use a hotkey to open them. Search 'Applied Energistics' as a &ecategory&r to see and edit these hotkeys.
moni.quest.1175ED9EF0AB82F6.description6: The default range is only 16 blocks. However, you can put &6Wireless Boosters&r into the &6Wireless Access Point&r to increase the range. A better (but more expensive) solution that allows access from anywhere will be explained in the following quest, 'AE2 Everywhere!'.
moni.quest.1175ED9EF0AB82F6.description7: &9Building Gadgets can be bound to the ME system by &8Shift-right-clicking&9 with it on an online ME Wireless Access Point.&r
moni.quest.1175ED9EF0AB82F6.subtitle: AE2 from anywhere... almost
moni.quest.1175ED9EF0AB82F6.title: Wireless Terminal
moni.quest.1183B96529D08326.description1: &6Fusion Coils&r are used in the &2Fusion Reactor MK II&r and &2Fusion Reactor MK III&r.
moni.quest.1183B96529D08326.title: &2Fusion Coils
moni.quest.119C529A35758AF2.title: 元素番号???番:デュラニウム
moni.quest.11FDFB08CD48D66E.description1: The MAX voltage lacks machines to call its own, with the primary usage of its circuits being to craft the &9Creative Quantum Chest&r.
moni.quest.11FDFB08CD48D66E.subtitle: There can be only one!
moni.quest.11FDFB08CD48D66E.title: &9MAX Circuit
moni.quest.1207189AD233A746.description1: &6Nano CPUs&r are advanced &6Circuit Wafers&r made from infusing a &6CPU Wafer&r with &6Carbon Fibers&r and &9Energized Glowstone&r in a &3Chemical Reactor&r.
moni.quest.1207189AD233A746.description2: Then, cut the resulting wafer into dies using a &3Cutting Machine&r.
moni.quest.1229234A71CE0A99.description1: &6Redstone&f: Found only deep in the world, in massive veins paired with &6Cinnabar&f and &6Ruby&f.
moni.quest.1229234A71CE0A99.description2: &6Copper&f: Two primary sources. &6Tetrahedrite&f veins are higher up, while &6Chalcopyrite&f veins are lower, paired with some small amounts of &6Iron&f. You'll also find &6Malachite&f inside of Iron veins; this is another type of copper ore.

&6Copper&f: Two primary sources. &6Tetrahedrite&f veins are higher up, while &6Chalcopyrite&f veins are lower, paired with some small amounts of &6Iron&f. You'll also find &6Malachite&f inside of Iron veins, this is another type of copper ore.

&6Copper&f: Two primary sources. &6Tetrahedrite&f veins are higher up, while &6Chalcopyrite&f veins are lower, paired with some small amounts of &6Iron&f. You'll also find &6Malachite&f inside of Iron veins, this is another type of copper ore.
moni.quest.1229234A71CE0A99.description3: &6Tin&f: Found essentially at ground level. &6Cassiterite&f is another type of tin ore, and they're always found together. If you cannot find a vein of tin, there are small amounts of tin inside veins of &6Aluminium&f and &6Rock Salt&f, which might be enough to hold you over until you find a proper tin vein.
moni.quest.1229234A71CE0A99.description4: &6Coal&f: Found in relatively shallow depths. &6Lignite Coal&f is &2removed.
moni.quest.1229234A71CE0A99.description5: &6Gold&f: Found inside of &6Magnetite&f veins, close to the surface.
moni.quest.1229234A71CE0A99.subtitle: Before you continue, you'll need access to some more materials.
moni.quest.1229234A71CE0A99.title: More Materials
moni.quest.12602DA0FD3D8349.title: 元素番号078番:白金(プラチナ)
moni.quest.126772F682B282E4.description1: The &eNether&r contains quite a few useful resources:
The &eNether&r contains quite a few useful resources:
moni.quest.126772F682B282E4.description5: - &2Nether Air&r, which can be distilled for useful gases
- &2Nether Air&r, which can be distilled for useful gases
moni.quest.126ED4A0AEA05DCD.description1: Components can be applied to &bThermal Expansion&r Dynamos and machines.
moni.quest.126ED4A0AEA05DCD.description2: When applied to a dynamo, it increases the &apower generation and fuel burn rate to 150%&r.
moni.quest.126ED4A0AEA05DCD.description3: Allows machines to operate at &a150% of their base power per tick&r. The more power a machine can use, the faster it works.
moni.quest.126ED4A0AEA05DCD.subtitle: What?! &6STEAM DYNAMO&r is evolving!
moni.quest.1289F9FE461BFE01.description1: &6Wetware Processors&r are made in &2the ZPM+ Circuit Assembler still.
moni.quest.1289F9FE461BFE01.title: &2The Third Tier Seven Circuits
moni.quest.12B896D7EF558835.title: 元素番号018番:アルゴン
moni.quest.12B95158E4C792DB.description1: The most basic cables, such as these &6Red Alloy Cables&f, can be wrapped in their &6Rubber&f insulation by hand.
moni.quest.12B95158E4C792DB.description2: More advanced types of cables will require an &3Assembling Machine&f and liquid &9Rubber&f, but you can do it the simple way for now.
moni.quest.12B95158E4C792DB.description3: &2CEu has GT6-style pipes and cables on by default. &rYou will need to use &aWire Cutters&r to connect each side of a cable to machines or other cables. Placing it against the machine or cable automatically connects it as well. The same behaviour follows for GT pipes, whose tool is the &aWrench&r.
moni.quest.12B95158E4C792DB.description4: This can save you from energy or fluids going the wrong way. But if you don't like this, disable the config option for "GT6 style pipes and cables" in the GregTech config file.
moni.quest.12B95158E4C792DB.description5: &2GT cables now support RF conversion natively! &eYou can plug an &9RF&e machine into an &9EU&e cable directly and it will convert the energy.&r You cannot, however, plug an &9RF&r power souce directly into an &9EU&r cable.

&2GT cables now support RF conversion natively! &rYou can plug an &9RF&r machine into an &9EU&r cable directly and it will convert the energy. You cannot, however, plug an &9RF&r power souce directly into an &9EU&r cable.

&2GT cables now support RF conversion natively! &rYou can plug an &9RF&r machine into an &9EU&r cable directly and it will convert the energy. You cannot, however, plug an &9RF&r power souce directly into an &9EU&r cable.
moni.quest.12B95158E4C792DB.title: &2Cables
moni.quest.13035465E07E34CF.description1: &6Transistors&r are semiconductors that can amplify or switch electrical signals and power. They're probably one of the most important inventions of the 20th century.
moni.quest.13035465E07E34CF.description2: You're going to use them as a component for better circuits. This one is a bit pricey, requiring &2PE, Silicon Plates and Fine Tin Wire.
moni.quest.13035465E07E34CF.title: &2Transistors
moni.quest.131EAE1541E9C780.description1: Now that you've dealt with the dragon, seek the bedrock structure floating mid-air around the edge of the main island.
moni.quest.131EAE1541E9C780.description2: Carefully throw an &6Ender Pearl&r inside one (where there's a portal-looking texture) to teleport to a distant island.
moni.quest.131EAE1541E9C780.description3: Once there, gather some &6Chorus Flowers&r. You'll have to smash the flower itself to get it: simply breaking the stem of a plant will not drop the flower.
moni.quest.131EAE1541E9C780.description4: To get back to the main island, throw an Ender Pearl into another bedrock portal structure.
moni.quest.131EAE1541E9C780.title: Chorus Flowering
moni.quest.133FB7996362498C.description1: Run the materials through &3Inscribers&r with &aPresses&r to make the printed variant, then combine the printed materials and circuit to form the Calculation Processor.
moni.quest.133FB7996362498C.subtitle: &6Calculation Processors&r are made from a &6Printed Calculation Circuit&r, &6Printed Silicon&r, and any &6tier one circuit&r.
moni.quest.133FB7996362498C.title: Calculation Processor
moni.quest.1349044BF8C04A12.description1: The &3Soul Binder&r is an &bEnder IO&r machine which uses &aSoul Vials&r and Experience to enhance specific items.
moni.quest.1349044BF8C04A12.description2: It may be prudent to store &9Liquid XP&r in an adjacent &3Obelisk&r, which the Soul Binder can draw from directly, or you can insert it using other standard means of fluid routing.
moni.quest.1349FBBCE3041081.description1: Break up your &6Sandstone&r into &6Saltpeter&r. This is probably the best way to get &6Saltpeter&r, which you'll need a lot of for &6Aerotheum Dust&r. You can also get &6Saltpeter&r from &bHostile Neural Networks&r.
moni.quest.1349FBBCE3041081.description2: You can also electrolyze it for &6Potassium&r, although that isn't recommended because of how easily you can get &6Potassium&r from other sources and how much &6Saltpeter&r it costs.
moni.quest.1349FBBCE3041081.subtitle: &oThis step requires a Macerator at voltage &lLV&r&o or higher.&r
moni.quest.13578427FD9CC2CE.description1: The IPMEPS is capable of altering the laws of physics on a microversal scale, thus allowing the production of previously impossible materials.
moni.quest.13578427FD9CC2CE.subtitle: The final Micro Miner!
moni.quest.13578427FD9CC2CE.title: &9Tier Twelve Micro Miner
moni.quest.13B12457AA9BF90D.description1: A much more efficient version of the &3Empowerer&r.
moni.quest.13B12457AA9BF90D.description2: This is a digital upgrade to the &3Crafting Core&r, allowing you to craft Empowerer recipes directly through &bPackagedAuto&r.
moni.quest.13B12457AA9BF90D.description3: The &aMarked Pedestals&r can be placed freely within three blocks' distance of the Crafting block, as long as they are on the same Y-level.
moni.quest.13B12457AA9BF90D.description4: As usual with PackagedAuto crafters, you need to encode the recipe in the correct mode and place a copy in two places: a &3Packager&r somewhere on your network, and an &3Unpackager&r adjacent to the &3Combination Package Crafter&r.
moni.quest.13B12457AA9BF90D.description5: These recipes require large amounts of RF and it &ewill not use power from your &aME Network&r, so you must also connect the package crafter directly to energy cards.
moni.quest.13F33DCE02ECE265.description1: &2Assembling Machines come early in CEu! Circuit recipes are handled through a separate machine, the Circuit Assembler. &r
moni.quest.13F33DCE02ECE265.description2: Assembling Machines open up a plethora of &eequal or more efficient recipes that don't require hand tools&r. &2For example, you can make up to 4 Vacuum Tubes in a single craft! &rCheck EMI&r for all the components you've been making to see if the Assembler can improve their recipes.
moni.quest.13F33DCE02ECE265.description3: Many of the Assembler's recipes require &9fluids&r. Hence, the &3Extractor&r will be required to take full advantage of this machine.
moni.quest.13F33DCE02ECE265.description4: Hand tool recipes also don't play nice with &bApplied Energistics&r. Take advantage of Assembling Machines: &cphase out all use of hand tools for crafting items in your automation going forward.&r Once you have all the important machines, you will never need hand tools for crafting.
moni.quest.13F33DCE02ECE265.title: &2LV Assembling Machine
moni.quest.1405D08C6A87B3BB.description1: &3Large Plasma Turbines&r are a powerful late game method of generating power. One Large Plasma Turbine produces &2a base of 16384 EU/t when using an IV Rotor Holder&r.
moni.quest.1405D08C6A87B3BB.title: &2Plasma Turbine
moni.quest.14F1FF4656693711.description1: An alloy of equal parts &6Tungsten&r and &6Carbon Dust&r.
moni.quest.14F1FF4656693711.description2: &6Tungsten Carbide&r is a very dense, sturdy, and heat-resistant material useful for a variety of applications.
moni.quest.14F1FF4656693711.title: Tungsten Carbide
moni.quest.14F2E61E80D231AE.title: 元素番号012番:マグネシウム
moni.quest.1510DC51CDC3F609.description1: Circuits along this line are MV, and can all be substituted in recipes.
moni.quest.1510DC51CDC3F609.description2: The pattern stays the same: the rightmost circuit comes in larger quantities and is overall easier to produce.
moni.quest.1510DC51CDC3F609.title: MV Circuits
moni.quest.15372CBC9F2EA9BC.description1: Combining &9Titanium Tetrachloride&r with &6Magnesium&r in an &3Electric Blast Furnace&r (approximating the Kroll process) will net you your first &6Titanium&r.
moni.quest.15372CBC9F2EA9BC.description2: This process is a loop, and therefore will not cost you any resources (apart from &6Rutile&r) if you process it correctly.
moni.quest.15372CBC9F2EA9BC.description3: Unfortunately, it is super hot. You'll need to cool it in a &3Vacuum Freezer&r for it to be usable.
moni.quest.15372CBC9F2EA9BC.description4: If you haven't set one up yet or want to improve your setup, routing through AE is an alternative way to using LaserIO. Simply set a Tag Storage Bus on the input bus of the freezer, set it to 'forge:hot_ingots', and set it to a high priority. This will accept any new Hot Ingots entering your system, and eliminates the need for a network.
moni.quest.15372CBC9F2EA9BC.description5: Don't encode the Hot Ingot in a pattern though!
moni.quest.15372CBC9F2EA9BC.title: Hot Titanium
moni.quest.153BDCAE4D1CC407.description1: &9Ethylene&r is a hydrocarbon obtained from &9Oil Processing&r, or by dehydrating &9Ethanol&r with &9Sulfuric Acid&r in a &3Chemical Reactor&r. Choose a method that works for you:
moni.quest.153BDCAE4D1CC407.description2: - The &9Ethanol&r route allows you to use your existing &6Sugarcane&r farm to produce &9Ethylene&r. However, the recipes require &bMedium Voltage&r machines to run.
moni.quest.153BDCAE4D1CC407.description3: - The &9Oil Processing&r route requires &2only LV machines&r, but you will have to source &9Oil&r, or its variants, from somewhere. &2Severely Steam-Cracked Light Fuel&r is most efficient with &9Oil and Heavy Oil&r. &2Severely Steam-Cracked Naphtha&r is more efficient when you are using &9Raw Oil and Light Oil&r.
moni.quest.153BDCAE4D1CC407.description4: It is an extremely important chemical in the production of plastics, as you'll need &9Ethylene&r in your production of &9Polyethylene (PE)&r, &9Polyvinyl Chloride (PVC)&r, and can be used in the production of &9Styrene-Butadiene Rubber (SBR)&r, the best form of rubber.
moni.quest.153BDCAE4D1CC407.title: &2Ethylene
moni.quest.15607184B546F5EE.description1: &2Tritanium Coils are the eighth coil material. At 10800K, it's capable of smelting nearly every material.
moni.quest.15607184B546F5EE.title: &2Tritanium Coils
moni.quest.15A43AB700CADF2D.title: Ironman 3
moni.quest.15AE607E2EDD0369.subtitle: The third component for AE &6Storage Cells&r.
moni.quest.15AE607E2EDD0369.title: 16k Item Storage
moni.quest.15B1277EF8657C65.description1: The final tier of Integral Components!
moni.quest.15B1277EF8657C65.description2: Dynamos operate at &a1000% of base power generation and fuel burn rate&r.
moni.quest.15B1277EF8657C65.description3: Machines operate at &a1000% of base speed&r.
moni.quest.15DBB22E3DC0AFB7.description1: Eventually, when you unlock the &aHyperbolic Microverse Projector&r, you can also use it to gain a massive amount of &bStellar Creation Data&r at once.
This microminer can also return &9Solidifed Bromine&r.
moni.quest.15DBB22E3DC0AFB7.description2: All of the Tier Four missions require &68 Quantum Flux&r and a stack of &6Petrotheum Dust&r.
moni.quest.15DBB22E3DC0AFB7.description3: This miner is the first convenient source of &6Sheldonite&r, the best choice for creating &6Platinum Group Sludge&r, via a mission requiring &6Wither Realm Data&r.
moni.quest.15DBB22E3DC0AFB7.title: &9Tier Four Micro Miner
moni.quest.15E34DEC491FAB81.description1: With &6HV Machine Hulls&r made, you've made your first step towards &eHigh Voltage (HV)&r power machinery!
moni.quest.15E34DEC491FAB81.description2: While you can make these in a crafting table with &6Polyethylene Sheets&r, liquid &9Polyethylene&r can be used to craft these directly in an &3Assembling Machine&r.
moni.quest.15E34DEC491FAB81.title: HV Machine Hulls
moni.quest.15FAEE3F625265F4.description1: &2A strong heavy 元素番号obt番ained from the Naquadah chain.
moni.quest.15FAEE3F625265F4.description2: &6Trinium&r can come from &6Kaemanite Ore&r, but you will probably want to bolster its production with &6Naquadah Dust&r processing. It comes out at the second stage, so if you don't mind storing the intermediates and have Fluorine under control, you can hold off doing the full chain if you don't need to yet. You get &91 Trinium per 6 Naquadah processed&r.
moni.quest.15FAEE3F625265F4.description3: This will be required in large quantities for &6Trinium Coils&r, &6Superconducting Coil Blocks&r, and &6Naquadah Alloy&r, among other things. You will need at least 5.5 stacks for a &3Fusion Reactor MK I&r, so stock up on it!
moni.quest.15FAEE3F625265F4.title: &2Trinium
moni.quest.161F61C28DBC5941.description1: The &3Loot Superfabricator&r is a multiblock structure that is made to match the incredible speeds of the &3Simulation Supercomputer&r.
moni.quest.161F61C28DBC5941.description2: One of these structures can perform the equivalent work of hundreds of individual Loot Fabricators more efficiently. This will make it far easier to generate said &6Dragon Lair Data&r from all that pristine matter you now have.
moni.quest.161F61C28DBC5941.description3: As a &9Creative Tier&r structure, it is rather expensive to make. However, it is an investment that will easily pay for itself as you progress through the endgame. You should strongly consider making one of these with your second batch of &9Hearts of a Universe&r.
moni.quest.161F61C28DBC5941.title: &9Loot Superfabricator
moni.quest.16EACCF9B4FA89B3.description1: This is the additive that will bring our diesel fuel to the next level.
moni.quest.16EACCF9B4FA89B3.description2: Mix &9Nitric Acid&r and &9Ethenone&r in a &3Chemical Reactor&r to make &9Tetranitromethane&r.
moni.quest.16EACCF9B4FA89B3.description3: In a newly added route, you can also mix &9Nitric Acid&r and &9Methyl Acetate&r in a &3Chemical Reactor&r.
moni.quest.16EACCF9B4FA89B3.title: Tetranitromethane
moni.quest.171EE3A4129F19A5.description1: &6Sunnarium&r is an alloy formed using &6Plutonium&r, &6Glowstone,&r and &6Americium&r in a &3Crafting Table.&r
moni.quest.171EE3A4129F19A5.description2: It is a common ingredient in higher tier &6Solar Panels&r.
moni.quest.171EE3A4129F19A5.description3: There is a more efficient recipe made in an IV or better &3Mixer&r, but it'll take a long time to produce so consider stocking it passively.
moni.quest.17312BF0197B87A8.description1: Although most &ealloys&f require an &3Alloy Smelter&f, some alloys can be made simply by mixing the correct metal dusts together.
A mixture of &6Clay, Brick, &cGypsum and Concrete&r produces &6Firebricks&r, used in building the &3Primitive Blast Furnace&r. &c
A mixture of &6Clay and Brick&r produces &6Fireclay&r, used in building the &3Primitive Blast Furnace&r. &c
moni.quest.17312BF0197B87A8.description2: &9Steel is one of these alloys, being made by mixing Wrought Iron dust with Coal dust or Charcoal dust&r. &2Steel forms the basis of LV Machine Hulls&r, and allows you to make &6Belt Pouches&r for upgrading your &eTool Belt&r.
So far, your only available route for Concrete is adding Stone Dust, Quartz Sand, Clay and Calcite to a bucket of Water.&r
This allows you to make &6Steel&r from &6Wrought Iron&r (or with &6Iron&r, but its slower). Now you can make &7LV &6Machine Hulls&r!
moni.quest.17312BF0197B87A8.description3: This allows you to make &6Steel&r from &6Wrought Iron&r (or with &6Iron&r, but its slower). Now you can make &7LV &6Machine Hulls&r!
Also allows you to make the &6Belt Pouch&r, to upgrade your &eTool Belt&r.
moni.quest.17312BF0197B87A8.description4: Also allows you to make the &6Belt Pouch&r, to upgrade your &eTool Belt&r.
moni.quest.17312BF0197B87A8.title: &9Steel
moni.quest.1735403C8B0D3FAD.description1: &6Phosphorus&r can be obtained by processing &6Tricalcium Phosphate Ore&r or &6Apatite Ore&r into dust and electrolyzing several times.
moni.quest.1735403C8B0D3FAD.description2: Both ores are found in &6Apatite&r veins.
moni.quest.1735403C8B0D3FAD.title: Phosphorus
moni.quest.174C8EDDEF916209.description1: The &3Slice'N'Splice&r is a machine from &bEnder IO&r.
moni.quest.174C8EDDEF916209.description2: It is used for making monster-head-related items that are components for various things.
moni.quest.174C8EDDEF916209.description3: It needs to be supplied with an Axe and Shears, which are slowly damaged over time as items are crafted.
moni.quest.17B5F089E58BB780.title: 元素番号094番:プルトニウム
moni.quest.17E92ED356B6737F.description1: In most expert packs, you want to try to process as little ore as possible before you get access to ore doubling. It's a habit most of us pick up.
moni.quest.17E92ED356B6737F.description3: Obvious exceptions would be rare materials or anything you buy with &9Monicoins &fbecause you can't find it. Those are worth doubling, if possible.
The obvious exception would be rare materials; Those are worth doubling, if possible.
The obvious exception would be rare materials; Those are worth doubling, if possible.
moni.quest.17E92ED356B6737F.description4: But at least for now, you shouldn't feel any guilt about smelting the more common ores without doubling them! &eOre doubling can be safely ignored until you have the &2Steam Grinder&r&e or High Voltage machines.&r
moni.quest.17E92ED356B6737F.rich_descrip: Click to go to the quest
You shouldn't feel any pressure to do that in
, though. Ore veins are massive, mining is extremely fast with
Macerators' byproducts aren't available until HV.
moni.quest.17E92ED356B6737F.title: &2Ore Doubling?
moni.quest.186C14C113B6F3AD.description1: Coating &6Cryococcus&r with &9Liquid Nether Star&r and freezing it solid results in a superconductive material capable of transmitting enormous amounts of energy.
moni.quest.186C14C113B6F3AD.description2: These wires losslessly transmit &4UHV&r power, and can also be made into the final form of RF Overclocker that can transmit a whopping &a134 million RF/t&r.
moni.quest.186C14C113B6F3AD.title: Superconductor Wire
moni.quest.1881488CEB982FCD.description1: The best source of &6Cobblestone&r is &bThermal &6Igneous Extruders&r. If the first one isn't enough, you can always upgrade and make more of them.&r This is the starting point of your &eCobbleworks&r.
moni.quest.18B28DC43ACAF768.description2: &6LEB-248 Fuel&r is made with &e8 &6Berkelium 247&r and &e1 &6Berkelium 248&r. When depleted, it results in several different isotopes of &6Californium&r.
moni.quest.18B28DC43ACAF768.title: Berkelium Fission
moni.quest.18D8D18C4494C587.description1: &9GregTech Power&r can be tricky to handle. Luckily, there are several tools you can use to tackle some of the problems.
moni.quest.18D8D18C4494C587.description2: - &aDiode&r: A block which accepts energy on 5 sides, and outputs it on a single side. Its main purpose is to limit Amperage flow through it - adjust it by right-clicking it with a Soft Hammer, &2and to transport power into Cleanrooms.&r Not to be confused with the Diodes used as crafting components.
moni.quest.18D8D18C4494C587.description3: - &aTransformer&r: A block which changes between 4A of a lower voltage and 1A of a voltage one tier higher.
moni.quest.18D8D18C4494C587.description4: - &2Adjustable Transformer&r: Similar to the Transformer, but can be configured to transform up to 64A Low <-> 16A High.
moni.quest.18D8D18C4494C587.description5: - &aBattery Buffer&r: A block which can hold GregTech Batteries. Each battery accepts up to 2A and can provide up to 1A. &2They have been reworked in CEu to not be as terrible to use.
moni.quest.18D8D18C4494C587.title: &2GT Power Management
moni.quest.1903B26C95DD325A.description1: &6QBit CPUs&r are an advanced Circuit Wafer crucial for &6Quantum Circuits&r.
moni.quest.1903B26C95DD325A.description2: There are two methods of creating them:
moni.quest.1903B26C95DD325A.description3: The simpler recipe uses two &6Quantum Eyes&r and two ingots' worth of molten &9Gallium Arsenide&r to enhance a &6NanoCPU Wafer&r. This recipe is slow and requires substantially more &9Radon&r per craft.
moni.quest.1903B26C95DD325A.description4: The other route instead uses &6Indium Gallium Phosphide&r and a tiny amount of Radon. This skips the slow-crafting Quantum Eyes, using far less Radon in the process, but requires the infrastructure in place for obtaining &6Indium&r.
moni.quest.1903B26C95DD325A.description5: The second route is overall better, and you will need Indium processing to complete the pack so might as well do it.
moni.quest.1903B26C95DD325A.title: QBit Processing Unit
moni.quest.19084E91F357C8C2.description1: Allows you to assemble 3 kinds of creative energy blocks.
moni.quest.19084E91F357C8C2.description2: &2The Gregtech Energy Emitter is configurable to output any number of GT Volts and Amps.
moni.quest.19084E91F357C8C2.title: &9Creative Power
moni.quest.19233A97579E0BDD.description1: Although you could &emagnetize&r &6Iron Ingots&r by hand using &6Redstone&r, doing that consumes considerable amounts of dust and that's not an option for more advanced materials. This machine will let you magnetize &6Steel Rods&r, as well as even more advanced materials later.
moni.quest.19233A97579E0BDD.description2: &2Polarizer recipes in GTCEu go up to UV.
moni.quest.19233A97579E0BDD.subtitle: Automatic magnetizers
moni.quest.19233A97579E0BDD.title: &2Polarizer
moni.quest.193B7038EAB6EFA3.description1: The &9Nasa Workbench&r is used to create rockets from various parts.
moni.quest.193B7038EAB6EFA3.subtitle: Now it's time to think vertically
moni.quest.193B7038EAB6EFA3.title: &9Gregtech Rocketery
moni.quest.198C5A6A8ED38803.description1: &6S.C.U.L.K Bioalloy&r unlocks the means to set up the &3Biobalance Charger&r, a much improved version of the &6Sculk Charger&r.
moni.quest.198C5A6A8ED38803.description2: This multiblock is capable of both Charging and Discharging recipes, and can do these in parallel.
moni.quest.198C5A6A8ED38803.description3: &6Sneak-right click&r the controller to enable the in-world preview.
moni.quest.198C5A6A8ED38803.title: &9Biobalance Charger
moni.quest.19C2D208A2FC9968.description2: All of the Tier Four missions require &68 Quantum Flux&r and a stack of &6Aerotheum Dust&r.
moni.quest.19C2D208A2FC9968.description3: This miner will be your primary source of mob drops, for all, if not most, of your game.
moni.quest.19C2D208A2FC9968.title: Tier Four and a Half Microminer
moni.quest.1A30472430354F1E.description1: &9This is where &bEMI&9 really shines! Using it alongside &3Crafting Stations&9, you should be able to easily calculate the amount of raw resources and intermediate components you'll need to &ebatch craft &9electronic circuits quickly.
moni.quest.1A30472430354F1E.description2: You'll be making a LOT&r of circuits, so take advantage of the improved crafting efficiency.
moni.quest.1A30472430354F1E.subtitle: With all of the components made, it's time to craft an &2Electronic Circuit&r.
moni.quest.1A30472430354F1E.title: Your First Circuit
moni.quest.1A427A8CB43C8B59.description1: &bGregTech&r adds a very versatile way of augmenting machines with &aMachine Covers&r. Covers are "upgrades" that you can put on any &eGregTech machine, crate, or drum&r to expand its functionality. These are seperate on each side of the machine, meaning you can have up to six different covers! &9Covers can be edited and removed via the given machine's GUI&r, but for the others, you'll need to make yourself a &aScrewdriver&r to configure covers, and a &aCrowbar&r to remove covers without having to break the machine.
- &lShutter&r: prevents automation from interacting with a specific side of a machine.
- &lDetector&2: Available in Item, Fluid, Energy, Activity, and Advanced Activity flavours. Emits a Redstone signal depending on the status of whatever it's detecting.
Covers that move items or fluids can have a &aFilter&r placed inside them. These modify the functionality of covers in ways explained in their own quests.
moni.quest.1A427A8CB43C8B59.description2: Here's a list of some covers there are in the game, and what they do:
moni.quest.1A427A8CB43C8B59.description3: - &lConveyor&r: transfers items continuously to or from an adjacent inventory; is capable of round robin.
moni.quest.1A427A8CB43C8B59.description4: - &lPump&r: is much like a &aConveyor&f, but for fluids.
moni.quest.1A427A8CB43C8B59.description5: - &lRobotic Arm&r: is much like a &aConveyor&r, but has two additional modes:
moni.quest.1A427A8CB43C8B59.description6: * &eKeep Exact&r: moves items to keep a stock of at most the specified number of items
moni.quest.1A427A8CB43C8B59.description7: * &eSupply Exact&r: transfers precisely the specified number of items per operation.
moni.quest.1A427A8CB43C8B59.description8: This cover is very useful for crafting automation.
moni.quest.1A427A8CB43C8B59.description9: - &lFluid Regulator&r: is like a &aRobotic Arm&r, but works with fluids instead of items.
moni.quest.1A427A8CB43C8B59.title: &9Machine Covers
moni.quest.1A693859BD2CDADF.title: 元素番号014番:ケイ素
moni.quest.1A80D0AE0B2F7A9D.description1: The &6Steam Foundry&r functions as 5.3 &7LV &3Alloy Smelters&r in parallel! It requires an input of &9Steam&r through a &eSteam Hatch&r, but it uses very little Steam, perfect for bulk crafting alloys or mold recipes.

The &6Steam Foundry&r functions as 5.3 &7LV &3Alloy Smelters&r in parallel! It requires an input of &9Steam&r through a &eSteam Hatch&r, but it uses very little Steam, perfect for bulk crafting alloys or mold recipes.
moni.quest.1A80D0AE0B2F7A9D.description2: You may wish to wait until you have a Bender at LV to reduce the cost.
You may wish to wait until you have a Bender at LV to reduce the cost.
moni.quest.1AA0A089DCA17FC8.description1: Placing a &9Wireless Charger&r in a area that you frequent (such as where you do your crafting) will ensure that your items are always topped off on energy.
moni.quest.1AA0A089DCA17FC8.subtitle: Because waiting for items to charge is so last version
moni.quest.1AA0A089DCA17FC8.title: &9Charging Items Wirelessly
moni.quest.1AC8700C190E84BC.description1: Managing P2P tunnels can be a pain in large numbers. Thankfully, the &6Advanced Memory Card&r fixes that by allowing you to manage all of your connections within a single card, as well as bind and unbind things on the fly, among other features.
moni.quest.1AC8700C190E84BC.subtitle: They really do have a GUI for everything now
moni.quest.1AC8700C190E84BC.title: &9Better P2P Management
moni.quest.1AC91A3E05215569.description1: &2Bacterial Sludge will be used in the Crystal and Wetware processes.
moni.quest.1AC91A3E05215569.description2: Plant Balls can be macerated to obtain Bio Chaff, which can be further broken down to Bacteria. Then, combine it with Biomass to get Bacterial Sludge.
moni.quest.1AC91A3E05215569.description3: You will also get a bit back from growing Stem Cells later.
moni.quest.1AC91A3E05215569.title: &2Bacterial Sludge
moni.quest.1AE46C1970378083.description1: &3Diamond Furnaces&f are even faster, taking only &a25 ticks&f to smelt an item.
moni.quest.1AE46C1970378083.title: Furnace v6.0
moni.quest.1B07DB4D58D43B7C.description1: &2Naquadah Alloy is different in CEu. It requires Naquadah, Osmiridium and Trinium.
moni.quest.1B07DB4D58D43B7C.title: &2Naquadah Alloy
moni.quest.1B1D3A66B847D129.description1: With these circuits, you have unlocked &2UIV&r, the pentultimate voltage. UIV circuits allow you to craft a variety of things to help improve and redefine your base as you push on.
moni.quest.1B1D3A66B847D129.title: &9The First Tier Eleven Circuit
moni.quest.1B45AA7042D110E4.title: 元素番号042番:モリブデン
moni.quest.1B86EF5A24286787.description1: The &eTool Belt&r is an item which can store your tools and exchange them easily! Right now, it has 2 slots, but later, once you unlock &6Steel&r, you can upgrade it all the way to 9 slots with &6Belt Pouches&r, an &3Anvil&r, and some &aXP&r!
moni.quest.1B86EF5A24286787.description2: Make the Tool Belt, and you can use the keybind (default is &6R&r), while the belt is in your inventory or Bauble Slots &cand you are holding something, or the belt is not empty&r, to open its GUI.
moni.quest.1B86EF5A24286787.description3: Alternatively, you can right click while holding the belt to open its inventory.
moni.quest.1B86EF5A24286787.description4: The Tool Belt is equippable as a &bBauble&r. Open your inventory and look for the Baubles button, then click it to reveal the additional bauble slots menu, and put it in the Belt Slot. Or, if you can't tell which bauble slot looks like a belt, just click in every bauble slot until it goes in.
moni.quest.1B86EF5A24286787.description5: The Tool Belt can store anything with a stack size of 1, like swords, pickaxes, &bGregTech&r tools, &bFunctional Storage&r Cards, and the like.

The Tool Belt can store anything with a stack size of 1, like swords, pickaxes, &bGregTech&r tools, and the &6Terminal&r. It has also been modified a bit, so it also allows any &bStorage Drawers&r key, and &cdoesn't allow any Thermal Satchel&r.

The Tool Belt can store anything with a stack size of 1, like swords, pickaxes, &bGregTech&r tools, and the &6Terminal&r. It has also been modified a bit, so it also allows any &bStorage Drawers&r key, and &cdoesn't allow any Thermal Satchel&r.
moni.quest.1B86EF5A24286787.description6: Now, you can insert and extract from the belt! You can also use the Keybinds '&eCycle Tool Left&r' and '&eCycle Tool Right&r' whilst you are in the GUI.
moni.quest.1B86EF5A24286787.subtitle: &2A brand new and highly requested mod to CEu to help you manage your tools!&r
moni.quest.1B86EF5A24286787.title: &2Tool Belt
moni.quest.1BC6DDC2D50F9C46.description1: The &3Electric Blast Furnace&r is a major, major milestone in your &bGregTech&r career. It has the power to smelt more advanced materials. The first of these, &6Aluminium&r, is going to be important in the immediate future.
moni.quest.1BC6DDC2D50F9C46.description2: Since smelting &6Aluminium&r requires MV power, you're going to have to power this with 2 LV Energy Input Hatches.
moni.quest.1BC6DDC2D50F9C46.description3: There is a diagram of how to build the EBF in &bEMI&r. The second and third levels must be a 3x3 square shape of Coil Blocks (&6Cupronickel&r is the only type of coil block you have access to for now) with an empty center. You can also &6sneak-right click&r the controller to enable the in-world preview.
moni.quest.1BC6DDC2D50F9C46.description4: However, the bottom and top layers are very flexible. The &6EBF Controller&r must be on the &ebottom layer&r of the structure, and on the &emiddle of an outer edge&r; the &6Muffler Hatch&r must be in the &eexact middle of the top layer&r. Otherwise, you can put the hatches and buses wherever you want, filling in all the gaps in each layer with &6Heatproof Machine Casings&r. It's worth noting that you must &euse at least &29&e Heatproof Machine Casings in your layout or the structure will not form&r.
moni.quest.1BC6DDC2D50F9C46.description5: This quest calls for a &2maintenance hatch&r, two energy hatches, a fluid input and output, and an item input and output, which is a total of 7 positions. Their specific order and placement don't matter, as long as you can access them. The 8th position is your EBF controller, leaving 9 gaps to be filled by Heatproof Machine Casings. If you did everything right, the structure will form: the colors on its hatches and casings will unify, and the controller will say "Idling."
moni.quest.1BC6DDC2D50F9C46.description6: Hatches and Buses can be replaced by Hatches and Buses of any tier, although the Input Bus must be at least LV, as there are 2 inputs.
moni.quest.1BC6DDC2D50F9C46.description7: You'll most likely want to locate your power quite near to the EBF. It is very power hungry, and if it cannot get enough energy, progress on the current item smelting will start to regress. Be careful to ensure the EBF has enough power, and keep a Soft Hammer nearby to pause it by tapping the controller if you run out of power.
moni.quest.1BC6DDC2D50F9C46.description8: &2In GTCEu, all hatches except Maintenance and Parallel Control can be shared between Multiblocks!
moni.quest.1BC6DDC2D50F9C46.title: &2Blast Furnace Fun
moni.quest.1C861E0C62D5B97D.description1: Instead of using cables to move your data around, why not just have all the data packed in a single block?
moni.quest.1C861E0C62D5B97D.title: &9Creative Computation Data
moni.quest.1CA6D620309F2B9E.description1: Obtaining &6Grains of Infinity&r will require you to mine all the way down to Bedrock level.
moni.quest.1CA6D620309F2B9E.description2: &5You can automate grains via the Atomic Reconstructor, as fire-based automation methods are significantly more difficult.
moni.quest.1CA6D620309F2B9E.title: Grains Of Infinity
moni.quest.1CB14AC299A8EDD9.description1: The &6Machine Controller&r is a cover that manages the operation of &bGregTech&r machines, similar to a &aSoft Hammer&r. These are crucial for &epassive automation&r, where a machine is dedicated to keeping something in stock for you.
moni.quest.1CB14AC299A8EDD9.description2: "Machines" here is broader than you might think. It of course works on single-block machines, but can also be used on &eMultiblock Controllers&r like your &3Electronic Blast Furnace&r. But it's even more flexible than that: you can use it on any &bGregTech&r block that accepts transfer covers, as long as the controllable cover is placed on it first! This means it also works for things like &6Chests&r, &6Drums&r, and Multiblock inputs.
moni.quest.1CB14AC299A8EDD9.description3: The cover works by detecting a &eredstone signal&r. By default, the entire machine will be disabled if a sufficiently strong signal is detected by the cover.
moni.quest.1CB14AC299A8EDD9.description4: When you open the Machine Controller's GUI with a &aScrewdriver&r, you will see several options for configuring its behavior:
moni.quest.1CB14AC299A8EDD9.description5: The strength of the signal required to trigger the Machine Controller is configurable using the top slider.
moni.quest.1CB14AC299A8EDD9.description6: Another button allows you to select whether to control the whole machine (where applicable) or a specific cover. This lets you do things like stop moving items into a machine, but also allow the machine to continue working.
moni.quest.1CB14AC299A8EDD9.description7: Switching from &eNormal&r to &eInverted&r mode will make the Machine Controller instead disable the machine until it receives the requisite redstone signal. This is often preferable when working with &6Level Emitters&r to prevent machines from starting up if your &eME Network&r is offline.
moni.quest.1CC092A2F2CD4589.description1: You'll need at least &6Naquadah Coil Blocks&r in your blast furnace to smelt &6Cryolobus&r, as well as a healthy supply of &2Cetane-Boosted Diesel&r or &2Gasoline&r to reach the immense heat it takes to liquefy.
moni.quest.1CC092A2F2CD4589.description2: Cryolobus gets so hot that it requires the potent coolant &9Gelid Cryotheum&r to aid your &3Vacuum Freezer&r in turning it into usable ingots.
moni.quest.1CC092A2F2CD4589.description3: There are several ways to make Cryolobus: dust can be smelted into ingots, but you can also turn &6Warden Tendrils&r, which contain Cryolobus, directly into ingots. It uses a lot of&2 combustion fuel&r, but is the most efficient way to craft cryolobus.
moni.quest.1CC092A2F2CD4589.title: &9Cryolobus Ingots
moni.quest.1D00150456DEF379.description1: Reinforcing a &6Heart of a Universe&r with &6Hadal Energy Cores&r, many &6Piles of Neutrons&r, and a bunch of &6Eternal Catalysts&r produces an &cInfinity Catalyst&r.
moni.quest.1D00150456DEF379.subtitle: To infinity, and beyond!
moni.quest.1D0DF2330B113B7A.description1: Your &3Chemical Reactors&r will be making a lot of different fluids. You'll need to manage the logistics of routing and storing all the different fluids you're automating.
moni.quest.1D0DF2330B113B7A.description2: Wherever possible, having one Chemical Reactor output directly into another machine that needs its output chemical saves you from having to figure out additional storage and routing. &aFluid Filters&r and &aPump covers&r are very useful for moving fluids around a compact processing pipeline.
moni.quest.1D0DF2330B113B7A.description3: But what about the final output fluids that you need elsewhere?
moni.quest.1D0DF2330B113B7A.description4: One option is to use the output tanks of the Chemical Reactors as a small storage buffer, letting it back up and stop crafting automatically. A &aFluid Storage Bus&r on the machine will expose the fluid to your ME Network. Whenever you need some of this fluid, your AE2 system will pull the needed fluid out and the machine will resume processing.
moni.quest.1D0DF2330B113B7A.description5: There's some catches with this approach though. First is that the inaccessible input tanks will also show up in AE but you won't be able to access them.
