You will want to set the Storage Bus to &eExport Only&r so AE doesn't try to store random fluids in the Chemical Reactor, and you may want to &ereduce the priority&r of the Storage Bus as well: this will signal to AE that you want it to remove fluids from that location first. Also, if multiple fluids are produced, &ethe machine will not resume processing if it doesn't have room for all fluid outputs&r.
moni.quest.1D0DF2330B113B7A.description6: When you get access to them, it's probably just better to use single-fluid-formatted &aFluid Storage Cells&r and dump outputs into AE via Interfaces. You can fill up the cells, then pull the fluids out wherever else you need them. An alternative to this is storage buses on &3Gregtech Tanks and Drums&r.
moni.quest.1D0DF2330B113B7A.title: Fluid Logistics
moni.quest.1D3A5DCCE1B40D29.description1: These are the basic cables used by &3Applied Energistics&r to transport network connectivity. Due to the fact that channels are disabled, these cables will be your main method of transporting network connectivity, rather than the dense cables.
moni.quest.1D3A5DCCE1B40D29.description2: These cables do not share blockspace with cables for other mods, so they can be somewhat unwieldy to build with, but they do accept &3Applied Energistics &6Facades&r, so they can be hidden very easily. Keep in mind that a large number of facades leads to FPS lag.
moni.quest.1D3A5DCCE1B40D29.description3: Later, you can make a variant of the cable that can share blockspace with &3Ender IO&r conduits.
moni.quest.1D3A5DCCE1B40D29.subtitle: AE Networking
moni.quest.1D3A5DCCE1B40D29.title: ME Cables
moni.quest.1D4B663AD87CA3C1.description1: Split your &6Clay Dust&r to make &6Sodium Dust&r, &6Silicon Dust&r, &6Lithium Dust&r, and &6Aluminium Dust&r.&r This is extremely important to passive, as you will need a lot of these resources, and this is the best way to get them.
moni.quest.1D4B663AD87CA3C1.subtitle: &oThis step requires a Electrolyzer at voltage &lLV&r&o or higher.&r
moni.quest.1D4B663AD87CA3C1.title: Sodium, Silicon, Lithium and Aluminium
moni.quest.1DB3CCC10C0EB1A8.description2: This alloy is cooked in an &3Electric Blast Furnace&r into a &6Hot Nichrome Ingot&r which will damage you if it is held. To prevent this damage and obtain the desired ingot, the Hot Ingot must be cooled in a &3Vacuum Freezer&r.
moni.quest.1DB3CCC10C0EB1A8.description3: It is best to directly route this Hot Ingot from the &6Output Bus&r of your Blast Furnace to the &6Input Bus&r of your &3Vacuum Freezer&r via conduits or a &6Tag Filter&r set to 'forge:hot_ingots' with a high piority.
moni.quest.1DB3CCC10C0EB1A8.title: Nichrome Ingots
moni.quest.1DBBE96165C7987D.description2: For now, you'll be using it to make &6Energetic Alloy Dust&r.
moni.quest.1DBBE96165C7987D.description3: Energetic Alloy Dust is made from &6Redstone&r, &6Gold Dust&r and &6Glowstone Dust&r.
moni.quest.1DBBE96165C7987D.description4: You should have some Glowstone from your adventures in the &cNether&r, but you can also make it by mixing &6Tricalcium Phosphate Dust&r&r&r and &6&6&6Gold Dust&r&r&r.
moni.quest.1DBBE96165C7987D.subtitle: Will it blend?
moni.quest.1DBBE96165C7987D.title: LV Mixer
moni.quest.1DFF7C35B5B26B80.description1: Nothing you haven't seen here: just combine some standard circuit components and &6Nanocircuits&r to make a &6Nanoprocessor&r.
moni.quest.1DFF7C35B5B26B80.title: The Second Tier Four Circuits
moni.quest.1E36AFB19932C805.description1: &9Complex SMD Components&r are required for &9Dimensional and Monic circuits&r. They can also be substituted for the equivalent of 4 advanced SMD components.
moni.quest.1E36AFB19932C805.title: &9Complex SMD Components
moni.quest.1E498F509DB1D460.description1: Give me a little juice, FRIDAY!
moni.quest.1E498F509DB1D460.title: Infinity War
moni.quest.1EBF9D9EADB7C451.description1: &2You can make HV Batteries like LV and MV ones, but there is a better option.
moni.quest.1EBF9D9EADB7C451.description2: &2Energium Crystals can store 6,400,000 EU, at the cost of some crafting complexity. They need an HV Autoclave.
moni.quest.1EBF9D9EADB7C451.title: &2HV Power Storage
moni.quest.1F101D4F758ACECB.description1: With the &3Advanced Circuit Assembling Machine&r, a new theme of Circuits is available.
moni.quest.1F101D4F758ACECB.title: &2MV Circuit Assembler
moni.quest.1F2E76FA4B2C2E84.description1: &9Heavy Fuel&r is mixed with &9Light Fuel&r to create &9Diesel&r.
moni.quest.1F2E76FA4B2C2E84.title: Heavy Fuel
moni.quest.1F4D2DAF4267DB77.description1: Run the materials through &3Inscribers&r with &aPresses&r to make the printed variant, then combine the printed materials and circuit to form the Logic Processor.
moni.quest.1F4D2DAF4267DB77.subtitle: &6Logic Processors&r are made from a &6Printed Logic Circuit&r, &6Printed Silicon&r, and any tier one circuit.
moni.quest.1F7F73BF81570F3C.subtitle: unlocks hm and em quests
moni.quest.1F7F73BF81570F3C.title: &eNot NM
moni.quest.1F7FD354C79771A1.description2: The &3Cutting Machine&r is able to cut wafers, rods, wood, and various other things for you, making it a versatile crafting tool. Cutting blocks into 9 plates may be faster than using a &2Bender &rto make them one at a time.
moni.quest.1F7FD354C79771A1.description3: The MV version is required for cutting &6Silicon Boules&r for easier &6Diodes&r once you get &9Polyethylene (PE)&r, and for cutting &6Wafers&r into usable components.
moni.quest.1F7FD354C79771A1.description4: The blade will require you to make &2Vanadiumsteel&r.
moni.quest.1F7FD354C79771A1.description5: Cutting Machines work with plain &9Water&r for all recipes. You can also use &9Distilled Water&r which speeds up the processing somewhat, or &9Lubricant&r that speeds it up greatly (and uses very little per operation). These might be a little tricky to make right now, but are very worthwhile upgrades in the future.
moni.quest.1F7FD354C79771A1.title: &2MV Cutter
moni.quest.1F976B197DEFF654.title: &9Hardened Backpack
moni.quest.1FF5C2A3CAB76088.description1: Nothing new here, just use more standard circuit stuff and you can upgrade several &6Quantum Circuits&r into a &6Quantum Processor&r.
moni.quest.1FF5C2A3CAB76088.title: The Third Tier Five Circuit
moni.quest.1FF652D16CE97C79.rich_descrip: Also useful as a machine cover for continuously moving items. Read the
quest for more info on the various covers.
moni.quest.1FF652D16CE97C79.subtitle: Not as common a component, but used in a number of critical machines.
moni.quest.1FF652D16CE97C79.title: LV Conveyor
moni.quest.20116A38B08BA7A3.title: 元素番号046番:パラジウム
moni.quest.201B129579ACF449.description1: Separate your &6Quartz Sand&r into &6Quartzite Dust&r and &6Certus Quartz Dust&r. This is a good renewable source of &6Certus Quartz&r, which you need for &bApplied Energistics 2&r.
moni.quest.201B129579ACF449.subtitle: &oThis step requires a Centrifuge at voltage &lLV&r&o or higher.&r
moni.quest.201B129579ACF449.title: Quartzite and Certus Quartz Dust
moni.quest.20745EB9A695E365.description1: &aLasers&r are &9GregTech&r's native solution to high-volume power transfer. Each power tier starting at &1IV&r has &aLaser Hatches&r capable of transferring &9256A&r, &91,024A&r and &94,096A&r of their voltage's power!
moni.quest.20745EB9A695E365.description2: Energy in the Laser Network flows from &aLaser Sources&r through &6Laser Transmitting Cables&r to &aLaser Targets&r. All these must be in a straight line - lasers don't bend, after all. Similarly to other power-related blocks, the tier of the &aLaser Target&r must not be lower than the tier of the &aLaser Source&r.
moni.quest.20745EB9A695E365.description3: You can choose to use these when moving power between &3Active Transformers&r and your &3Power Substation&r.
moni.quest.20745EB9A695E365.title: &2Laser Network
moni.quest.20CB8F878CADA235.description1: &9Bathyal Energy Cores&r are the second tier of core, used for intermediate crafting recipes.
moni.quest.20CB8F878CADA235.title: &9Bathyal Energy Core
moni.quest.21654B6E703A2923.description1: Compact your &6Sand&r into &6Sandstone&r. It is recommended to use &3Ender IO Crafters&r or a &6Compressor&r.
moni.quest.2179B83440CEF343.description1: Circuits along this line are IV, and can all be substituted in recipes.
moni.quest.2179B83440CEF343.description2: The pattern stays the same: the rightmost circuit comes in larger quantities and is overall easier to produce.
moni.quest.2179B83440CEF343.title: IV Circuits
moni.quest.217F85D6FE2A467D.description1: &6ZPM Machine Hulls&r are made with &2Naquadah Alloy Plates,&r but you'll notice they also need &2Polybenzimidazole&r.
moni.quest.217F85D6FE2A467D.description2: ZPM stands for Zero Point Module.
moni.quest.217F85D6FE2A467D.description3: This is the last tier of machine that's sensible to produce before you reach the &9Creative Tank&r. Multiblock hatches are a different matter: feel free to upgrade your &3EBF&rs to Ultimate Voltage, if you can handle the power drain.
moni.quest.217F85D6FE2A467D.title: &2ZPM Machine Hulls
moni.quest.2181102841205407.description1: With the Advanced Crafting Table, you can now craft 5x5 recipes.
moni.quest.2181102841205407.description2: &9You can automate Extended Crafting recipes before you get PackagedAuto by converting your Extended Crafting tables into autocrafting tables.
moni.quest.2181102841205407.title: &9Advanced Crafting Table
moni.quest.21B16C005E9E3B0E.description1: &2The Large Chemical Reactor (LCR) is a multiblock Chemical Reactor with more input/output slots.&r
All &9Overclocks&r in the &3LCR&r are &6100% efficient&r; each overclock will &5quadruple the speed&r, as opposed to doubling it.
moni.quest.21B16C005E9E3B0E.description2: The &3LCR&r can also perform some exclusive reactions which allow you to combine multiple normal &3Chemical Reactor&r steps into a &6single step&r, such as:
moni.quest.21B16C005E9E3B0E.description8: The &3LCR&r also is required to perform some recipes, such as &aRaw Gasoline&r production, and &aPolybenzimidazole&r.
moni.quest.21B16C005E9E3B0E.description9: Any other recipe which could be done in a normal &9Chemical Reactor&r, as well as certain &9Mixer&r recipes, can also be done in an &3LCR&r.
moni.quest.21B16C005E9E3B0E.title: &2Large Chemical Reactor
moni.quest.21B917932F5B25BA.description1: You'll need a variety of &alenses&r for use in &3Precision Laser Engravers&r, all of which are made in the &2Lathe&r.
moni.quest.21B917932F5B25BA.description2: Initially you'll need a &a&3&2Ruby Lens&r. Soon you will need &2Diamond, Emerald, and Sapphire Lenses. &2You can choose to use an MV Lathe to get a lens from a plate, or sift for an Exquisite Gem and use an LV Lathe.
moni.quest.21B917932F5B25BA.title: &2Lenses
moni.quest.21E10888F52A3C73.description1: The &9Large Naquadah Reactor&r is an upgraded reactor that can generate immense amounts of EU energy from Naquadric Reactions. The fuels used in it are more complicated, but will generate massive amounts of power in return.
moni.quest.21E10888F52A3C73.title: &9Large Naquadah Reactor
moni.quest.2201391DEEBE79E4.description1: Provide your &3Simulation Chamber&r with RF power and &6Pulsating Prediction Matrixes&r. Then insert a &6Data Model&r of your choice. The Simulation Chamber will consume Prediction Matrixes and a decent amount of power to begin simulating mob kills. This will generate &6Overworldian Matter&r and may occasionally provide you with &6Mob Predictions&r.
moni.quest.2201391DEEBE79E4.description2: &6Overworldian Matter&r can be eaten to gain experience, or combined with other materials to obtain drops from Overworld mobs, as well as other forms of matter. With these drops and the other kinds of matter, you can then create Data Models for lots of other mob types!
moni.quest.2201391DEEBE79E4.title: &2Overworld&r Matter
moni.quest.22144A6785524FDF.rich_descrip: While the charger itself has extreme throughput, it is recommended to either create a
or keep the cores themselves in stock, as a single core requires 200 million RF to craft.
moni.quest.22144A6785524FDF.title: &9Sculk Core
moni.quest.227F448DFCC3E8C3.description2: &6Mana Dust&r is an important material. It is needed for a variety of materials related to &bThermal Expansion&r.
moni.quest.2280472741683581.description1: &oNote: this quest accepts a Power Unit of any voltage (LV, MV, HV, EV \& IV).&r
moni.quest.2280472741683581.description2: With &bGregTech &6Power Storage&r unlocked, you can make &aPower Units&r for electric GT tools.
moni.quest.2280472741683581.description3: Check if that tool has that tier first! &6Drills&r are available at all tiers, the &6Wrench&r is available at &7LV&r, &6HV&r and &1IV&r, and the other electric tools, such as &6Chainsaws&r and &6Screwdrivers&r are only available at &7LV&r.
moni.quest.2280472741683581.description4: &2A new addition among them is the Drill, which at LV tier can mine a 3x3x1 area of blocks, and at MV tier can mine a 3x3x3 area of blocks.
moni.quest.2280472741683581.description5: Higher tier drills can mine 5x5x5, 7x7x7 and 9x9x9 areas! Shift-right-click to change the breaking area.&r
moni.quest.2280472741683581.description6: Charge these with a &6Battery&r of appropriate tier, or in an appropriately tiered &3Machine&r, &3Battery Buffer&r or &3Turbo Charger&r.
moni.quest.2280472741683581.description7: You may want to look into &6Chainsaws&r for mass tree felling as well, or a &6Wrench&r for breaking machines very quickly. The other electric tools are probably not worth making.
moni.quest.2280472741683581.title: GregTech Electric Tools
moni.quest.228E46FDEBF7F389.title: 元素番号011番:ナトリウム
moni.quest.22B3F2351CB4B7D8.description1: Circuits along this line are EV, and can all be substituted in recipes.
moni.quest.22B3F2351CB4B7D8.description2: The pattern stays the same: the rightmost circuit comes in larger quantities and is overall easier to produce.
moni.quest.22B3F2351CB4B7D8.title: EV Circuits
moni.quest.22DC32C2B67EFD25.description1: These are quite expensive and two of them are required for each Tier Ten Micro Miner.
moni.quest.22DC32C2B67EFD25.description2: &6Neutronium Solar Panels&r generate an enormous amount of RF power in sunlight, so once you get your tank it's also a good choice for compact power generation.
moni.quest.22DC32C2B67EFD25.description3: &oProtip: it's always daytime in the Void dimension.&r
moni.quest.22DC32C2B67EFD25.subtitle: How much do you think these solar panels weigh?
moni.quest.22DC32C2B67EFD25.title: &9Neutronium Solar Panel
moni.quest.22E50A6923EBF5CB.description1: &6Neutronium&r is a hyper-dense material normally found in the hearts of neutron stars: the collapsed cores of stars between ten and thirty times the size of the Sun.
moni.quest.22E50A6923EBF5CB.description2: Fun fact: a single neutronium block is approximately 2884 million metric tons and somewhere around 600000K, yet you're somehow capable of holding one with your bare hands. Don't think about it too much.
moni.quest.22E50A6923EBF5CB.description3: Neutronium is obtained by fusing &9Liquid Naquadria&r with &9Liquid Americium&r, &2or from the Tier Eight Micro Miner.&r
moni.quest.22E50A6923EBF5CB.description4: You might consider using Tier Nine Micro Miners to supplement the fusion, as it is net-positive for Neutronium. These miners are expensive though, so it's up to you.
moni.quest.22E50A6923EBF5CB.title: &2Neutronium Ingot
moni.quest.2341171A4123D584.description1: This works like the pattern access terminal, but can also &9search for patterns&r, and &9highlight interfaces in world&r.
moni.quest.2341171A4123D584.title: &9Extended Pattern Access Terminal
moni.quest.2343B68110805282.description1: An amalgamation of gems that is needed for the final circuit tier.
moni.quest.235C1E5B2C58B5AF.description1: &6Hadal Shards&r are a component in &9Hadal Energy Cores&r and &9Hadal Warp Engines&r.
moni.quest.235C1E5B2C58B5AF.description2: They come exclusively from Tier Eight Micro Miners. You'll need the Tier Seven Micro Miner for the &6Lair of the Warden Data&r.
moni.quest.235C1E5B2C58B5AF.title: &9Hadal Shards
moni.quest.2396EF225839C65D.description1: Like other petroleum products, &9Sulfuric Gas&r &2or Natural Gas&r is hydrodesulfurized into &9Refinery Gas&r using &9Hydrogen&r in a &3Chemical Reactor&r.
moni.quest.2396EF225839C65D.description2: Refinery Gas can be cracked and further distilled for its constituents, but it is also useful as fuel for &3Gas Turbines&r. While it can be burned directly, centrifuging Refinery Gas produces &9LPG&r (Liquefied Petroleum Gas), which is an ideal fuel for Gas Turbines, and &9Methane&r which is a potential (suboptimal) turbine fuel but is also useful for various chemical reactions.
moni.quest.2396EF225839C65D.title: &2Refinery Gas
moni.quest.23A867EC14368388.description1: Glowing! &9But all the GTM machines glow already if Shimmer is installed, so...&r
moni.quest.23A867EC14368388.description2: This one takes a significant amount of time to cook, so make sure to have it going constantly.
moni.quest.23A867EC14368388.description3: Wires made from &6Lumium&r transmit IV power losslessly, and it forms part of the basis for &6LuV Machine Hulls&r.
moni.quest.23F3219BBE486D2E.description1: &9Ruined Machine Parts&r provide greater amounts of &9Holmium&r compared to &9Ruined Hull&r.
moni.quest.23F3219BBE486D2E.subtitle: Those parts look oddly familiar...
moni.quest.241FADD2C751BE74.description1: The ultimate item storage component in base &bApplied Energistics&r.
moni.quest.241FADD2C751BE74.description2: These have a massive capacity, hundreds of times that of a &61k ME Storage Component&r.
moni.quest.241FADD2C751BE74.subtitle: &9New to Monifactory!&r
moni.quest.241FADD2C751BE74.title: &9256k Item Storage
moni.quest.24415A26E5A0FD72.description1: Mix &9Oxygen&r and &9Dimethylhydrazine&r together to make &9Rocket Fuel&r.
moni.quest.244F2CC5484A7B21.description1: The &2Cleanroom&r is a hollow multiblock free of contaminants. Going forward, most new circuit-related recipes, as well as some unique things like &3Fusion Casings&r, will need to be run in machines inside a Cleanroom. This is another ported &5GT5u&r feature, but just like with &aMaintenance&r, it won't be nearly as harsh.
You will also need an &3Energy &rand &3Maintenance Hatch &rfor cleaning. &3Cleanroom Glass&r can replace any &3Plascrete&r, apart from the edges.
If you're facing issues forming the Cleanroom:
- The wall space must be at least 75% &3Plascrete&r or &3Cleanroom Glass&r. The floor block directly under the controller must also be &3Plascrete&r or &3Cleanroom Glass&r.
- GT generators and Muffler Hatches are &cnot allowed&r in Cleanrooms.
- Try rotating the controller with a wrench, or for even side lengths, try the other central positions.
moni.quest.244F2CC5484A7B21.description2: Once built, it must be well-maintained and powered for a while to clean the inside. The Cleanroom's power draw will decrease once it fully cleans itself. Recipes requiring the Cleanroom will &conly&r run when inside a &cfully-cleaned&r Cleanroom; if not, the recipe will not start, or recipe progress might be lost. (Recipe inputs will &enever be voided&r.)
moni.quest.244F2CC5484A7B21.description3: The Cleanroom can be built in any size between 5x5x5 and 15x15x15. The Controller is placed in the center of the top face, and the rest of the top face is built from &3Filter Casings&r, save for the edges and corners. The rest of the wall and floor space is filled with &3Plascrete&r.
moni.quest.244F2CC5484A7B21.description4: For transfer between the clean environment and the outside world:
moni.quest.244F2CC5484A7B21.description5: - Items and fluids through &3Passthrough Hatches&r. They automatically input from one side and output from the opposite side.
moni.quest.244F2CC5484A7B21.description6: - Energy through &bGregTech &3Hulls&r or &3Diodes&r (of any tier). Note that Diodes can transport up to &e16 amps&r, whilst Hulls can only transport &e1 amp&r.
moni.quest.244F2CC5484A7B21.description7: - Your AE network through &bGregTech&r &3Hulls&r (of any tier).
moni.quest.244F2CC5484A7B21.description8: - Players through &3Doors&r of any kind. The room remains clean when doors are opened.
moni.quest.244F2CC5484A7B21.description9: Apart from the "official" solutions, non-physical methods of transfer such as &3Ender Chests&r might be effective. &bApplied Energistics&r &3P2P Tunnels&r may also fit your liking.
moni.quest.244F2CC5484A7B21.title: &2Cleanroom
moni.quest.247F4985B9ACE568.description1: Even simple rockets demand &6Double Plates&r for their construction. In this case, made out of &6Steel&r.
moni.quest.248ABB7F26EB72EE.description1: &9Matter Circuits&r and those that follow it are far more expensive than previous circuit themes, requiring silicon chips imbued with &6Hearts of A Universe&r.
moni.quest.248ABB7F26EB72EE.description2: Don't let that discourage you, though. They unlock many useful tools to add to your factory.
moni.quest.248ABB7F26EB72EE.title: &9The Fourth And Final Tier Seven Circuits
moni.quest.24FC29C2D5E3A76E.title: 元素番号013番:アルミニウム
moni.quest.25B0271106684DF7.description1: &6TNT&r is an explosive made from &9Toluene&r, a distillation byproduct of &9Wood Tar&r or various &eSteam-Cracked Fuels&r. Besides its typical uses in Minecraft, it is a crafting ingredient you can use in the &3Implosion Compressor&r.
moni.quest.2607F8404B56773B.description1: The &bPhytogenic Insolator&r is a way to &9passively produce wood in the earlygame&r. While somewhat slow, it only requires &a10 rf/t&r to operate, meaning you can just set it down and not have to worry about it, and then come back to wood when you need some for crafting or steel production.
moni.quest.2607F8404B56773B.description2: Using &bHardened Integral Components&r in it will cause it to work 1.5x faster, while only requiring an extra &a5 rf/t&r to operate, and using &6Bonemeal&r or otherwise will boost how much wood you get per cycle.
moni.quest.2607F8404B56773B.description3: By the way, &bThermal&r Machines are capable of Automatic I/O, try placing a 2x2 drawer beside your &bPhytogenic Insolator&r and configuring it to both push to and pull from the side with the drawer.
moni.quest.2607F8404B56773B.subtitle: ...and crops as well, I guess.
moni.quest.2607F8404B56773B.title: &9Infinite Wood
moni.quest.261F7D50E23B0789.description1: The final step. Combine &6Pulsating Dust&r and &6Clay&r to make &6Pulsating Prediction Matrix&r.
moni.quest.261F7D50E23B0789.description2: Take note that a &3&3Chemical Reactor&r making &6Resonant Clathrate&r will supply 1 &3Alloy Smelter&r of the same tier, and that one &bMV &3Alloy Smelter&r making &6Pulsating Prediction Matrix&r supports 10.03 &3Simulation Chambers&r, with each higher tier doubling the amount of &3Simulation Chambers&r it supports.
moni.quest.261F7D50E23B0789.subtitle: &oThis step requires an Alloy Smelter at voltage &lLV&r&o or higher.&r
moni.quest.26380A0FD7A8688C.title: 元素番号079番: Gold
moni.quest.2664406B3CD20703.description1: Split your &6Clay Dust&r to make &6Sodium Dust&r, &6Silicon Dust&r, &6Lithium Dust&r, and &6Aluminium Dust&r.&r This is extremely important to passive, as you will need a lot of these resources, and this is the best way to get them.
moni.quest.2664406B3CD20703.subtitle: &oThis step requires a Electrolyzer at voltage &lMV&r&o or higher.&r
moni.quest.2664406B3CD20703.title: Sodium, Silicon, Lithium and Aluminium
moni.quest.26C9F1514FD08C81.description1: Placing these in one of your &6ME Drives&r will provide your ME network with an &ainfinite&r amount of water or cobblestone. Use &6Interfaces&r or &6Export Buses&r to provide said substances to wherever you need it.
moni.quest.26C9F1514FD08C81.subtitle: It doesn't get any faster than this.
moni.quest.26C9F1514FD08C81.title: &9Infinitest Water and Stone
moni.quest.26CA20E74A62FA6E.description1: With &6Enderium&r, you can assemble a &6Crystal Processor Supercomputer&r.
moni.quest.26CA20E74A62FA6E.title: &2The Second Tier Seven Circuits
moni.quest.26ECEC06CCAB3E56.description2: These can be made into circuit boards as a substrate for advanced circuits.
moni.quest.26ECEC06CCAB3E56.title: Epoxy
moni.quest.271B184131614D97.title: 元素番号036番:クリプトン
moni.quest.273F3F8DD6A3DCC5.description1: If you can't find one otherwise, &6Ender Pearls&r can be crafted using Pulsating Dust and a &6Diamond&r in an &3Alloy Smelter&r.
moni.quest.273F3F8DD6A3DCC5.subtitle: A mysterious alloy, made from &6Pulsating Dust&r and &6Iron&r.
moni.quest.273F3F8DD6A3DCC5.title: Pulsating Iron and Ender Pearls
moni.quest.27692C4A58F1A183.description1: Again, combining a few Components will make a Catalyst.
moni.quest.27A80F018F59EF1E.description2: This one takes a significant amount of time to cook, so make sure to have it going constantly.
moni.quest.27A80F018F59EF1E.description3: &6Signalum&r is noteworthy as the long-awaited next tier upgrade for your &bThermal Expansion&r machines and dynamos following "Reinforced" back in MV.
moni.quest.27A80F018F59EF1E.title: Signalum
moni.quest.27B3EB82ED638620.description1: &2Double Plates&r required for the next two tiers of Micro Miners.
moni.quest.27B3EB82ED638620.title: &2Signalum Double Plates
moni.quest.27CE1D6B9683755F.description1: Note: this quest accepts LV/MV/HV Centrifuge.
moni.quest.27CE1D6B9683755F.description2: Centrifuging air is a reliable way to get &9Nitrogen&r before you have access to &3Cryogenic Distillation&r.
moni.quest.27CE1D6B9683755F.title: Air Centrifuging
moni.quest.27EBB5AAF8A40F3D.description1: You have become Death, destroyer of Universes.
moni.quest.27EBB5AAF8A40F3D.description2: It might probably be obvious, but this miner is your sole source of &6Hearts Of A Universe&r.
moni.quest.27EBB5AAF8A40F3D.description3: It also can be used later to obtain &6Creative Storage Data&r and &6Creative Computation Data&r, and is used to obtain &9Contained Singularities&r for &6Monic Circuits&r.
moni.quest.27EBB5AAF8A40F3D.title: &9Tier Ten Micro Miner
moni.quest.27FAD6A8FCFAB543.description1: These are easier to mass produce than &6Electronic Circuits&r, and they're required to produce the &6Advanced Integrated Circuit&r, your first &6HV&r circuit.
moni.quest.27FAD6A8FCFAB543.description2: Otherwise, they fulfill the same requirements.
moni.quest.27FAD6A8FCFAB543.title: &2The Second Tier One Circuits
moni.quest.281C7940CD437B69.description1: With your Rocket built and fuel loaded, it's time for the prelaunch checklist.
moni.quest.281C7940CD437B69.description2: - &eMake sure you're wearing your Space Suit&r (all four pieces) and that it has a full tank of Oxygen.
moni.quest.281C7940CD437B69.description3: - Two &aWaystones&r, with one set up to bring you back home.
moni.quest.281C7940CD437B69.description4: When you're sure you're prepared, sit in your rocket and press &eSpace&r.
moni.quest.281C7940CD437B69.subtitle: Let me play among the stars
moni.quest.281C7940CD437B69.title: &9Fly Me To The Moon
moni.quest.2823D7B4C8F900CA.description1: &6Stainless Steel&r will be your primary material for HV, in the same way that &6Aluminium&r was for MV and &2Steel&r was for LV.
moni.quest.2823D7B4C8F900CA.description2: &6Manganese&r comes from electrolyzing &6Tantalite&r, &6Pyrolusite&r, or &6Spessartine Dusts&r. You already have &6Chrome&r.
moni.quest.2823D7B4C8F900CA.description3: Mix up a bunch of the dust in a MV &3Mixer&r and begin processing it through the &3Electric Blast Furnace&r. This may be a good time to reevaluate your power generation and storage infrastructure.
moni.quest.2823D7B4C8F900CA.description4: You will need HV power to smelt this, which you can achieve with 2 MV Energy Hatches.
moni.quest.2823D7B4C8F900CA.title: Stainless Steel
moni.quest.28263004814F0F64.description1: &6Nichrome&r is the third coil material available, increasing your EBF's operating temperature to 3600K so it can process more advanced materials.
moni.quest.28263004814F0F64.description2: Note that an &6HV&r &3Assembler&r is required to make them. &cEach tier of coil requires their tier of Assembler&r - we won't remind you again.
moni.quest.28263004814F0F64.description3: &93600K&r is now also hot enough to grant a single &9100% efficient overclock&r to 1800K and below recipes. This means that one overclock will grant &94x speed&r instead of the normal &92x&r. In effect, you will get an additional 2x speed boost by overclocking once.
moni.quest.28263004814F0F64.description4: This means that the gas-boosted recipe for &6Aluminium&r will get cut from about &e7s&r to &e3s&r at HV. Once you upgrade your EBF to EV power, &6Stainless Steel Ingots&r will get cut from about &e37s&r to &e9s&r! It's well worth upgrading the EBFs producing these materials to &6Nichrome&r once you can afford it.
moni.quest.28263004814F0F64.description5: Later coils will give similar bonuses. Additionally, the EBF's temperature will increase by &9100K&r for each voltage tier above MV, which could make a difference for future materials.
moni.quest.28263004814F0F64.title: &2Nichrome Coil Blocks
moni.quest.2836DDEE49C3CCFB.description1: &2Upgraded forms of the EBF and Vacuum Freezer.&r
moni.quest.2836DDEE49C3CCFB.description2: Accepts any &6Parallel Control Hatch&r, parallelizing up to &e4096x&r with the best hatch!
moni.quest.2836DDEE49C3CCFB.description3: The &aRotary Hearth Furnace&r is quite big!
moni.quest.2836DDEE49C3CCFB.title: &2Upgraded EBF and Freezer
moni.quest.2845151447537433.description1: Expandable multi-block storage for RF power.
moni.quest.2845151447537433.description2: This first tier isn't much, but you can upgrade them over time to hold substantial amounts of power.
moni.quest.2859B3747ACF856C.title: 元素番号031番:ガリウム
moni.quest.2861BA7C235C52A3.description1: &eSuperconductor wires won't kill you when touched now. In fact, you have to use Wires for Superconductors, because they don't even have cables!

&2There are an additional set of superconductors, one for each tier, which are the CEu default superconductors. Their advantage is their higher amperage rating, reaching the hundreds of amps for higher tier 16x wires. They are also used in crafting Field Generators. They are:
moni.quest.2861BA7C235C52A3.description2: &bEnder IO&r and &bThermal&r alloys are a bit more expensive than the normal wires, but they come with the huge advantage of being &2superconductors&r. Lossy cables like &6Tin&r and &6Copper&r will bleed out energy for every block they travel, but &2superconductors&r do not.
LuV - Indium Tin Barium Titanium Cuprate
UV - Enriched Naquadah Trinium Europium Duranide
moni.quest.2861BA7C235C52A3.description3: The &2cheap superconductors&r for each tier are:
moni.quest.2861BA7C235C52A3.title: &2Lossless Cables
moni.quest.28854E7AC91786E9.description2: You're not getting up to Resonant for a long time, just FYI.
moni.quest.28CA4E5308EC0BB9.description1: &6Naquadah&r is the sixth coil material available, increasing your EBF's operating temperature to 7200K so it can process more advanced materials.
moni.quest.28CA4E5308EC0BB9.description2: &2You cannot skip a coil material anymore.
moni.quest.28CA4E5308EC0BB9.title: Naquadah Coil Blocks
moni.quest.28FE832435EAEE16.title: 元素番号077番: Iridium
moni.quest.2923E98849358E16.description1: The &aAngel Ring&r is actually slower than a jetpack, but it grants creative flight and requires no fuel.
moni.quest.2923E98849358E16.description2: Up to you if you want to use it over a jetpack for day-to-day stuff, but it's an ingredient in each of the Jetplates so if you want either of them you'll need to make one eventually.
moni.quest.2923E98849358E16.subtitle: I'm running out of MCU puns.
moni.quest.2923E98849358E16.title: &9Captain... Marvel? IDK
moni.quest.293A7F5F0A58E5F3.title: 元素番号017番:塩素
moni.quest.295E3D32083676E6.description1: &3Inscribers&r are machines used to make &6inscribed circuits&r for &bApplied Energistics&r.
moni.quest.295E3D32083676E6.description2: &9Inscribers can be set to automatically export items, can hold up to a stack of items within, as well as a variety of other features to aid in automation.
moni.quest.295E3D32083676E6.subtitle: Angry light forcing rocks to think
moni.quest.295E3D32083676E6.title: &9Inscribing
moni.quest.2968DF8A3A0EBF89.description1: Break up your &6Cobblestone&r into &6Gravel&r. Pretty much just another step of the &eCobbleworks&r, although it is used in &6Conduit Binders&r.
moni.quest.2968DF8A3A0EBF89.subtitle: &oThis step requires a Forge Hammer at voltage &lLV&r&o or higher.&r
moni.quest.2977E1AF13E42DCB.description1: &2A bit of Vanadiumsteel is used for progression. It's also a very strong tool material.
moni.quest.2977E1AF13E42DCB.title: &2Vanadiumsteel
moni.quest.297B523B6C503957.description1: &rThe &3Steam Dynamos&r&r&r you have made are generating &aRF power&r, but &bGregTech&r machines require &aEU power&r. With your first &6circuit&r in hand, you are ready to build a &eLow Voltage (LV) &3&2Energy Converter&r.
With your first &6circuits&r in hand, you are ready to build a &eLow Voltage (LV) &3&2Turbine&r.
moni.quest.297B523B6C503957.description2: The &2Energy Converter&r is a special device that &econverts &2between &aRF power&r and &aEU power&r. They come in &2four sizes: 1A, 4A, 8A, and 16A.
Wires and cables are able to convert &aEU&r into &aRF&r at a &e1 to 4 ratio&r.
moni.quest.297B523B6C503957.description3: &aRF&r converts into &aEU&r at a &e4 to 1 ratio&r. &a100 RF&r becomes &a25 EU&r, and vice-versa. &2Use a Soft Hammer to change the conversion direction.
Machines that produce or consume EU will &cexplode&r if left out in the rain, so do be warned.
moni.quest.297B523B6C503957.description4: &eNote that you need an RF buffer to output into when you convert EU->RF!&r
moni.quest.297B523B6C503957.subtitle: Green = Input, Red = Output
moni.quest.297B523B6C503957.title: LV Power
moni.quest.29A487F0BC43AAF9.description1: &3Alloy Smelters&r are used to create alloys by melting and reforming items together.
moni.quest.29A487F0BC43AAF9.description2: Now you won't need to grind up metals into dusts and mix them for alloy dusts! Plus, many of the more complex alloys you couldn't make that way are now possible.
moni.quest.29A487F0BC43AAF9.title: Alloy Smelter
moni.quest.2A511DB40C66CF35.description1: This pack is in &eBeta&r. Issues are to be expected at this stage of development.
moni.quest.2A511DB40C66CF35.description3: Do note that a decent number of mods in this pack are also in alpha or beta as well, so before reporting an issue, make sure that the issue can not be replicated with the mod on its own, and if it can, report it to the mod's repository instead.
moni.quest.2A511DB40C66CF35.rich_descrip: If you find something broken/missing/etc, make an issue on the
, or submit a Pull Request to fix it yourself.
moni.quest.2A511DB40C66CF35.subtitle: Bleeding Edge!
moni.quest.2A511DB40C66CF35.title: &9This pack is in beta!
moni.quest.2A6E9E7C80754936.description1: With a &3Fusion Reactor&r, you can make Europium!
moni.quest.2A6E9E7C80754936.description2: This 元素番号is 番needed for making &9Sculk-related items&r, as well as the &6Fusion Reactor Computer MK II&r, &2Crystal Chip growing&r, and &6Wetware Supercomputers&r.
moni.quest.2A6E9E7C80754936.description3: You make it by fusing molten &9Neodymium&r and &9Hydrogen&r.
moni.quest.2A6E9E7C80754936.title: &2Europium Ingot
moni.quest.2A84013C14085C7B.description1: The &3Lathe&r is an important machine that makes &6Rods&r less expensive to craft. One ingot will yield two rods, doubling your output compared to manually crafting it.
moni.quest.2A84013C14085C7B.description2: In addition to this, it can also be used to craft &6Screws&r and &6Buzzsaw Blades&r.
moni.quest.2A84013C14085C7B.description3: You will need it later on to craft &6Lenses&r.
moni.quest.2A84013C14085C7B.title: Lathe
moni.quest.2AC61192BCD459F2.description1: &2Two Integrated Circuits&r and various other components will create a &2Good Integrated Circuit.
moni.quest.2AC61192BCD459F2.title: &2The Second Tier Two Circuits
moni.quest.2B336FD89B15F98E.description1: &2Rhodium Plated Lumium-Palladium is a mixture of Rhodium, Lumium and Palladium. It forms the basis of LuV Machine Hulls.
moni.quest.2B336FD89B15F98E.title: &2Rhodium Plated Lumium-Palladium
moni.quest.2B4F44E19AA7A1B6.description1: Smelt your &6Resonant Clathrate&r into &6Pulsating Dust&r. If you're using a &3Furnace&r to smelt it, it's more efficient to use the upgraded &3Furnaces&r, such as &3Iron Furnaces&r. You can fuel them with &6Sugar Cane&r. You might want to keep it as an &3Electric Furnace&r, depending on your circumstances.
moni.quest.2B4F44E19AA7A1B6.subtitle: &oThis step requires a Furnace.
moni.quest.2B7DEF68BB674CC6.title: 元素番号039番:イットリウム
moni.quest.2BBAF93506DD79C1.description1: The &3Active Transformer&r is a device which can convert any number and type of &9GT Energy Inputs&r into any number and type of &9GT Energy Outputs&r. That includes &664A Substation Hatches&r, as well as &aLaser Hatches&r - refer to the nearby quests for more details on those.
moni.quest.2BBAF93506DD79C1.description2: With &9RF Cards&r and &3Energy Converters&r in this pack, this probably has limited use, but you can build it if you want.
moni.quest.2BBAF93506DD79C1.title: &2Active Transformer
moni.quest.2BD54071AD23C73C.description1: Making yourself a space suit is the most important step towards your space adventures.
moni.quest.2BD54071AD23C73C.description2: This suit lets you breathe in space, which is kind of important.
moni.quest.2BD54071AD23C73C.description3: If you wish, you can hide the spacesuit from your playermodel via the cosmetic armor buttons.
moni.quest.2BD54071AD23C73C.title: &9Space Suit
moni.quest.2C3C6D2038B01948.description1: The &3Multi Smelter&r is an absolute smelting unit, and is most likely the best furnace &9and alloy smelter&r added by a mod.
moni.quest.2C3C6D2038B01948.description2: It's a 3x3x3 multiblock machine capable of &esmelting huge amounts of items per second&r. By upgrading its coils and power tier, it can become capable of smelting up to literal thousands of items per second.
moni.quest.2C3C6D2038B01948.description3: Shift and hover over different coil blocks: they tell you the number of items a Multi Smelter can smelt per operation: &e32 items per level&r. The most basic Multi Smelter essentially does 32 items in the same time as a furnace does one. With a set of &9RTM Alloy&r coil blocks, that jumps to 128 items per operation.
moni.quest.2C3C6D2038B01948.description4: This quest doesn't ask for coils, hatches or buses: feel free to choose whatever combination you want. You'll need &a8 coil blocks&r, &a1 input bus&r, &a1 output bus&r, and &21 maintenance hatch&r, &21 muffler hatch&r, and at least &a1 energy hatch&r, all of any tier.
moni.quest.2C3C6D2038B01948.description5: &9The Multi Smelter can have its mode swapped between Electric Furnace and Alloy Smelter recipes by pressing the robot arm button in its GUI&r. Some other multiblocks use this mechanic as well.
moni.quest.2C3C6D2038B01948.title: &9Multi Smelter
moni.quest.2C6BEB5BBE5A91DC.description1: &2With the MV Assembling Machine, you can assemble a few necessary parts for the next Circuit tier.
moni.quest.2C6BEB5BBE5A91DC.title: &2MV Assembling Machine
moni.quest.2CC50101A39EA2C0.description1: &2High-Octane Gasoline is a even more powerful combustion fuel, generating 3200 EU per mB of fuel. It can also be used in Cryolobus production, using 75% less fuel than Cetane-Boosted Diesel or normal Gasoline. The trade-off is the very complex processing lines you must set up for it.
moni.quest.2CC50101A39EA2C0.description2: To refine Gasoline to High-Octane Gasoline, you will need:
moni.quest.2CC50101A39EA2C0.description8: To get the most out of this, run it in an Extreme Combustion Engine with Liquid Oxygen.
moni.quest.2CC50101A39EA2C0.title: &2High-Octane Gasoline
moni.quest.2D0DF78F71760F00.description1: Some Micro Miner missions use a &6Gemstone Sensor&r to scout out gems instead of ores.
moni.quest.2D0DF78F71760F00.title: &9Gemstone Sensors
moni.quest.2D10F2E538486624.description1: The &3Fusion Reactor&r is a multiblock that uses enormous amounts of energy to fuse fluids into new elements. This one is less flexible than the previous GregTech multiblocks, as you can only put hatches where the preview shows. &6Sneak-right click&r the controller to enable the in-world preview.
moni.quest.2D10F2E538486624.description2: The &bEMI&r preview shows &eall valid hatch locations&r, but you don't actually need that many fluid hatches. You can replace any of the hatch positions in the structure with &2Fusion Machine Casings&r as long as you have at least &atwo Fluid Input Hatches&r and &aone Fluid Output Hatch&r. It's possible to use input/output hatches in every valid location, if you prefer.
moni.quest.2D10F2E538486624.description3: Because of this, the quest only asks for &248 Fusion Machine Casings&r. If you want to use the minimum number of fluid hatches, you'll need to craft an additional &229 Fusion Machine Casings&r. In addition to the &a48 Fusion Machine Casings&r, you will also need &631 Fusion Glass&r or &631 Fusion Machine Casings&r. &bFusion Glass is cheaper, and looks cooler&r, but it's your choice.
moni.quest.2D10F2E538486624.description4: Each &aEnergy Hatch&r increases the reactor's power buffer. &cYou cannot use 4x or 16x Energy Hatches in Fusion Reactors. &aAll 16 Energy Hatches&r are required to be able to process all Mark 1 recipes and give a power buffer of &e160M EU&r. &2However, not all energy hatches need to be connected to power. For example, a recipe that requires LuV power draw would only need one or more hatches connected to power, but a recipe that needs ZPM power draw would need at least two hatches connected to power.&r &cThey still need to be present on the structure!&r
moni.quest.2D10F2E538486624.description5: In addition to the recipe power drain, Fusion Reactors have a &eheat&r mechanic related to the recipe's &e"EU To Start"&r. This amount of power is drained from the reactor's buffer before starting the recipe to heat up the reactor to the necessary temperature, and is independent of the recipe's EU/t cost. As such, this determines the minimum tier of reactor you need for a recipe.
moni.quest.2D10F2E538486624.description6: If the reactor stops processing, it will &erapidly lose heat&r, even if you pause it with a soft hammer. On the other hand, if the reactor is already at the required temperature for a recipe, &eno additional power&r is required to heat up the reactor! This is true even if you switch between different recipes. This mechanic incentivizes continuous use of the reactor.
moni.quest.2D10F2E538486624.description7: If you switch to a recipe that requires more heat, &eonly the difference&r in heat values is consumed as EU to reach the target heat (up to a maximum heat equal to the reactor's current buffer).
moni.quest.2D10F2E538486624.description8: Fusion Reactors &2overclock, but only once per fusion tier, instead of based on energy input.&r They gate the next tier of materials, so you will eventually want to make more than one.
moni.quest.2D10F2E538486624.subtitle: Time to get fusing!
moni.quest.2D10F2E538486624.title: &2Fusion Reactor MK I
moni.quest.2D31856F6EF1ED69.description1: Now that you have everything you need to power your machines, it's time to put it all together.
moni.quest.2D31856F6EF1ED69.description2: Your Steam Dynamo needs burnable fuel (like &6Coal&r) and &9water&r. It will output RF power through the Excitation Coil (the red bit at the top). The orientation of the Steam Dynamo can be adjusted with a &aCrescent Hammer&r if needed.

Your &6Steam Turbine&r needs &9Steam&r from your boilers. It will output EU power through the side with the dot. The orientation can be adjusted by (Shift + Right-clicking(r with a &aWrench&r, if needed.

Your Steam Dynamo needs burnable fuel (like &6Coal&r) and &9water&r. It will output RF power through the Excitation Coil (the red bit at the top). The orientation of the Steam Dynamo can be adjusted with a &aCrescent Hammer&r, if needed.
moni.quest.2D31856F6EF1ED69.description3: &6Energy cards&r can be used to transfer that RF power, but the dynamo can also output RF directly into an Energy Converter by making the Excitation Coil touch the Energy Converter.
Now all you need are some &bGregTech&r machines to power up! You can make whatever you want, but its recommended that you get these two first:
moni.quest.2D31856F6EF1ED69.description4: The Energy Converter transforms RF power into EU, outputting the resulting EU through the side with a red dot. The orientation can be adjusted using a &aWrench&r. Attach your &6Conductive Iron Wires&r to the output side of the Energy Converter.
The &6Wiremill&r will make crafting wires much, much easier.
moni.quest.2D31856F6EF1ED69.description5: Now all you need are some &bGregTech&r machines to power up! You can make whatever you want, but its recommended that you get these two first:
The &2Bender&r will make Plates from one ingot instead of two.
moni.quest.2D31856F6EF1ED69.description6: The &6Wiremill&r will make crafting wires much, much easier.
moni.quest.2D31856F6EF1ED69.description7: The &2Bender&r will make Plates from one ingot instead of two.
moni.quest.2D31856F6EF1ED69.title: Putting it all Together
moni.quest.2D47BFA44BDB5E6A.description2: &9This Micro Miner also brings back Dragon Eggs and Ender Dragon Scales, as well as Neutronium, depending on the mission&r.
moni.quest.2D47BFA44BDB5E6A.title: &9Tier Eight Micro Miner
moni.quest.2D5677EA9F47AA83.description1: A &9Multidimentional CPU Wafer&r needs to be enhanced and cut before it is usable in circuit recipes.
moni.quest.2D5677EA9F47AA83.description2: It may be worth setting up a line for these. They'll be seeing frequent use from here on out.
moni.quest.2D5677EA9F47AA83.subtitle: Technically, all CPU Chips are multidimensional.
moni.quest.2D788BE1CA9A2D69.description1: This 元素番号exi番sts but is not needed for the Mote of Omnium.
moni.quest.2D788BE1CA9A2D69.title: Nothing
moni.quest.2D9A95AC50BCB988.description1: The &9Stablized Microminers&r are a major milestone! These allow for you to reuse microminers, allowing you to refactor your base a bit.
moni.quest.2D9A95AC50BCB988.subtitle: Now this is not the end.\nIt is not even the beginning of the end.\nBut it is, perhaps, the end of the beginning.
moni.quest.2D9A95AC50BCB988.title: &9Stablized Microminers
moni.quest.2D9A95AC50CCB988.description1: The &9Creative Tank&r is a major milestone. Great work!
moni.quest.2D9A95AC50CCB988.description2: This tank is your first proper creative item, which can be set to a fluid and then provides an infinite quantity of that fluid.
moni.quest.2D9A95AC50CCB988.description3: While your first instinct would be to set up massive rows of fluid solidifers and calling it a day, instead, try using these powerful tanks to passively produce items and materials that were previously complex chains.
moni.quest.2D9A95AC50CCB988.description4: &2The GT Creative Tank has been enhanced. You can turn it on and off, configure exactly how much fluid you want it to push and how often, and change which direction the fluid is pushed out. You can even configure the fluid you want directly from EMI!&r
moni.quest.2D9A95AC50CCB988.description5: All that said, &ethe pack will still be challenging to complete&r. Infinite resources and power is nice, but it's not everything. There are plenty of materials you can't melt, and creative items will push your factory automation engineering skills to their limits.
moni.quest.2D9A95AC50CCB988.subtitle: Now this is not the end.\nIt is not even the beginning of the end.\nBut it is, perhaps, the end of the beginning.
moni.quest.2D9A95AC50CCB988.title: &9Creative Tank
moni.quest.2DCD08F30EC049D1.description1: Note: this quest accepts LV/MV/HV/EV &3Gas Collectors&r.
moni.quest.2DCD08F30EC049D1.description2: A &3Gas Collector&r will suck up air at a decent rate, provided the top side is unobstructed. The collected Air is automatically ejected into an adjacent tank via the output face.
moni.quest.2DCD08F30EC049D1.description3: &2Gas Collectors in the Nether and End will collect Nether Air and Ender Air respectively, which yield different products. Make sure you set the correct circuit configuration for the dimension you are in.&r
moni.quest.2DCD08F30EC049D1.description4: IV+ air collectors are not part of this quest, but for reference they exist and are called &3Atmosphere Collectors&r.
moni.quest.2DCD08F30EC049D1.title: &2Basic Air Collection
moni.quest.2DD1E2391DA3170C.description1: Upgrading to the &6Nano Supercomputer&r requires some standard circuit components, but also some &6Lumium Wire&r and &2Fine Tungstensteel Wire.
moni.quest.2DD1E2391DA3170C.title: The Second Tier Five Circuits
moni.quest.2DDD4B4EC8065980.description2: &2Higher tier GT Batteries have been buffed to be quite strong - this one holds 25 MEU, or 100 MRF. You may want to consider using them over RF storage.
moni.quest.2DDD4B4EC8065980.title: &2EV Power Storage
moni.quest.2E079747A46D48CF.description1: This handy terminal allows you to see the pattern slots of all &aME Pattern Providers&r in your network in one place.
moni.quest.2E079747A46D48CF.description2: This means you don't have to run to your ME Pattern Providers each time you make a new pattern for them.
moni.quest.2E079747A46D48CF.title: Pattern Access Terminal
moni.quest.2E6BA621B265C3A8.description1: By baking a &2Raw Crystal Chip &rand &6Emerald&r or &6Olivine Plates&r with &9Helium&r in an &3Electric Blast Furnace&r, you can create an &6Engraved Crystal Chip&r.
moni.quest.2E6BA621B265C3A8.description2: This is a material needed for &6Crystal Circuits&r.
moni.quest.2E6BA621B265C3A8.title: &2Engraved Crystal Chip
moni.quest.2E87146C82EF941C.description1: &2Tritanium Coils are the eighth coil material. At 10800K, it's capable of smelting nearly every material.
moni.quest.2E87146C82EF941C.title: &2Tritanium Coils
moni.quest.2E8BFA2E719B1C47.description1: &c&rOres in &9Monifactory&f exist in large clusters, or '&eveins&f'. These veins are scattered around the world, and are relatively common. &2The upgraded HV Electric Prospector's Scanner you were given will tell you the types of ores you can find within a 7x7 chunk area! &9You can also click on a ore vein to mark it on your map!
&c&rOres in &9Monifactory&f exist in large clusters, or '&eveins&f'. These veins are scattered around the world, and are relatively common.
moni.quest.2E8BFA2E719B1C47.description2: In order to proceed, you'll need to locate a source of &6Iron&f. You have a few options. &6Magnetite&f veins are higher up and contain large amounts of iron, as well as some &6Vanadium&f and &6Gold&f. Another good source of iron is &9Goethite&f veins, which contain several types of iron. Finally, &6Pyrite&f can be found paired with &6Copper&f in several types of veins.
moni.quest.2E8BFA2E719B1C47.description3: While the Prospector requires energy to work, you are unlikely to deplete its battery. That said, the quest book will later guide you towards making &2an HV Battery&r to charge &aHV tools &rin your inventory.

While the Scanner requires energy to work, you are unlikely to deplete its battery. That said, the quest book will later guide you towards making &2an HV Battery&r to charge &aHV tools &rin your inventory.
moni.quest.2E8BFA2E719B1C47.description4: In order to proceed, you'll need to locate a source of &6Iron&f. You have a few options. &6Magnetite&f veins are higher up and contain large amounts of iron, as well as some &6Vanadium&f and &6Gold&f. Another good source of iron is &9Goethite&f veins, which contain several types of iron. Finally, &6Pyrite&f can be found paired with &6Copper&f in several types of veins.
moni.quest.2E8BFA2E719B1C47.description5: &6Wrought Iron&f is obtained simply by &esmelting Iron a second time&f. It has more durability than Iron, so it is better for making tools, but &cdo not convert your entire Iron supply over to Wrought Iron&f. The two materials are not interchangeable and you'll need Iron or Wrought Iron as demanded by various recipes.

&6Wrought Iron&f is obtained simply by &esmelting Iron Nuggets a second time&f. It has more durability than Iron, so it is better for making tools, but &cdo not convert your entire Iron supply over to Wrought Iron&f. The two materials are not interchangeable and you'll need Iron or Wrought Iron as demanded by various recipes.
moni.quest.2E8BFA2E719B1C47.subtitle: ULV Beginnings
moni.quest.2E8BFA2E719B1C47.title: Iron Supply
moni.quest.2EBB9A154522348F.subtitle: A winner is you
moni.quest.2EBB9A154522348F.title: &9&lCreative Chest&r
moni.quest.2EC4EF1BEEA578F3.subtitle: unlocks hm only quests
moni.quest.2EC4EF1BEEA578F3.title: &eHard Mode
moni.quest.2EFC9DDA09527638.description1: &2You only need this step if you are using normal Chemical Reactors. If you are using LCRs, the Allyl Chloride step is skipped.
moni.quest.2EFC9DDA09527638.description2: &9Allyl Chloride&r provides an alternative means of producing &9Epichlorohydrin&r for &9Epoxy&r.
moni.quest.2EFC9DDA09527638.description3: Reacting &9Chlorine&r and &9Propene&r will produce Allyl Chloride. Propene is distilled in a &3Distillation Tower&r from any one of various cracked petroleum products like &9Steam-Cracked Naphtha&r.
moni.quest.2EFC9DDA09527638.title: Allyl Chloride
moni.quest.2F04FA8D3E15E375.description1: &2Fluid Rigs will harvest fluids from underground fluid veins. Note that the fluid veins are simply simulated and don't exist in the world. &r
moni.quest.2F04FA8D3E15E375.description2: Shift-right-click while holding the &3Prospector's Scanner&r to set it to fluid mode, then right click it in order to see the type and amount of fluid underground and to check the depletion state of the vein. The first number represents the base amount of fluid extracted per second. You can also check the &eFluid Vein Information EMI&r page for information on where they spawn.
moni.quest.2F04FA8D3E15E375.description3: In the &eOverworld&r, it can harvest: &9Oil, Light Oil, Heavy Oil, Raw Oil, Natural Gas
moni.quest.2F04FA8D3E15E375.description8: As Fluid Rigs work, they will deplete the vein under them, reducing their yields. When a vein is depleted, it still yields a small amount of its fluid. The first tier of Fluid Rig takes &9100,000 operations&r to deplete a vein. Higher tier Fluid Rigs harvest fluids far faster and deplete veins slower.
moni.quest.2F04FA8D3E15E375.title: &2Fluid Rig
moni.quest.2F6EC962007FA9FB.description1: &9Sterilized Growth Medium&r is needed for &6Wetware Circuits&r.
moni.quest.2F6EC962007FA9FB.description2: You'll need to mix &6Mincemeat&r, &2Calcium, Salt, Agar, and Mutagen&r in a mixer to make &9Raw Growth Medium&r, then use a &3Fluid Heater&r to sterilize it. &2This is a significantly more involved process than before.&r
moni.quest.2F6EC962007FA9FB.description3: Mincemeat comes from pulverizing any kind of animal meat.
moni.quest.2F6EC962007FA9FB.description4: A &aFisher&r might be useful for this endeavor - especially &bThermal's&r &6Aquatic Entangler&r which can operate passively, produces only &6Fishes&r, and &eaccepts augments&r.
moni.quest.2F6EC962007FA9FB.description5: &2Agar is produced from Mincemeat through multiple steps.
moni.quest.2F6EC962007FA9FB.title: &2Sterilized Growth Medium
moni.quest.2FA9404468E4BBD9.description1: The &6Battery Buffer&r is a machine which can hold &6Batteries&r for energy storage. Each Battery accepts up to 2 amps and outputs up to 1 amp.
moni.quest.2FA9404468E4BBD9.title: Charging Batteries
moni.quest.2FD1AE24CD8BEBEB.description1: &2You can start to churn out Microprocessors&r. These are the best kind of Tier One circuits you can make, and you won't unlock the better recipes for them until &5EV&r.
moni.quest.2FD1AE24CD8BEBEB.description2: You should absolutely automate the production of these circuits, and &ekeep a stockpile automatically crafted&r so you don't have to wait around for them or bloat your crafting orders making them on-demand through AE.
moni.quest.2FD1AE24CD8BEBEB.title: &2The Third And Final Tier One Circuits
moni.quest.2FFEE746B0ECA2D8.description1: &6Sodium Hydroxide&r is a strong base, and an ingredient in &9Bio Diesel&r, among other reactions.
moni.quest.2FFEE746B0ECA2D8.description2: &2The only source&r is splitting &9Salt Water&r in an &3Electrolyzer&r - this is also a good source of &9Chlorine&r. You can get &9Salt Water&r from mixing &6Salt&r and &9Water&r (duh), &2dissolving Ghast Tears, or drilling it from Salt Water fluid veins, which only spawn over oceans.
moni.quest.3000798ACA51BFDC.description1: &3Vacuum Freezers&r are primarily used to cool down hot ingots.
moni.quest.3000798ACA51BFDC.description2: They're also capable of freezing air into a liquid, and making superconductors.
moni.quest.3000798ACA51BFDC.description3: At minimum you will need an energy input hatch, an input bus, an output bus, a maintenance hatch, and 21 &6Frost Proof Machine Casings&r for forming the multiblock for processing Hot Ingots.
moni.quest.3000798ACA51BFDC.description4: If you want to deal with fluids as well, subtract two casings and use a fluid input and fluid output in their place.
moni.quest.3000798ACA51BFDC.description5: Besides the controller placement, as usual the hatches/buses can go anywhere. Use the building guide in &bEMI&r which can be pulled up from the controller block.
moni.quest.3039269E43788431.description1: &6Steel &2Double Plates&r can be augmented with &6Tungsten Plates&r and &6Tough Alloy&r to make &6Basic Reactor Plating&r.
moni.quest.3039269E43788431.description2: That's right-- it's time to get into &bNuclearCraft&r.
moni.quest.3039269E43788431.description3: Enhancing basic plating with &6YBCO&r and &6Hard Carbon Alloy&r results in a better plating material for more advanced &bNuclearCraft&r blocks.
moni.quest.3039269E43788431.title: NuclearCraft Platings
moni.quest.3065F950BCA5C461.description1: &6Uranium 233&r is obtained exclusively from the fission of &6TBU Fuels&r.
moni.quest.3065F950BCA5C461.description2: &6LEU-233&r is made from one &6U233&r and eight &6U238&r.
moni.quest.3065F950BCA5C461.description3: &6Depleted LEU-233&r will give you various &6Plutonium&r isotopes and some &6Americium&r.
moni.quest.3065F950BCA5C461.title: Uranium 233 Fission
moni.quest.30EBD4E7BBFFEF2C.description1: &6Pulsating Dust&r is a mysterious magical material that taps into the power of Ender. It has all sorts of strange (and potentially dangerous) applications, including the ability to make &6Pulsating Iron&r and &6Ender Pearls&r.
moni.quest.30EBD4E7BBFFEF2C.description2: Your first source of Pulsating Dust is &6Uraninite&r, which you can get from &6Uraninite Ore&r. Later on, you'll be able to produce Pulsating Dust by smelting &6Resonant Clathrates&r.
moni.quest.30EBD4E7BBFFEF2C.title: Pulsating Dust
moni.quest.3115EAF1F70A613E.description2: This alloy is cooked in an &3Electric Blast Furnace&r into a &6Kanthal Ingot&r.
moni.quest.3115EAF1F70A613E.title: Kanthal Ingots
moni.quest.31A4355401B03644.description1: If somehow being able to store over a million items in a single &9256k Item Storage Cell&r isn't enough for you, there are now &9MEGA Cells&r!
moni.quest.31A4355401B03644.description2: &eMEGA Cells&r go up to 256M bytes, allowing them to store an insane amount of items. You will need high-end materials to make the housings for these cells.
moni.quest.31A4355401B03644.title: &9MEGA Cells
moni.quest.3270496124969A51.title: &9Backpack
moni.quest.32B770DAF5618BAA.description1: Holding one of these reveals &aTravel Anchors&r in range.
moni.quest.32B770DAF5618BAA.description2: Shift + right-click after aiming to warp to one, or point it anywhere to teleport forward a short distance (works through walls).
moni.quest.32B770DAF5618BAA.description3: These are powered with RF, and can be further enchanted through &bEnder IO&r's enchanting mechanics.
moni.quest.32E44FFD602C98DF.description1: Climbing the ladder of fissile materials will require some specific raw materials and machinery.
moni.quest.32E44FFD602C98DF.description2: &2Uraninite is the base resource you will need, which comes from Uraninite and Pitchblende Ore. You will need to react it with Fluorine and Hydrofluoric Acid in a Chemical Reactor to form Uranium Hexafluoride.
moni.quest.32E44FFD602C98DF.description3: The Uranium Hexafluoride must then be separated into Depleted and Enriched Uranium Hexafluoride in a Centrifuge. The Depleted UF₆ will grant Uranium 238, while the Enriched UF₆ will grant Uranium 235.
moni.quest.32E44FFD602C98DF.title: &2Uranium Fuel Infrastructure
moni.quest.33131617D0919A5B.title: 元素番号049番:インジウム
moni.quest.33195ED6D7008E5F.description1: If your server admin allows it, you can use JourneyMap to create and teleport to waypoints you set. You can access JourneyMap waypoints by hitting the N key by default. Use this feature to gather resources quickly.
moni.quest.33195ED6D7008E5F.description2: If JourneyMap teleportation is disabled, you can still use the &e/sethome&r command to register where your house is, and &e/home&r to return to it. If you supply a name (default "home") then you can register and go to multiple locations. There is a limit on the number of homes you can set, though.
moni.quest.33195ED6D7008E5F.description3: Later on you'll discover other means of teleportation.
moni.quest.33195ED6D7008E5F.subtitle: Make returning home easy!
moni.quest.33195ED6D7008E5F.title: JourneyMap and Registering Homes
moni.quest.33351123F08D92BE.description1: Smelt your &6Sand&r into &6Glass&r. If you're using a &3Electric Furnace&r to smelt it, it's more efficient to use the upgraded &3Furnaces&r, such as &3Iron Furnaces&r, which you can fuel with &6Sugar Cane&r. However, using an &3Arc Furnace&r doubles your glass output. Later, once you unlock them, &3Multi Smelters&r will be the best for this.
moni.quest.33351123F08D92BE.subtitle: &oThis step requires a Furnace or Arc Furnace at voltage &lLV&r&o or higher.&r
moni.quest.33351123F08D92BE.title: Glass
moni.quest.33714BC51815A665.description1: Combine your &6Dust&r and &6Lava&r into &6Netherrack&r. Pretty much used for nothing, apart from your first &6Hellish Matter&r and &6Netherrack Dust&r. No need to passive this.
moni.quest.33714BC51815A665.subtitle: &oThis step requires a Chemical Reactor at voltage &lLV&r&o or higher.&r
moni.quest.3380CBA4E4010EEC.description1: Break up your &6Gravel&r into &6Sand&r. Pretty much just another step of the &eCobbleworks&r, although it is used in &6Conduit Binders&r.
moni.quest.3380CBA4E4010EEC.subtitle: &oThis step requires a Forge Hammer at voltage &lLV&r&o or higher.&r
moni.quest.338ED53463203472.description1: &9Vinyl Chloride&r is an industrial chemical made from chlorinating &9Ethylene&r (adding &9Chlorine&r at high temperature) in a &3Chemical Reactor&r. &9Ethane&r can be used as an alternative reagent.
moni.quest.338ED53463203472.description2: It is used to create the plastic &9Polyvinyl Chloride&r, most well known as PVC. While it deviates from reality, in GregTech you chemically react Vinyl Chloride and &9Oxygen&r to polymerize it into PVC.
moni.quest.338ED53463203472.description3: Later, you can use &9Titanium Tetrachloride&r to catalyze this reaction as well for greater yield.
moni.quest.338ED53463203472.description4: You'll only need to solidify this into sheet form. If you want PVC pipes too, you can pulverise the sheet into dust and use that in the extruder, or you can solidify it into bars seperately.
moni.quest.338ED53463203472.description5: &6PVC Sheets&r are superior to &6Polyethylene Sheets&r for making plastic substrates, producing twice as many &6Plastic Boards&r per craft.
moni.quest.338ED53463203472.title: Polyvinyl Chloride
moni.quest.33F610CF136278AE.description1: Taking a look at the &6Corrupted Universe Data&r has given you a couple of ideas, but to properly take advantage of it, a new Micro Miner is needed.
moni.quest.33F610CF136278AE.description2: This Micro Miner requires an Epic Extended Crafting Table to fit all the things required for a foray into a corrupted universe.
moni.quest.33F610CF136278AE.title: &9Tier Eleven Micro Miner
moni.quest.349869EBF2D9FAF1.description1: A more advanced type of &6Silicon Boule&r, formed by doping the &6Silicon&r crystal lattice with &6Phosphorus&r.
moni.quest.349869EBF2D9FAF1.description2: These are made in an &3EBF&r with &2Kanthal&r or better coils, and need &2Nitrogen&r for the process. It needs twice as much Silicon as the basic boules, but also results in twice as many doped Silicon Wafers when sliced.
moni.quest.349869EBF2D9FAF1.description3: Circuit Wafers can be made far more efficiently with these doped Silicon Wafers, but they are also needed for some more advanced types of Circuit Wafers that can't be engraved onto the basic ones.
moni.quest.349869EBF2D9FAF1.title: &2Phosphorus Doped Silicon Boule
moni.quest.34CA940B412284F2.description1: Your initial method of &9Steam&r production, to fuel your first machines. They automatically output Steam on all faces except the bottom.
Your initial method of &9Steam&r production, to fuel your first machines. They automatically output Steam on all faces except the bottom.
moni.quest.34CA940B412284F2.description2: Once you get Steel, consider investing in HP Solar Boilers.
Once you get Steel, consider investing in HP Solar Boilers.
moni.quest.358D9A7B1BCFA30A.description1: &6Carbon Fibers&r are useful for a variety of things.
moni.quest.358D9A7B1BCFA30A.description2: &2They are made with Carbon Dust and polymers. Higher tier polymers grant higher yields. It's also not a chanced output anymore.
moni.quest.358D9A7B1BCFA30A.title: &2Carbon Fibers
moni.quest.35D128D56DAFDFAA.description1: &2Use Uranium-238 (or more efficiently, Uranium-235) to enrich Bacterial Sludge, and distill it to Mutagen. You can also use Naquadria to double your Enriched Bacterial Sludge yield.
moni.quest.35D128D56DAFDFAA.description2: Mutagen is used in Growth Medium production.
moni.quest.35D128D56DAFDFAA.title: &2Mutagen
moni.quest.360B577684B1AB1B.description1: &2A System-on-Chip can be engraved with HV power and Phosphorus Boules. This unlocks the ultimate tier one circuit recipe in the EV Circuit Assembler.
moni.quest.360B577684B1AB1B.description2: The ultimate tier two circuit recipe requires an IV Circuit Assembler.
moni.quest.36100ACD3655DAFF.description1: &6Lava&r can be achieved in two main ways. The first is using a &3Chemical Reactor&r to turn &6Magma Blocks&r into &6Lava&r. The second is using a &bGregTech &6Fluid Drill&r in the Nether above a &6Lava&r vein.
moni.quest.36100ACD3655DAFF.description2: In this case, you'll need &6Lava&r for &6Netherrack&r. You won't need much, although &6Lava&r can also be centrifuged for useful resources.
moni.quest.36100ACD3655DAFF.title: Lava
moni.quest.3616092A2954FEE0.description1: Now that you have all the basic building blocks of nuclear fission, you'll need to start creating breeding chains to mass produced stabilized versions of each element, for the synthesis of &9Omnium&r.
moni.quest.3616092A2954FEE0.description2: Please note that stabilized versions of each 元素番号can番not be turned back into fluids, nor turned back into their original &bNuclearCraft&r isotopes.
moni.quest.3616092A2954FEE0.description3: Experiment around with larger breeder reactors that can handle highly enriched fuels.
moni.quest.3616092A2954FEE0.description4: You'll probably want to build multiple reactors to make all the fissile elements in any reasonable amount of time.
moni.quest.3616092A2954FEE0.title: Further Adventures In Fission
moni.quest.3650EF39B5AB4A7D.description1: &2Phenolic Substrates need to be turned into Circuit Boards with Silver before being usable in Circuit production.
moni.quest.3650EF39B5AB4A7D.description2: &2Sodium Persulfate and Iron III Chloride are troublesome to get right now, but using them in making Circuit Boards will reduce the amount of Silver required by 4 times.
moni.quest.3650EF39B5AB4A7D.title: &2Good Circuit Boards
moni.quest.36902938AFF55303.title: 元素番号010番:ネオン
moni.quest.36B1B083B4FA439F.description1: The &3Power Substation&r is GregTech's native mass power storage solution.
moni.quest.36B1B083B4FA439F.description2: The structure can accept up to 18 layers of 3x3 &aLapotronic Capacitor&r blocks. GT batteries can hold &96x&r the EU their item counterparts can hold when crafted into a &aLapotronic Capacitor&r. The structure need not be made of all of the same tier blocks, but it must be full, so fill any empty space with &aEmpty Capacitor Blocks&r.
moni.quest.36B1B083B4FA439F.description3: Insert power through &6Energy Hatches&r and extract from &6Dynamo Hatches&r, each of any tier. The Power Substation can accept special &664A Substation Hatches&r, as well as &aLaser Hatches&r.
moni.quest.36B1B083B4FA439F.description4: The Power Substation will &cpassively lose 1%&r of its total capacity every 24 (real-life) hours, up to 100,000 EU/t per capacitor block. This is equivalent to &95.8 billionths&r of its total capacity per tick, so this should not be a concern under regular operation.
moni.quest.36B1B083B4FA439F.title: &2Power Substation
moni.quest.372BE3F076893D71.description1: You may wish to &aautomatically sprint&r instead of having to press &eControl + W&r or &eW twice&r.
moni.quest.372BE3F076893D71.description2: To achieve this, change the &bSprint&r keybind to &eW&r. (or the same keybind as Walk Forward)
moni.quest.372BE3F076893D71.description3: A &aGrappling Hook&r is also very useful in an urban environment, allowing you to climb buildings with ease!
moni.quest.372BE3F076893D71.description4: There are lots of ways to upgrade and improve your &aGrappling Hook&r, so play around with it.
moni.quest.372BE3F076893D71.description5: Open your inventory and look for the &3Curios&r button, click it to reveal the additional curio slots, and put the hook in the hook-shaped slot.
Open your inventory and look for the &3Curios&r button, click it to reveal the additional curio slots and put the hook in the hook shaped slot.
Open your inventory and look for the &3Curios&r button, click it to reveal the additional curio slots and put the hook in the hook shaped slot.
moni.quest.372BE3F076893D71.description6: The default key to fire a hook is &6C&r, however if you want to change it, simply search for &5category:ReHooked&r in the key binds screen and change it to whatever you want.
The default key to fire a hook is &6C&r, however you might want to change it, simply search for &5category:ReHooked&r in the key binds screen and change them to whatever you want.
The default key to fire a hook is &6C&r, however you might want to change it, simply search for &5category:ReHooked&r in the key binds screen and change them to whatever you want.
moni.quest.372BE3F076893D71.subtitle: &oFaster is better!
moni.quest.372BE3F076893D71.title: Movin' Around
moni.quest.374EB1BB1E2F6B9C.description1: &9Hydrogen&r and &9Nitrogen&r combine together to make &9Ammonia&r in an &6HV&r Chemical Reactor.
moni.quest.374EB1BB1E2F6B9C.description2: An easy way to get Nitrogen is to centrifuge &9Air&r, which will require you to build an &3Air Collector&r. You could also electrolyze &6Saltpeter&r, distill &9Fermented Biomass&r in a &3Distillation Tower&r, or get huge amounts from &2distlling Liquid Air in a Distillation Tower.&r.
moni.quest.374EB1BB1E2F6B9C.title: &2Ammonia
moni.quest.376EE785F4204FFE.description1: &2The Sifter gets you Flawless and Exquisite Gems from Crushed Purified Gem Ores. Overall it results in a higher yield. Higher tiers of Sifter increase the yield further.
moni.quest.376EE785F4204FFE.description2: &2You will need small quantities of Flawless Emeralds for MV Emitter and Sensor components.
moni.quest.376EE785F4204FFE.title: &2Sifter
moni.quest.3781AD70E71CA0D7.description1: &2An expensive advanced component used in the construction of the MV Precision Laser Engraver and MV Circuit Assembler.
moni.quest.3781AD70E71CA0D7.description2: Process some Emerald Ore in the Sifter to get the Flawless Emerald required to craft this.
moni.quest.3781AD70E71CA0D7.title: &2MV Emitter
moni.quest.37BE175EEC2ABD59.description1: The &3High Performance Computing Array (HPCA)&r is a computer which provides &dComputation Work&r to be used in the &3Research Station&r. The amount of &dComputation Work&r it provides depends on the type of HPCA parts within it. It also needs to receive adequate &dCooling&r provided by Coolers within its structure.
moni.quest.37BE175EEC2ABD59.description2: Connect the &3Computation Data Transmission Hatch&r to the &3Reception Hatch&r on your &3Research Station&r to transfer the &dCWU/t&r produced to it.
moni.quest.37BE175EEC2ABD59.description3: The HPCA accepts almost any combination of &3Computation Components&r, &3Coolers&r, &3Bridges&r and &3Empty Components&r within the 3x3 area behind the &aComputer Heat Vents&r. The suggested components will build a &d16 CWU/t&r HPCA, enough for scanning the &3Fusion Reactor Mk2&r, &6UV Circuits&r, and all &6ZPM Components&r. You can get away with less at first, but you will eventually need to upgrade to this computing power. Refer to &eEMI&r for some other possible setups.
moni.quest.37BE175EEC2ABD59.description4: The &dCWU/t&r of the HPCA is determined by the sum of the outputs of the &3HPCA Computation Components&r within it. Regular &3Computation Components&r produce &d4 CWU/t&r each, and require &d2 Cooling&r each. &3Advanced Computation Components&r, which you do not have access to yet, produce &d16 CWU/t&r each and require &d4 Cooling&r each.
moni.quest.37BE175EEC2ABD59.description5: &dCooling&r is provided by &3Cooler&r blocks within the structure. &3Passive Coolers&r provide &d1 Cooling&r each for free, whereas &3Active Coolers&r provide &d2 Cooling&r each with a steady flow of &9Dielectric PCB Coolant&r, provided through an &3Input Hatch&r. If the Cooling within the HPCA is insufficient, the components may be &cdamaged&r from overheating. The physical position of the components within the HPCA does not matter.
moni.quest.37BE175EEC2ABD59.description6: A &3Bridge Component&r may be installed, allowing the HPCA to connect to &3Network Switches&r.
moni.quest.37BE175EEC2ABD59.description7: The energy consumption of the HPCA is determined by the sum of its parts. 'Max Energy' refers to the power draw while the HPCA is computing, while 'Upkeep Energy' refers to the power draw when the HPCA is idling.
moni.quest.37BE175EEC2ABD59.title: &2High Performance Computing Array
moni.quest.37FD045CC0AEB11B.title: 元素番号???番:ナクアダ
moni.quest.383FADC5E8BC4E91.description1: You can turn &6Plant Balls&r and other various &6sugary crops&r into &9Biomass&r with a &3Brewery&r. Biomass is the first step towards making Plastic in the form of &9Polyethylene&r.
moni.quest.383FADC5E8BC4E91.description2: The Brewery is a &overy&r slow machine, but it requires almost no power. Building &2many Breweries&r is necessary to brew enough Biomass for plastics. &2An alternative and more resource efficient way of making biomass is with a Pyrolyse Oven, Water, and Bio Chaff.
moni.quest.38791476E970C57D.description1: &2Advanced SMD Components&r are new to CEu and are required for &6Crystal, Wetware, and Matter circuits&r. They can also be substituted for the equivalent of 4 normal SMD components in Nano and Quantum circuits.
moni.quest.38791476E970C57D.description2: All of these components require &1IV&r power and liquid PBI.
moni.quest.38791476E970C57D.description3: Advanced SMD Transistor: Vanadium-Gallium Foil and Fine HSS-G Wire
moni.quest.38791476E970C57D.description4: Advanced SMD Resistor: Graphene Dust and Fine Platinum Wire
moni.quest.38791476E970C57D.description5: Advanced SMD Capacitor: Thin PBI Sheet and HSS-S Foil
moni.quest.38791476E970C57D.description6: Advanced SMD Diode: InGaP Dust and Fine Niobium-Titanium Wire
moni.quest.38791476E970C57D.description7: Advanced SMD Inductor: HSS-E Ring and Fine Palladium Wire
moni.quest.38791476E970C57D.description8: As with the normal SMD components, invest in an extremely robust automation system for these, as you won't stop needing them.
moni.quest.38791476E970C57D.title: &2Advanced SMD Components
moni.quest.39394D5596FF8BC8.description1: Any of these items will suck nearby items into your inventory.
moni.quest.39394D5596FF8BC8.description2: The &6GregTech Magnet&r, &6Ender IO Electromagnet&r, and &6Thermal FluxoMagnet&r can all be placed in a &dCurio slot&r to save inventory space.
moni.quest.39394D5596FF8BC8.title: Magnet
moni.quest.39588577CDBFCAE4.title: 元素番号045番:ロジウム
moni.quest.3969150B59EA38A2.description1: &3Obsidian Furnaces&f are slightly faster than &3Diamond Furnaces&f, taking only &a20 ticks&r to smelt an items, and are also blastproof.
moni.quest.3969150B59EA38A2.title: Furnace v7.0
moni.quest.397DB20B979BC714.description1: Heavy: avoid dropping it on your foot.
moni.quest.397DB20B979BC714.description2: These &2double plates&r are used for two things-- &6Tier Two Micro Miners&r and the &3Space Station Assembler&r.
moni.quest.397DB20B979BC714.title: &2Titanium Double Plates
moni.quest.399AE4E449872B8A.description1: &9Ender Air&r, collected from a &3Gas Collector&r, can be sent into the &3Vacuum Freezer&r to turn it into &9Liquid Ender Air&r.
moni.quest.399AE4E449872B8A.description2: &9Liquid Ender Air&r can be sent into a &2Distillation Tower&r to break it down into its components.
moni.quest.399AE4E449872B8A.description3: &2Liquid Air and Liquid Nether Air give different useful components too.
moni.quest.399AE4E449872B8A.title: &2Distilling Liquid Ender Air
moni.quest.39A09DA3903C5564.description1: These Boules have a hefty cost up front, but a single one will last you quite a while, in addition to allowing the creation of new Chips.
moni.quest.39A09DA3903C5564.subtitle: The final Boule
moni.quest.39A09DA3903C5564.title: &9Universe Boules
moni.quest.39D4174834F3879D.description1: The &6Steam Dynamo&r will be your source of &9power&r for the early game. It requires &9Water&r and burnable fuel like &6Coal&r or &6Sugar Cane&r to produce power.
moni.quest.39D4174834F3879D.description2: You'll need a small bit of &6Silver&f for this dynamo. If you haven't found a &6Galena vein&f yet (which is where Silver is), then consider "buying" some &6Silver Ore&r using &9Monicoins&r. You won't need a ton of silver and lead just yet, so it won't bankrupt you.
Keep in mind that &eDynamos only output power when burning through fuel, and only the block/cable attached directly to the coil will get provided with power&f.
moni.quest.39D4174834F3879D.description3: Keep in mind that &eDynamos only output power when burning through fuel, and only the block/cable attached directly to the coil will get provided with power&f.
moni.quest.39D4174834F3879D.subtitle: Your first major crafting project!
moni.quest.39D4174834F3879D.title: Steam Dynamo
moni.quest.39FD6F1076559156.description1: The first Mainframe you'll have to contend with.
moni.quest.39FD6F1076559156.description2: This is the first Tier Five circuit available, and consequently the most expensive to make. As always, invest in the next circuit theme to get to cheaper recipes as soon as possible.
moni.quest.39FD6F1076559156.title: &2The First Tier Five Circuit
moni.quest.3A26187DC3FAD6B1.description1: These can be configured to stock up to &99 item stacks (576 items)&r or &936 buckets (9 types, 4 buckets each)&r for passive autocrafting and to push into other inventories&r. Any item pushed into an &aME Interface&r is digitized and placed in your ME Network storage.
moni.quest.3A26187DC3FAD6B1.subtitle: &9I don't hold patterns!
moni.quest.3A26187DC3FAD6B1.title: Interface
moni.quest.3A3C9648BD56ED20.title: 元素番号086番:ラドン
