moni.quest.3A5387B2003177B2.description1: Basic &aFlux Capacitors&r hold a whopping &9500 kRF&r of energy and are useful for keeping your &aRF-powered&r equipment and tools charged.
moni.quest.3A5387B2003177B2.description2: Put one into your newly crafted &9Charger&r to charge it. You can then put it in your inventory to charge your items with &aRF&r.
moni.quest.3A5387B2003177B2.description3: The Flux Capacitor is a &bBauble&r, so open your inventory and look for the Baubles button, click it to reveal the additional bauble slots menu and put it into any slot you wish.
moni.quest.3A5387B2003177B2.title: &9Flux Capacitors
moni.quest.3A69EE21B3089929.description1: &2Optical Fiber Cables&r are used to transfer &eResearch Data&r&r between &3Data Banks&r and &3Assembly Lines&r, or &eComputation Data&r between &3High Performance Computation Arrays&r, &3Network Switches&r, and &3Research Stations&r.
moni.quest.3A69EE21B3089929.description2: Note that Optical connections are limited to one &aTransmission Hatch&r to one &aReception Hatch&r.
moni.quest.3A69EE21B3089929.title: &2Optical Fiber Cables
moni.quest.3A71D736AE5C17E2.description1: All this &9Phenol&r needed for MV circuits and all the &6Steel&r needed for everything else may be putting stress onto your coal supply, so it may be worth looking into building a &9Greenhouse&r, and converting &6Wood&r into &6Charcoal&r to help solve the issue.
moni.quest.3A71D736AE5C17E2.description2: Providing it with &6Fertilizer&r will significantly increase its output.
moni.quest.3A71D736AE5C17E2.title: &9Infiniter Wood
moni.quest.3AB0402B19DD5BA8.description1: With your EBF running, start to create a supply of &6Aluminium Ingots&r. These are a crucial ingredient for MV machines, including &bApplied Energistics&r.
moni.quest.3AB0402B19DD5BA8.description2: If you find your power supply is faltering, you may want to make additional dynamos and turn them into steam boilers and turbines. Upgrading your dynamos is also advisable.
moni.quest.3AB0402B19DD5BA8.description3: However, you're also about to reach MV. You're bound to discover a better power source than steam before long.
moni.quest.3AB0402B19DD5BA8.description4: &2You can cut the smelting time of Aluminium and some other smelting processes by a third with Nitrogen gas. Higher-tier processes may take different gases.
moni.quest.3AB0402B19DD5BA8.title: &2Aluminium Ingots
moni.quest.3B200AD6EFF90DFA.description1: &b&lEMI&r is the list of all items that you see every time you open your inventory. It's the better(tm) recipe book that shows you all available items and recipes in the modpack. Note that &b&lEMI&r is based on &b&lJEI&r, and people tend to use the names interchangably.
moni.quest.3B200AD6EFF90DFA.description2: To see it in action, pull up a quest that requires an item of some sort and just click the item!
moni.quest.3B200AD6EFF90DFA.rich_descrip: If you want to know how to craft an item, just hover your mouse over it and press
One of the remarkable features of EMI is that it's also capable of helping you with recipes, covered more in
. EMI will list all available recipes.
If you instead want to know what recipes use an item, hover over it and press
Hover over an item and press
to bookmark it. To remove a bookmarked item from the list, press
moni.quest.3B200AD6EFF90DFA.subtitle: &eUSE EMI!!!&r
moni.quest.3B200AD6EFF90DFA.title: &9&lUse EMI! Use EMI! USE. EMI.
moni.quest.3B3F46345D39CAE2.description1: &6Tungsten&r is a material that requires an &3EV Electrolyzer,&2 Chemical Bath&r and an &3Electric Blast Furnace&r with at least &6Nichrome Coils&r.
moni.quest.3B3F46345D39CAE2.description2: It is only found from &6Tungstate Dust &2and &6Scheelite Dust&2, obtained from their respective ores.&r Tungstate is also obtainable in small quantities from centrifuging &6Endstone Dust&r.
moni.quest.3B3F46345D39CAE2.description3: Scheelite and Tungstate need to be &2bathed in Hydrochloric Acid to make Tungstic Acid, then electrolyzed&r to get to the Tungsten, which then needs to be cooked in the EBF for Tungsten Ingots.
moni.quest.3B3F46345D39CAE2.title: &2Tungsten
moni.quest.3B57A9816A61C1DC.subtitle: Is Neutronium not enough?!
moni.quest.3B57A9816A61C1DC.title: The Final Solar Panel
moni.quest.3B6331F5763C4932.description1: Centrifuge &6Rare Earth&r, and among other useful materials, you'll get some &6Yttrium&r.
moni.quest.3B6331F5763C4932.description2: Because this recipe has chanced outputs, use a &2high tier Centrifuge to increase output chances&r, and &eensure the output slots don't fill up or excess items will be voided&r.
moni.quest.3B639F4061B00F1A.description1: Your first &6Tier Two Circuits&r will require three &6Tier One Circuits&r plus two &6Diodes&r.
moni.quest.3B639F4061B00F1A.description2: These are rather expensive... Always be on the lookout for a cheaper way to make your circuits - new sets of recipes become available each time you make a new tier of &2Circuit Assembler&r. Conveniently, this tier of Circuit unlocks one now!
moni.quest.3B639F4061B00F1A.title: &2The First Tier Two Circuits
moni.quest.3B8EFDA817243B9F.description1: Seperate your &6Glass Dust&r into &6Silicon Dioxide Dust&r. Can be electrolyzed into useful resources.
moni.quest.3B8EFDA817243B9F.subtitle: &oThis step requires a Centrifuge at voltage &lLV&r&o or higher.&r
moni.quest.3BB7400C8BB392D9.description1: &9Phosphoric Acid&r is a key component of &6Luminessence&r, which will be used extensively for such things as &6Nether Stars&r, &6Lumium Blend&r, and &bExtended Crafting&r components.
moni.quest.3BB7400C8BB392D9.description2: It can be made using several equally viable recipes:
moni.quest.3BB7400C8BB392D9.description3: &6Phosphorus&r, &9Oxygen&r, and &9Water&r can be chemically reacted to produce &9Phosphoric Acid&r (Requires the &3Large Chemical Reactor&r).
moni.quest.3BB7400C8BB392D9.description4: Alternatively, you can combine &6Phosphorus Pentoxide&r and Water for a much faster reaction.
moni.quest.3BB7400C8BB392D9.description5: Otherwise, you can react &6Apatite Dust&r, &9Sulfuric Acid&r, and Water to get Phosphoric Acid, &9Hydrochloric Acid&r, and a whole bunch of &6Gypsum Dust&r.
moni.quest.3BB7400C8BB392D9.title: Phosphoric Acid
moni.quest.3BC7B5321B707F78.description1: Turn your &6Glass&r into &6Quartz&r. An &3Arc Furnace&r making &6Glass&r supports 2.5 &3Electrolyzers&r of the same tier. You will need a lot of &6Quartz&r, so it's crucial that you passive this.
moni.quest.3BC7B5321B707F78.subtitle: &oThis step requires an Electrolyzer at voltage &lLV&r&o or higher.&r
moni.quest.3C3B5875FCD6B5B7.description1: With your &6Crystal CPUs&r and the &3LuV Assembling Machine&r crafted, you can make the final type of Tier Five Circuit: the &6Crystal Processor&r.
moni.quest.3C3B5875FCD6B5B7.description2: &2This is the first Circuit which strictly requires Advanced SMD components. All of them will from now on.&r
moni.quest.3C3B5875FCD6B5B7.description3: As the best form of Tier Five circuit, these should be automated and stockpiled. The variant recipe requiring &6Crystal System-on-Chip&r won't be available until you can make a &3ZPM Circuit Assembling Machine&r.
moni.quest.3C3B5875FCD6B5B7.title: &2The Fourth and Final Tier Five Circuits
moni.quest.3C3E015DFA8FDECE.description1: The &6Molecular Assembler&r is the most flexible way to autocraft recipes that would otherwise be done in the &3Crafting Table&r, &3Stonecutter&r, or &3Smithing Table&r.
moni.quest.3C3E015DFA8FDECE.description2: Place one next to a &6Pattern Provider&r with a compatible &6Pattern&r and it will perform those recipe types when requested, no further configuration required.
moni.quest.3C3E015DFA8FDECE.description3: It can also craft recipes passively if supplied with a compatible &6Pattern&r and &aAE&r power.
moni.quest.3D54068FFDD1F3CE.title: 元素番号004番:ベリリウム
moni.quest.3D7924B550A1BBA0.title: &9The Third Tier Ten Circuit
moni.quest.3D9E25B45A7942A7.title: 元素番号???番:トリタニウム
moni.quest.3DD8D9EEA7189186.description1: &6HSS-G&r is the fifth coil material available, increasing your EBF's operating temperature to 5400K so it can process more advanced materials, such as &6Naquadah&r.
moni.quest.3DD8D9EEA7189186.title: HSS-G Coil Blocks
moni.quest.3E12862AD553EB8A.description1: Mixing &6Titanium&r with &6Mana Dust&r creates &6Mythril Dust&r. This can be smelted into ingots in an &3Electric Blast Furnace&r equipped with &6Kanthal Coils&r or better.
moni.quest.3E12862AD553EB8A.description2: Mythril is the basis of &bThermal Expansion&r device casings, and is used for many advanced &aAugments&r.
moni.quest.3E42B4AAA6D2A05B.description1: An advanced component used for the Circuit Assembling Machine.
moni.quest.3E4DEA4FFD019AB9.title: &9Upgrades, people, upgrades.
moni.quest.3E51686E2DBD380F.description1: The place for your very first chemical reactions, namely making some improved substrates.
moni.quest.3E51686E2DBD380F.title: LV Chemical Reactor
moni.quest.3E69E1949316BD0C.description1: Now that you have a &3Wiremill&f and a &2Bender&f, you can consider starting to do &eBounties&f. The &6Bounty Board&f has a global inventory containing quests to turn in specific items in exchange for &9Monicoins&f. These quests have a fairly short duration, so make sure to &estockpile the items&f that come up on them or else they'll &cexpire before you can complete them&f.
moni.quest.3E69E1949316BD0C.description2: With renewable &9Monicoins&f, you should feel free to spend the ones you have on whatever you need. &aSpend your coins!
moni.quest.3E69E1949316BD0C.subtitle: Money!
moni.quest.3E69E1949316BD0C.title: &2Bounties For monicoins!
moni.quest.3E90A188715DA88A.description1: Combine your &6Quartz&r and &6Resonant Ender&r to make &6Resonant Clathrate&r. One &3Electrolyzer&r making &6Quartz&r supports 2.4 &3Chemical Reactors &rof the same tier.
moni.quest.3E90A188715DA88A.subtitle: &oThis step requires a Chemical Reactor at voltage &lMV&r&o or higher.&r
moni.quest.3EDD0A986384F2A7.description1: The &3Bender&r improves the yield of a great deal of items. Most notably, you can use it to get one &6Plate&r from a single ingot, instead of having to spend two ingots for a single plate.
If you played the CE version of &9Nomifactory&r, note that the functions of the &3Compressor&r (for making Plates) and &3Cluster Mill&r are merged into this machine.
moni.quest.3EDD0A986384F2A7.description2: As with the &3Wiremill&r, this requires a &6Programmed Circuit&r to tell it what to make. For plates, this is &econfiguration 1&r. Refer to &eEMI&r for which configuration to use for your recipe.
moni.quest.3EDD0A986384F2A7.description3: Other materials it can produce include:
moni.quest.3EDD0A986384F2A7.title: &2Bender
moni.quest.3F6EDC2481D5877F.description1: Nickel comes from several different ores, including Pentlandite and Garnierite, but they're all found in the same vein.
moni.quest.3F6EDC2481D5877F.description2: Nickel is used mostly for several very important alloys, including Invar and Cupronickel.
moni.quest.3F6EDC2481D5877F.subtitle: Copper... Nickel... Cupronickel?
moni.quest.3F6EDC2481D5877F.title: Cupronickel and Invar
moni.quest.3F77EDE69BB649DA.description1: &3Silver Furnaces&f are another step up in speed, taking a mere &a80 ticks&f to smelt an item.
moni.quest.3F77EDE69BB649DA.title: Furnace v4.0
moni.quest.3FF918B4CF33E8F7.description1: Bits of a &6Basalz Rod&r. Using a &3Macerator&r doubles your yield.
moni.quest.3FFC053E3E11D586.description1: &9Darmstadtium&r is formed by fusing Arsenic and Ruthenium, and is the main material for UV machines.
moni.quest.3FFC053E3E11D586.title: &2Darmstadtium
moni.quest.400AD2B735FF135D.description2: Circuits are the baseline of the entire &9Monifactory&r progression, so keep climbing!
Circuits are the baseline of the entire Monifactory progression, so keep climbing!
Circuits are the baseline of the entire Monifactory progression, so keep climbing!
moni.quest.400AD2B735FF135D.rich_descrip: Click to go to the chapter
was added so you can keep track of the important bits of the pack.
moni.quest.400AD2B735FF135D.title: Progression Tab
moni.quest.404C9497C46E7608.description1: &aMolds&r are used in a &3Fluid Solidifier&r or &3Alloy Smelter&r to form materials into specific shapes. These are not consumed or damaged during crafting, so you can leave them in a machine to dedicate it to that shape.
moni.quest.404C9497C46E7608.description2: The Fluid Solidifier tends to be the more efficient option: for example, you can use &e8 ingots&r to make one &6Gear&r in an Alloy Smelter, but with an Extractor and Solidifier you can accomplish the same result with &e4 ingots&r.
moni.quest.404C9497C46E7608.description3: Be careful not to accidentally make &aExtruder Shapes&r. Those are for a machine you will get access to later. The three molds in this quest are ones you will find useful right away.
moni.quest.404C9497C46E7608.title: Molds
moni.quest.408C7F5C8340AF27.title: 元素番号058番:セリウム
moni.quest.40E8C7CEE285D702.description1: &2Your first few Raw Crystal Chips must be grown in an Autoclave from liquid Enderium, or more efficiently with Europium, and Exquisite Emeralds or Exquisite Olivine.
moni.quest.40E8C7CEE285D702.description2: After the first few, you can smash them into pieces using a Forge Hammer, and duplicate them with Bacterial Sludge, Mutagen, or more Europium or Enderium.
moni.quest.40E8C7CEE285D702.description3: Bacterial Sludge can later be obtained in the byproducts of getting Stem Cells.
moni.quest.40E8C7CEE285D702.title: Crystal Growing
moni.quest.4107A9B0CA139E6C.description1: Craft your &6Clay&r to make &6Clay Balls&r.&r You can also use &3Compacting Drawers&r. Used for &6Conduit Binders&r.
moni.quest.410EA68D6EF15CEC.description1: A &6P2P Tunnel&r (&aPoint-to-Point Tunnel&r) is a powerful tool from &bApplied Energistics 2&r that can be used to send items, redstone, RF/EU or fluids from one location to another using your ME system, without the need to use any disk storage space. &cTransporting RF/EU has a 5% tax on the input energy.&r
moni.quest.410EA68D6EF15CEC.description2: Each P2P tunnel system may have only &cone input&r but &eany number of outputs&r. There is no limit on how many P2P tunnels, or P2P tunnel systems, you can have on one network.
moni.quest.410EA68D6EF15CEC.description3: By default, a P2P tunnel is an &6ME tunnel&r, which transmits Applied Energistics channels and power. Since channels are disabled, you will most likely not be using the default tunnel. You can change the mode of your P2P tunnels by right clicking the tunnel with the respective item seen in &bEMI&r.
moni.quest.410EA68D6EF15CEC.description4: To configure your P2P tunnels, take a &6Memory Card&r. While holding the memory card, &ashift-right click&r the unconfigured tunnel, to set the frequency of the input, and save the frequency to the memory card. Once the first tunnel has been set up this way and the memory card is configured with the frequency, any subsequent tunnel you &aright-click&r with the memory card will be set as the output of the most recent frequency used.
moni.quest.410EA68D6EF15CEC.description5: You can also use memory cards to copy the configuration of ME blocks and tile-entities, such as &6Interfaces&r and &6Storage Buses&r. &aShift-right click&r a ME block to copy its configuration, and &aright-click&r to paste that configuration. Note that this doesn't copy upgrades applied to the block.
moni.quest.410EA68D6EF15CEC.description6: You can also &ashift-right click&r to empty the frequency, or the ME block configuration, set in the card.
moni.quest.410EA68D6EF15CEC.subtitle: Network Recursion
moni.quest.410EA68D6EF15CEC.title: P2P Tunnels
moni.quest.4155AEBF760C42E8.description1: &fThe &9Omnic Forge&r will allow you to &eproduce post-tank coils and casings&r. It is also part of the Netherite processing line.
moni.quest.4155AEBF760C42E8.description2: Note that Omnic Matrix Machine Casings are twice as expensive when crafted using the Assembler, so make sure to use your first Omnic Forge to build any extra ones.
moni.quest.4155AEBF760C42E8.description3: Now, you could make this before you get tank, it's perfectly doable, but there's nothing that really needs it.
moni.quest.4155AEBF760C42E8.subtitle: Wow, that's a lot of omnium!
moni.quest.4155AEBF760C42E8.title: &9Omnic Forge
moni.quest.4174A6C6403DD245.description1: Fluix is initially made via in-world crafting, by dropping &6Redstone&r, &6Nether Quartz&r, and a &6Charged Certus Quartz Crystal&r in the same block of &9Water&r. You'll see some sparks then the items will merge into a &6Fluix Crystal&r. Be sure to turn off any nearby item magnets/collectors or they might interrupt this crafting process.
moni.quest.4174A6C6403DD245.description2: The &3Energy Acceptor&r converts RF power into AE power that Applied Energistics uses, in a 2 RF to 1 AE ratio. This power will be transmitted through adjacent full-block ME Network devices, as well as along all connected &6ME Cables&r, &6ME Conduits&r, and &6Quartz Fibers&r.
moni.quest.4174A6C6403DD245.description3: Quartz Fibers are &emicroparts&r you can put between an ME Cable and any ME Network block or another ME Cable. This will allow transmission of AE power but not data, which is useful for having data-isolated ME Networks all sharing the same power source.
moni.quest.4174A6C6403DD245.description4: Applied Energistics 2 can be complicated for a new player, so it is recommended to either &l&3use the in-game guide&r &e(Press G while hovering over a compatible item)&r or a video as a supplement to this chapter if need be.
moni.quest.4174A6C6403DD245.rich_descrip: . While written for the 1.12 verison of AE2, most of the infomation is the exact same between the versions.
moni.quest.4177C4BD329C38DA.description1: Circuits along this line are UIV, and can all be substituted in recipes.
moni.quest.4177C4BD329C38DA.title: &9UIV Circuits
moni.quest.417D97D9E3562F45.description1: &9Polyethylene (PE)&r is the most common category of plastic, made from polymers of &9Ethylene&r. Adding &9Oxygen&r in a &3Chemical Reactor&r recreates (with some artistic license) early accidental synthesis of Polyethylene.
moni.quest.417D97D9E3562F45.description2: When you have large amounts of &6Rutile&r and &6Bauxite&r (probably after you visit the Moon) you can consider using &9Titanium Tetrachloride&r as a catalyst to improve your Polyethylene yields. For now it's not a great idea, as in addition to its Overworld rarity, you need it for &6Titanium&r.
moni.quest.417D97D9E3562F45.description3: Form &6Polyethylene Sheets&r using a &3Fluid Solidifier&r and a &aPlate Mold&r for use in crafting electronics components. You'll need both the liquid and the sheets. For &9Polyethylene (PE)&r pipes, you can either pulverise your sheets into dust and use those in the extruder, or solidify &9Polyethylene (PE)&r into &6Polyethylene Bars&r seperately.
moni.quest.417D97D9E3562F45.title: Polyethylene
moni.quest.41B4EA53D6D7AE37.description1: Please note that all six variants of &6ME Terminals&r are &emicroparts&r, which means they need to be attached to an &6ME Cable&r (not conduit) to function.
moni.quest.41B4EA53D6D7AE37.subtitle: Access all of your items on a single screen. Soon, anyway.
moni.quest.41B4EA53D6D7AE37.title: Terminal
moni.quest.41C2E49E70D76330.description1: &2This Steam multiblock was intended for use in the Steam Age. This pack skips the Steam Age, but it may still be worth using.&r
moni.quest.41C2E49E70D76330.description2: The &6Steam Grinder&r functions as 5.3 &7LV &3Macerators&r in parallel! It requires an input of &9Steam&r through a &eSteam Hatch&r.
moni.quest.41C2E49E70D76330.description3: You may want to consider setting up a rudimentary &eore-doubling&r setup with it. Point the output in the direction of several upgraded &3Furnaces&r.
moni.quest.41C2E49E70D76330.description4: &4Does not generate byproducts!&r You need an HV-tier macerator or better to get those.
moni.quest.41C2E49E70D76330.title: &9Steam Grinder
moni.quest.41C61F32DBEF85B7.title: 元素番号097番:バークリウム
moni.quest.41FA85A3920EB334.description1: &2A heavy Naquadah isotope with more nuclear capability.
moni.quest.41FA85A3920EB334.description2: &6Enriched Naquadah&r is meant to be used in as-of-yet-unimplemented CEu-native reactors. It's used in small amounts for &3Trinium Coil blocks&r, or in Moni reactors, though Naquadria is better for that purpose.
moni.quest.41FA85A3920EB334.description3: At least it's the easiest to obtain, and you can get it by the full Naquadah processing chain or by passing &6Purified Naquadah Dust&r through an &3Electromagnetic Separator&r.
moni.quest.41FA85A3920EB334.title: &2Enriched Naquadah
moni.quest.424413BBCE3FD3BF.description1: An otherworldly material exclusive to Microverses, &6Naquadah&r is an important material in the late game.
moni.quest.424413BBCE3FD3BF.description2: It can be alloyed and enriched to various forms, and is the eventual source of &6Neutronium&r in a &3MK III Fusion Reactor&r.
moni.quest.424413BBCE3FD3BF.title: Naquadah Ingots
moni.quest.425D1C34A82B054D.description1: The &3Naquadah Reactor&r is a structure used to generate considerable amounts of EU power from decaying &6Enriched Naquadah&r or &6Naquadria&r into &6Lead&r.
moni.quest.425D1C34A82B054D.description2: &6Sneak-right click&r the controller to enable the in-world preview.
moni.quest.425D1C34A82B054D.title: &9 Naquadah Reactor
moni.quest.4261BDA34D716EC8.description1: The &bSubatomic Digital Assembler &fcan be used to produce some creative items from the required data and computational power, the first of which is the &dCreative Quantum Tank.
moni.quest.4261BDA34D716EC8.subtitle: The Pinnacle of Energy-to-Mass Conversion
moni.quest.4261BDA34D716EC8.title: &9Subatomic Digital Assembler
moni.quest.42F1EF8432C05294.title: 元素番号028番:ニッケル
moni.quest.431BB650AC492C84.description1: &9Pressing the second tab in any given machine's GUI will open up a view showing the machine and any blocks it is touching.&r From there, you can click on a side of the machine and easily add, edit and remove &acovers&r, and configure if the machine should &3automatically output&r and which side it should output to.
moni.quest.431BB650AC492C84.title: &9 Machine Auto-Output
moni.quest.434142F777A2CCBE.description1: The last circuit board. These require UV circuits, &6Dimensional Circuit Boards&r, and &6Ultimate Gems&r, but at this point it shouldn't be an issue for you.
moni.quest.441E5CDAD5007906.description1: &6Rutile&r is a &6Titanium&r precursor found in &6Ilmenite Ore&r and &6Bauxite Ore&r, which spawn uncommonly in the End.
moni.quest.441E5CDAD5007906.description2: &6&rLarger quantities of Ilmenite and Bauxite may be found on the Moon and other planets.
moni.quest.441E5CDAD5007906.title: Early Rutile
moni.quest.442C028AB73A0A06.title: 元素番号047番:銀
moni.quest.447E9501E57DA010.description1: &9Water&r can be achieved in many ways, but the most notable are: &6Water Collectors&r, which are very slow but cheap; &bThermal &6Aqueous Accumulators&r, which are a bit more expensive but way faster; and &bGregTech &6Infinite Water Covers&r, which are much more expensive, but save space because they're covers, and make water 16x faster than &6Accumulators&r.
moni.quest.447E9501E57DA010.description2: Right now, you should probably use the &6Aqueous Accumulator&r.
moni.quest.447E9501E57DA010.description3: In this case, you'll need &9Water&r for &6Clay&r.
moni.quest.447E9501E57DA010.subtitle: &oYes, there's a quest for &9Water&r.
moni.quest.447E9501E57DA010.title: Water
moni.quest.447F6F4642A36F9D.description1: &oNote: This quest accepts any Super or Quantum Tank.
moni.quest.447F6F4642A36F9D.description2: &2Super and Quantum Tanks are the high-tier GT Fluid storage solution.&r
moni.quest.447F6F4642A36F9D.description3: The first tier holds &68,000 buckets&r, and higher tiers hold more. They can also be used like Drums to put fluids in and out of machines.
moni.quest.447F6F4642A36F9D.description4: You can conveniently configure &cvoiding&r for them to always void, start voiding at 95% capacity, or never void.
moni.quest.447F6F4642A36F9D.description5: The item equivalent are &3Super Chests&r, which are used in certain &6Micro Miner&r recipes.
moni.quest.447F6F4642A36F9D.description6: Higher-tier versions of these are called &3Quantum Tanks&r and &3Quantum Chests&r. They all require their respective tier &3Hermetic Casings&r to craft.
moni.quest.447F6F4642A36F9D.title: &2Super and Quantum Tanks
moni.quest.4489F567154BDB09.description1: Bits of a &6Blaze Rod&r. Using a &3Macerator&r doubles your yield.
moni.quest.44E2C12FC4C26CA9.description1: With your &2Darmstadtium&r-based machine hulls and &6Wetware Mainframes&r squared away, you can finally get on the path to making a UV &3Circuit Assembling Machine&r.
moni.quest.44E2C12FC4C26CA9.description2: This tier of Assembling Machine unlocks &6Matter Circuits&r, as well as handling crafting recipes up to 524288 EU/t. It can also optionally overclock recipes that consume up to 131072 EU/t for improved speed at the cost of relatively more power.
moni.quest.44E2C12FC4C26CA9.description3: Alternatively, you can make an &6UV Energy Hatch&r and use the &3Large Circuit Assembling Factory&r instead.
moni.quest.44E2C12FC4C26CA9.title: &2UV Circuit Assembler
moni.quest.451FD5817C0415D7.description1: The &3Pyrolyse Oven&r can make more interesting products than just &9Phenol&r.
moni.quest.451FD5817C0415D7.description2: &9Charcoal Byproducts&r breaks down into various wood products, such as &9Wood Tar&r, &9Wood Gas&r, and &9Wood Vinegar&r, each of which can be further broken down into various useful chemical compounds, such as &9Toluene&r, &9Methanol&r, etc.
moni.quest.451FD5817C0415D7.description3: However, to take full advantage of decomposing these wood products, a &3Distillation Tower&r is required, so that all possible outputs can be obtained. You will need more &eDistillation Tower Slices&r than requested in the&r Distillation Tower quest, so be prepared to spend some more &6Stainless Steel&r.
moni.quest.451FD5817C0415D7.title: Pyrolyse Products
moni.quest.456239275544A789.subtitle: &oThis step requires a Forge Hammer at voltage &lLV&r&o or higher.&r
moni.quest.458FF3F9BC8E025B.description1: Coming into &9Ludicrous Voltage&r, many new advanced materials will be required to craft items and components. Most of these materials require &6RTM Alloy Coils&r.
moni.quest.458FF3F9BC8E025B.description2: &6Ruridit&r is an alloy of Ruthenium and Iridium. It is used in LuV components alongside &6HSS-S&r.
moni.quest.458FF3F9BC8E025B.description3: &6Niobium-Titanium&r is the main LuV cable material. Later on, large quantities are required for &6Wetware Circuits&r.
moni.quest.458FF3F9BC8E025B.description4: &6Vanadium-Gallium&r is the main ZPM cable material, but it is used now as an advanced conductive material for certain recipes.
moni.quest.458FF3F9BC8E025B.description5: &6Osmiridium&r (not from the ore) is used to make the &6Ludicrous Voltage Coil&r, for LuV-tier energy I/O. It is later used to make ZPM components.
moni.quest.458FF3F9BC8E025B.description6: &6Indium Tin Barium Titanium Cuprate&r is a LuV superconductor. Its uses are more limited, but it is used in places like the &3Fusion Reactor&r.
moni.quest.458FF3F9BC8E025B.description7: Finally, &6Samarium&r is used for LuV+ motors. It is obtained from &6Rare Earth&r.
moni.quest.458FF3F9BC8E025B.description8: These materials take a long time at high temperatures to smelt, so find a way to keep a stock of them.
moni.quest.458FF3F9BC8E025B.title: &2Advanced LuV Materials
moni.quest.45B17E923E03264B.description1: A catalyst forged from &9Omnium&r, &6Empowered Gears&r, various enhanced &6Nether Stars&r, and a core made of &6The Ultimate Material&r.
moni.quest.45DD07F2BB9C6A59.description1: &9Nether Air&r, collected from &3Gas Collectors&r, can be sent into the &3Vacuum Freezer&r to turn it into &9Liquid Nether Air&r.
moni.quest.45DD07F2BB9C6A59.description2: &9Liquid Nether Air&r can be sent into a &2Distillation Tower&r to break it down into its components.
moni.quest.45DD07F2BB9C6A59.description3: &2Liquid Air and Liquid Ender Air give different useful components too.
moni.quest.45DD07F2BB9C6A59.title: &2Distilling the Nether
moni.quest.45FA4FF0B16B3879.description1: The &6Steam Separator&r functions as 5.3 &7LV &3Centrifuges&r in parallel! It requires an input of &9Steam&r through a &eSteam Hatch&r, but it uses only some Steam.
moni.quest.45FA4FF0B16B3879.description2: While it can't process &9fluids&r, it's perfect for ore processing, letting you get the most out of your dusts and letting you not have to deal with washing your ores in a &3Cauldron&r.
moni.quest.45FA4FF0B16B3879.title: &9Steam Separator
moni.quest.4612D36D22AB4B34.description1: The first circuit to require complex SMDs.
moni.quest.4612D36D22AB4B34.title: &9The Fourth And Final Tier Eight Circuits
moni.quest.4624889F738AB21B.description1: &oThis is part of a Processing Line. Visit the Processing Lines tab to have more info, useful tips and a visual representation.&r
moni.quest.4624889F738AB21B.description2: Now that you have acquired &6Steel&r, your path to infinite cobblestone awaits! The &6Igneous Extruder&r continuously generates cobblestone for free.
moni.quest.4624889F738AB21B.description3: Later on, you could look into the &6Rock Crusher&r, which can do it faster at the cost of requiring power.
moni.quest.4624889F738AB21B.title: &9Infinite Cobblestone
moni.quest.4669C1DCEE4AA563.description1: A &9Tier One Rocket&r will be more than enough to reach the moon, and a launch pad will be needed to set the rocket on.
moni.quest.4669C1DCEE4AA563.description2: While placed, the rocket can be sneak-right-clicked to open a GUI, where you can insert the fuel and access the rocket's inventory.
moni.quest.4669C1DCEE4AA563.title: &9The Rocket
moni.quest.4672EE66D51C32FF.description1: The &9Oxygen Loader&r is used to Load Oxygen into your Space Suit, making it usable for exploring the great beyond.
moni.quest.4672EE66D51C32FF.description2: If you wish to create a base on the moon, it's worth looking into the &9Oxygen Distibutor&r and &9Oxygen Sensor&r. Later on, you can even create the &9Gravity Normalizer&r, which allows you to control gravity itself!
moni.quest.4672EE66D51C32FF.title: &9Breathing in Space
moni.quest.4685AC9E6CD87B77.description1: &3Macerators&r are useful for grinding things down, replacing the &aMortars&r you've needed until now. This is an important machine you will be using for many things in the future.
moni.quest.4685AC9E6CD87B77.description2: You don't really need an LV one, as you can use the superior &3Steam Grinder&r. LV or MV ones could be used for automation. However, HV ones provide chanced outputs, extremely important for &eOre Processing&r and other processes.
moni.quest.4685AC9E6CD87B77.description3: One useful application for a Macerator in the near future is grinding down &6Clay&r or &6Terracotta&r into &6Clay Dust&f.
moni.quest.4685AC9E6CD87B77.description4: Besides not having limited durability, a key advantage of Macerators over Mortars is the chance to get additional materials when grinding things down. These are called &ebyproducts&r, and HV or better Macerators will allow byproducts to appear.
moni.quest.4685AC9E6CD87B77.description5: When reading Macerator recipes in &bEMI&r, you can tell which outputs are byproducts by seeing if &ethe tooltip tells you it has a chance to appear&r: guaranteed outputs do not list a chance. &2The chance increases by a certain amount for each tier of machine you have above the recipe's required tier. This chance is also listed in the tooltip.
moni.quest.4685AC9E6CD87B77.description6: Macerators can now also recycle your old Machines for some extra materials.&r
moni.quest.4685AC9E6CD87B77.description7: Finally, a Macerator will only start processing if there is room for all possible outputs. Make sure you empty them so they can keep working.
moni.quest.4685AC9E6CD87B77.title: &2Macerator
moni.quest.46A56A5E3CC2403F.description1: An Insane Voltage tier &bGregTech&r battery. &2Equivalent to 125 Vibrant Capacitor Banks!
moni.quest.46A56A5E3CC2403F.title: &2IV Power Storage
moni.quest.46AF35D4EECA5BDB.description1: Needs 2 &6Water Source Blocks&r around it to generate water. You will also need a way to pull the water out of the accumulator, such as using an &5LV pump&f as a &acover&f.
moni.quest.46AF35D4EECA5BDB.title: &9Infiniter Water
moni.quest.46C6F922B4ADCC8C.description1: Combining a &6Block of Mythril&r with some &6Stainless Steel Plates&r gets you a &6Machine Frame&r.
moni.quest.46C6F922B4ADCC8C.description2: These frames form the basis of &bThermal Expansion&r's more advanced machinery.
moni.quest.46C6F922B4ADCC8C.title: Thermal Machine Frame
moni.quest.47094A5717952699.description1: An &3Autoclave&r is a machine that uses liquids (usually water) to polish stones, carve gems into lenses, infuse gems with special liquids, and crystallize various dusts.
moni.quest.47094A5717952699.description2: You'll need an Autoclave for many recipes, but most presently you will need it to make &6Pulsating Crystals&r and &6Vibrant Crystals&r from &bEnderIO&r.
moni.quest.47094A5717952699.title: Autoclave
moni.quest.474423E607A129DA.description1: The only downside is that &ethey will not connect to &bApplied Energistics&r &emicroparts&r like slab-form &6Interfaces&r or &6Level Emitters&r, so you have to use AE cables like &6Fluix Cables&r for those. &2Furthermore, they are known to sometimes disconnect from machine hulls and full-block interfaces, so use AE cables like &6Fluix Cables&r for those.
moni.quest.474423E607A129DA.subtitle: &6ME Conduits&r have the advantage of being able to share a block space with other conduit types. Oh, and they're relatively cheaper to make.
moni.quest.476F71CC0B0AC2A4.description1: &2Hydrofluoric Acid is a dangerous acid made by mixing Hydrogen and Fluorine. It is used in the production of Polytetrafluoroethylene, and in Uranium and Naquadah processing.
moni.quest.476F71CC0B0AC2A4.description2: Fluorine is best obtained from Topaz or Bastnasite Ore processing from their Micro Miner missions, and from processing renewable &9Deepslate.
moni.quest.476F71CC0B0AC2A4.title: &2Hydrofluoric Acid
moni.quest.47A81FADD828772D.description1: &6Pyrotheum Dust&r can be crafted from &6Blaze Powder&r, which you already have means of crafting. Use it to craft a &aThermal Elemental Model&r. The rest of the dusts can then be crafted from pristine matter.
moni.quest.47A81FADD828772D.subtitle: An alterative route
moni.quest.47A81FADD828772D.title: &9Neural Networking
moni.quest.47D092CBA484C0DE.description1: With your new &6Epoxy Circuit Boards, &6QBit CPUs&r, and some standard components, you can make the final type of Tier Four Circuit: the &6Quantum Circuit&r.
moni.quest.47D092CBA484C0DE.description2: As the best form of Tier Four circuit, these should be automated and stockpiled. The variant recipe requiring &6Advanced System-on-Chip&r won't be available until ZPM.
moni.quest.47D092CBA484C0DE.title: The Third and Final Tier Four Circuits
moni.quest.480EE330E12084E8.description1: It's a micropart, so you need to place it on an &6ME Cable&r (not a conduit).
moni.quest.480EE330E12084E8.description2: When encoding Processing Patterns, note the scrollbar on the left - you can encode up to 81 types of items and fluids!
moni.quest.480EE330E12084E8.subtitle: As the name suggests, this terminal lets you encode recipes onto &aBlank Patterns&r.
moni.quest.480EE330E12084E8.title: Pattern Encoding Terminal
moni.quest.483652BAEF59E125.description1: &9Hadal Warp Engines&r are components needed for the Tier Nine and Tier Ten Micro Miners, as well as a few End Game recipes.
moni.quest.483652BAEF59E125.title: &9Hadal Warp Engine
moni.quest.483B16F4D4291C82.subtitle: &oThis step requires a Sifter at voltage &lLV&r&o or higher.&r
moni.quest.485CEA4199AAD352.description1: &2For making Wetware Circuits more easily. You need UV-tier power to make them that way.
moni.quest.485CEA4199AAD352.title: &2Highly Advanced SoCs
moni.quest.48E83C38B37DFEE6.description1: If you are distilling Ethanol, you now need an MV Distillery.
moni.quest.48E83C38B37DFEE6.description2: &rThe &3Distillery&r is a single-block machine which only outputs one distillate out of several and &cdiscards&r the rest. You can use this now to get &9Ethanol&r from &9Biomass&r, or to selectively distill &9Oil&r in multiple steps to &9Ethylene&r. Its advantage over the full Tower, apart from cost, is its &9energy efficiency&r. Therefore, it is recommended for fluids with only one useful output, like &9Biomass&r, &9Diluted Sulfuric Acid&r, and &9Diluted Hydrochloric Acid&r.
moni.quest.48E83C38B37DFEE6.description3: However, the Distillation Tower is recommended for advanced chemistry, as most things have more than one important output: &9Fermented Biomass&r, &9Charcoal Byproducts&r from your &3Pyrolyse Oven&r, and the entire line of petrochemicals from &9Oil&r, to name a few.
moni.quest.48E83C38B37DFEE6.description4: You're going to need it soon!
moni.quest.48E83C38B37DFEE6.title: &2Distillery
moni.quest.490F04B181217B28.description1: Low-Enriched Neptunium 236, or &6LEN-236&r, is the next step in the fissile material fuel chain.
moni.quest.490F04B181217B28.description2: This fuel requires an 8:1 ratio of &6Neptunium 237&r to &6Neptunium 236&r. Using only the results from Thorium fission, it will take two batches of &6Depleted TBU Fuel&r to make your first LEN fuel.
moni.quest.490F04B181217B28.description3: Of course, higher order reactions also will result in small amounts of Neptunium that you can work with as well.
moni.quest.490F04B181217B28.description4: &6Depleted LEN-236&r gives a small bit of Neptunium 237 back, but principally provides &6Plutonium&r and &6Americium&r isotopes.
moni.quest.490F04B181217B28.title: Neptunium Fusion
moni.quest.4978EC7E56F89AB0.title: 元素番号054番:キセノン
moni.quest.49B872B193268554.description1: The first decent source of &6Dragon Eggs&r and &6Stabilized Einsteinium&r.
moni.quest.49B872B193268554.description6: Once you reach the &aHyperbolic Microverse Projector&r, this microminer can also get the following:
moni.quest.49B872B193268554.title: &2Tier Six Micro Miner
moni.quest.49C8716030809478.description1: The &3Crafting Core&r is used to convert special crystalline materials into empowered variants.
moni.quest.49C8716030809478.description2: The &3Canner&r can be used to fill the fluid cells used in it's recipes.
moni.quest.49C8716030809478.title: &9Empowerment
moni.quest.49D33146A1F417E8.description1: &9Radon&r will be needed in large quantities.
moni.quest.49D33146A1F417E8.description2: For now, you'll need to obtain it from Tier Two Micro Miner missions, in the form of &6Radon Salt&r. Electrolyze it for Radon and &6Rock Salt&r. &2You can also get it from distilling liquid Ender Air.&r
moni.quest.49D33146A1F417E8.description3: Later, it will be possible to make Radon using a &bGregTech &3Fusion Reactor&r.
moni.quest.49D33146A1F417E8.title: &2Radon
moni.quest.49E9A178F6A52A62.description1: With your &2Naquadah Alloy&r-based machine hulls and &6Crystal Processor Mainframes&r squared away, you can finally get on the path to making a ZPM &3Circuit Assembling Machine&r.
moni.quest.49E9A178F6A52A62.description2: This tier of Assembling Machine unlocks &6Wetware Circuits&r, as well as handling crafting recipes up to 131072 EU/t. It can also optionally overclock recipes that consume up to 32768 EU/t for improved speed at the cost of relatively more power.
moni.quest.49E9A178F6A52A62.description3: Alternatively, you can make a &6ZPM Energy Hatch&r and use the &3Large Circuit Assembling Factory&r instead.
moni.quest.49E9A178F6A52A62.title: &2ZPM Circuit Assembler
moni.quest.4A56822201818607.description1: Crush your &6Cobblestone&r into &6Stone Dust&r. You'll actually get a lot of &6Stone Dust&r from &eOre Processing&r, but this could be your backup source. You'll need this for &6Concrete&r. You can also centrifuge this, although the resources gained are not very useful, and are in very small amounts.
moni.quest.4A56822201818607.subtitle: &oThis step requires a Macerator at voltage &lLV&r&o or higher.&r
moni.quest.4A696D4BA5442928.description1: &bFunctional Storage&f provides a huge amount of storage for a single item type. Use them for things you have a lot of, such as stone, dirt and ores.
moni.quest.4A696D4BA5442928.description2: &9Framing Template items can be used to easily decorate your drawers.&r
moni.quest.4A696D4BA5442928.description3: Furthermore, you can do special stuff with your drawers, with &9Tools&r and &9Upgrades! Search &e@Functionalstorage&r in &bEMI&r to see them!
moni.quest.4A696D4BA5442928.subtitle: &oThis quest completes with any drawer.
moni.quest.4A696D4BA5442928.title: &9Drawers
moni.quest.4A6F916494B787AE.title: 元素番号001番:水素
moni.quest.4A8FB1EF600F0882.description1: &6Americium Ingots&r are obtained by placing &9NuclearCraft&r Americium isotopes into an &3Extractor&r and solidifying the fluid. As with other GT materials, use the ingot or fluid to forge the other forms.
moni.quest.4A8FB1EF600F0882.description2: &2You're gonna need quite a bit of Americium.&r You cannot convert this form of Americium back to NuclearCraft Americium isotopes. These are also the best &aItem Pipe&r material, in terms of throughput.
moni.quest.4A8FB1EF600F0882.title: &2Americium Ingot
moni.quest.4A96659253CCFACF.description1: Well, you need patterns too I guess.
moni.quest.4A96659253CCFACF.description2: The details of autocrafting will be explained in a later quest.
moni.quest.4A96659253CCFACF.subtitle: Autocrafting at last.
moni.quest.4A96659253CCFACF.title: Crafting Units
moni.quest.4AC51394FB5152E5.description1: The most advanced substrate available, prepared for bleeding-edge bioengineering technology.
moni.quest.4AC51394FB5152E5.description2: &6Wetware Circuit Boards&r are the basis of &6Wetware&r circuits.
moni.quest.4AF3060B2426B25F.title: 元素番号025番:マンガン
moni.quest.4B338515E84FC51A.description1: Steam Machines can run recipes listed as up to &d32 EU/t&r. They need to have their vent side unobstructed. Use a Wrench to change the venting side.
Steam Machines can run recipes listed as up to &d32 EU/t&r. They need to have their vent side unobstructed. Use a Wrench to change the venting side.
moni.quest.4B338515E84FC51A.description2: - &3Forge Hammer&r: Allows you to make &62 plates&r from &63 ingots&r.
- &3Forge Hammer&r: Allows you to make &62 plates&r from &63 ingots&r.
moni.quest.4B338515E84FC51A.description3: - &3Macerator&r: Allows you to grind &6Clay&r, and other ingots, into their respective &eDusts&r.
- &3Macerator&r: Allows you to grind &6Clay&r, and other ingots, into their respective &eDusts&r.
moni.quest.4B338515E84FC51A.description4: - &3Compressor&r: Allows you to make &6Compressed Fireclay&r, and other materials.
- &3Compressor&r: Allows you to make &6Compressed Fireclay&r, and other materials.
moni.quest.4B338515E84FC51A.description5: - &3Alloy Smelter&r: Allows you to make &6Bronze&r more efficiently, as well as other useful alloys like &6Invar&r. Also allows you to cast &6Glass&r, and make components like &eGears&r more easily, and make &6Rubber Sheets&r, with Molds.

- &3Alloy Smelter&r: Allows you to make &6Bronze&r more efficiently, as well as other useful alloys like &6Invar&r. Also allows you to cast &6Glass&r, and make components like &eGears&r more easily, and make &6Rubber Sheets&r, with Molds.
moni.quest.4B338515E84FC51A.description6: You can upgrade them to HP version with Steel, which doubles their speed.
You can upgrade them to HP version with Steel, which doubles their speed.
moni.quest.4B338515E84FC51A.description7: If the machine sounds start to get on your nerves, you can mute GT machines with a GT Hammer.
If the machine sounds start to get on your nerves, you can mute GT machines with a GT Hammer.
moni.quest.4B43ABA024E9A0B9.description1: &eGlass&r is extremely useful, and will be used for many things in the future. Currently, you need it for the &cSteam Extractor&r, and can use it for &6Solar Boilers&r.
&eGlass&r is extremely useful, and will be used for many things in the future. Currently, you need it for the &cSteam Extractor&r, and can use it for &6Solar Boilers&r.
moni.quest.4B43ABA024E9A0B9.description2: Currently, your only available method to make Glass is through &eGlass Dust&r. Combine &eQuartz Sand&r with a &eTiny Pile of Flint Dust&r in a &3Crafting Table&r. Then, alloy it with the &eBlock Mold&r you have crafted, and voila!

Currently, your only available method to make Glass is through &eGlass Dust&r. Combine &eQuartz Sand&r with a &eTiny Pile of Flint Dust&r in a &3Crafting Table&r. Then, alloy it with the &eBlock Mold&r you have crafted, and voila!
moni.quest.4B43ABA024E9A0B9.description3: Later, to save you from this suffering, you can make an &6Arc Furnace&r, which makes two Glass, from one Sand.
Later, to save you from this suffering, you can make an &6Arc Furnace&r, which makes two Glass, from one Sand.
moni.quest.4BBB1F5A2657650D.title: 元素番号029番:銅
moni.quest.4BC0A5F24E5837ED.description1: &9Water&r can be achieved in many ways, but the most notable are: &6Water Collectors&r, which are very slow but cheap; &bThermal &6Aqueous Accumulators&r, which are a bit more expensive but way faster; and &bGregTech &6Infinite Water Covers&r, which are much more expensive, but save space because they're covers, and make water 16x faster than &6Accumulators&r.
moni.quest.4BC0A5F24E5837ED.description2: Right now, you should probably use the &6Aqueous Accumulator&r.
moni.quest.4BC0A5F24E5837ED.description3: In this case, you'll need &9Water&r for &6Clay&r.
moni.quest.4BC0A5F24E5837ED.subtitle: &oYes, there's a quest for &9Water&r.
moni.quest.4BC0A5F24E5837ED.title: Water
moni.quest.4BE6C4E7FDF7C71B.description1: Thorium is a basic fissile material that can be used to get into the fissile chain. Thorium comes from &6Pitchblende Ore&r, &6Thorium Ore&r, and even &9Deepslate&r (with a few processing steps).
moni.quest.4BE6C4E7FDF7C71B.description2: Thorium-Bred Uranium, or &6TBU&r for short, is made from nine clumps of &6Thorium 232&r, made from Thorium enriched in a &3Thermal Centrifuge&r.
moni.quest.4BE6C4E7FDF7C71B.description3: This fuel is processed in your &3Fission Reactor&r by placing it in the controller. When a redstone signal is applied it will burn the fuel, generating some power from the reactor and after a while you'll get &6Depleted TBU Fuel&r&r.
moni.quest.4BE6C4E7FDF7C71B.description4: The depleted fuel provides tiny clumps of &6Uranium 233&r, &6Uranium 235&r, &6Neptunium 236&r, and &6Neptunium 237&r.
moni.quest.4BE6C4E7FDF7C71B.title: &2Thorium Fission
moni.quest.4BEC129D530376BF.description1: Crafting in a digital grid is heaven after using primitive wooden tables for so long.
moni.quest.4BEC129D530376BF.description2: It's a micropart, so you need to place it on an &6ME Cable&r (not a conduit).
moni.quest.4BEC129D530376BF.subtitle: Bye-bye Crafting Table
moni.quest.4BEC129D530376BF.title: Crafting Terminal
moni.quest.4C475D22CC95EB93.description1: You'll be needing large quantities of the various Noble Gases so you should get this automated and running continuously.
moni.quest.4C475D22CC95EB93.description2: &2After liquefaction, Overworld Air grants Helium and Argon; Nether Air grants Helium-3 and Neon; Ender Air grants Helium, Krypton, Xenon, and Radon.
moni.quest.4C475D22CC95EB93.description3: Certain Noble Gases (as well as Nitrogen) can also boost the speed of EBF processes.
moni.quest.4C475D22CC95EB93.title: &2Noble Gases
moni.quest.4C76017864258EA9.description1: &2Gasoline is a powerful combustion fuel, generating 1600 EU per mB of fluid. It can also be substituted for Cetane-Boosted Diesel in Cryolobus production.
moni.quest.4C76017864258EA9.description8: To get the most out of this, run it in an Extreme Combustion Engine with Liquid Oxygen.
moni.quest.4C76017864258EA9.title: &2Gasoline
moni.quest.4CC612FF64877C60.description1: As you continue to progress, crafting times for more advanced &3Electric Blast Furnace&r recipes will continue to increase. More advanced coils increase the operating temperature so you can smelt more advanced materials, &2and they also grant energy efficiency bonuses and speed bonuses to overclocking.&r
moni.quest.4CC612FF64877C60.description2: Despite this, you'll still need to get your infrastructure for smelting, as well as power generation, up to par.
moni.quest.4CC612FF64877C60.description3: You don't need to get all eight of these completed and running just yet, but plan to at some point in the future. Instead of upgrading existing EBFs, have them passively automating a stock of materials and build new EBFs with higher specifications for new materials.
moni.quest.4CC612FF64877C60.title: &2Blast Furnaces Galore
moni.quest.4CD6C60CBEFFA317.description1: &6Cupronickel Coils&r form part of the structure of a few multiblocks. Presently, those are the &3Electric Blast Furnace&r and &3Pyrolyse Oven&r. Each tier of coil unlocks new recipes and provides various bonuses to the multiblock they are attached to.
moni.quest.4CD6C60CBEFFA317.description2: Cupronickel Coils are produced in the &3Assembler&r with &62x Cupronickel Wire&r, &6Bronze Foil&r, and &9Liquid Tin Alloy&r.
moni.quest.4CD6C60CBEFFA317.description3: For now, you need 16 coils for the &3Electric Blast Furnace&r and 16 for the &3Pyrolyse Oven&r. That totals to 176 Copper, 128 Nickel, 32 Tin, and 16 Iron.
moni.quest.4CD6C60CBEFFA317.title: &2Cupronickel Coils
moni.quest.4CE0D6E9E7DE3129.title: 元素番号096番:キュリウム
moni.quest.4CF399EC00A65E3A.description1: Reinforcing your Microminer with &6Activated Netherite&r lets it retrieve &9Creative Storage Data&r.
moni.quest.4CF399EC00A65E3A.description2: Similarly to how the Creative Tank Data works, the Creative Storage Data lets you assemble the means to create infinite storage, in the form of drawer upgrades, as well as Quantum Chests and Tanks.
moni.quest.4CF399EC00A65E3A.title: &9Creative Storage Data
moni.quest.4D6AC14CAEEFC793.description1: Vanilla enchanting mechanics are just so tedious. Don't you wish you could just make a specific enchant instead of grinding levels and rolling the dice?
moni.quest.4D6AC14CAEEFC793.description3: The &3Dark Steel Enchanter&r is a device that uses &6Book and Quill&r, experience levels, lapis, and enchant-specific items to create an &6Enchanted Book&r with an enchantment of your choosing. Then you can just use an Anvil to enchant your item like usual.
moni.quest.4D6AC14CAEEFC793.description4: You can also make the &9Mending&r enchant which allows you to infinitely repair the item when damaged using &9Liquid XP&r in an &bEnder IO &aFluid Tank&r or &aPressurized Fluid Tank&r. Keep in mind that &9Mending&r does not work on &3Gregtech Tools&r.
moni.quest.4DB622A78605A2EB.description1: The first and most expensive Tier Six Circuit, needed for crafting the &3IV Circuit Assembling Machine&r.
moni.quest.4DB622A78605A2EB.description2: Requires a bunch of standard circuit components.
moni.quest.4DB622A78605A2EB.title: The First Tier Six Ciruits
moni.quest.4DC7B2BB86A2FEBD.title: 元素番号056番:バリウム
moni.quest.4DCB58F9B3771DC8.title: 元素番号002番:ヘリウム
moni.quest.4DED2A24CB1A56F5.description1: The strongest circuit needs the strongest SoCs.
moni.quest.4DED2A24CB1A56F5.description2: These also can be used to make &6Matter Processors&r more easily.
moni.quest.4DF92773C82F4AAC.description1: You don't need it just yet, but you can make it now.
moni.quest.4DF92773C82F4AAC.description2: This is a critical material for the End Game.
moni.quest.4DF92773C82F4AAC.subtitle: ...Did it just move?
moni.quest.4E39FDB6FACDF522.title: 元素番号044番:ルテニウム
moni.quest.4E4F03C44623A85D.description1: The &9Helical Fusion Reactor&r is a very large multiblock structure used for fusing elements into heavier ones &ein parallel&r.
moni.quest.4E4F03C44623A85D.description2: For every Hatch it has, its buffer increases by 80M EU, and has a maximum of 1280M.
moni.quest.4E4F03C44623A85D.title: &9Helical Fusion Reactor
moni.quest.4E63CE9607E3B792.description1: With your &6Tungstensteel&r-based machine hulls and &6Nanoprocessor Mainframes&r squared away, you can finally get on the path to making an Insane Voltage &3Circuit Assembling Machine&r.
moni.quest.4E63CE9607E3B792.description2: This tier of Assembling Machine unlocks &6Quantum Circuits&r, as well as handling crafting recipes up to 8192 EU/t. It can also optionally overclock recipes that consume up to 2048 EU/t for improved speed at the cost of relatively more power.
moni.quest.4E63CE9607E3B792.description3: Alternatively, you can make an &6IV Energy Hatch&r and use the &3Large Circuit Assembling Factory&r instead.
moni.quest.4E63CE9607E3B792.title: &2IV Circuit Assembler
moni.quest.4E9530E62A4B673B.description1: Refines &6Liquid Naquadah Fuels&r into more potent varients.
moni.quest.4E9530E62A4B673B.title: &9Naquadah Fuel Refining
moni.quest.4EA1E0D437528747.description1: Blasting your &9Dormant Infinity Compound Ingots&r and &cInfinity Catalysts&r together will give you &6Infinity Ingots&r, one of the strongest materials ever created.
moni.quest.4EA1E0D437528747.description2: Infinity Ingots see a couple of uses, the most notable at the moment being their use in the creation of &9Dimensional Circuits&r.
moni.quest.4EA1E0D437528747.subtitle: I bet we could make hulls out of this.
moni.quest.4EA1E0D437528747.title: &9Infinity Ingots
moni.quest.4EAD8756BAAC6B2E.description1: If you don't want to mine Obsidian by hand, consider using a Fluid Solidifier to turn &cLava&r into &6Obsidian Blocks&r for you. The process is slow and energy intensive, though.
moni.quest.4EAD8756BAAC6B2E.description2: &3Fluid Solidifiers&r are useful for lots of other things too, of course. Look through the various molds to see what you can make with one.
moni.quest.4EAD8756BAAC6B2E.title: Fluid Solidifier
moni.quest.4EB9D1ADC4814330.description1: This is the first circuit that requires &6Polyethyl Cyanoacrylate&r, so go check that out.
moni.quest.4EB9D1ADC4814330.title: &9The Second Tier Nine Circuit
moni.quest.4EC59BC9BCCB3C5D.description1: &2With advanced alloys from the Alloy Blast Smelter and IV Machines, you can make large versions of most GT machines.
moni.quest.4EC59BC9BCCB3C5D.description2: &rThese are formed like multiblocks. You can add a &3Parallel Control Hatch&r in order to allow them to process &9more recipes&r at the same time. The highest tier of Parallel Control Hatch can facilitate processing &94096 recipes&r at once!
moni.quest.4EC59BC9BCCB3C5D.description3: &9Crafting Co-Processers increase the rate that your ME network will "push" batches of items out, perfect for machines like these.&r
moni.quest.4EC59BC9BCCB3C5D.description4: Look up the usages of Parallel Hatches in EMI to see details of all the multiblock machines.
moni.quest.4EC59BC9BCCB3C5D.description5: Most of the advanced alloys used to make the casings of these multiblocks are made in the &3Alloy Blast Smelter&r. If you can't seem to find the recipes for them, look for the &eMolten Fluid&r form.
moni.quest.4EC59BC9BCCB3C5D.title: &9Multiblock Madness
moni.quest.4EDE4D4D109BF2C2.title: 元素番号092番:ウラン
moni.quest.4F239316765C7CA1.description1: &9Item cards&r are useful for moving items between inventories over moderate distances.
moni.quest.4F239316765C7CA1.description2: Like with Fluid cards, these accept &6Logistics Overclockers&r to further increase throughput.
moni.quest.4F239316765C7CA1.title: &9Item Cards&r
moni.quest.4F2A97487AE923CE.description1: &2Double Plates&r made from &6Enderium&r used for the Tier Six Micro Miner.
moni.quest.4F2A97487AE923CE.title: &2Enderium Double Plates
moni.quest.4F4D0F44B615AF4C.description1: &2Sodium Persulfate and Iron III Chloride&r are used to make cheaper &9Good Circuit Boards&r, as it cuts the Silver amount by a factor of four. They are also &9required&r to make &9Plastic Circuit Boards&r, and circuit boards afterwards.
moni.quest.4F4D0F44B615AF4C.description2: Making &aSodium Persulfate&r with &6Salt&r will yield &aHydrochloric Acid&r as a coproduct, which you may re-use to make &aIron III Chloride&r. This is the best approach right now, but the decision is entirely yours. With more automation later in the game, Iron III Chloride will be the cheaper and more straightforward path.
moni.quest.4F4D0F44B615AF4C.description3: Sodium Persulfate&r can also be used in &9Ore Processing&r in the &3Chemical Bath&r to get various bonus outputs you would not normally obtain. It is completely optional, but pretty rewarding.
moni.quest.4F4D0F44B615AF4C.subtitle: Iron The Third
moni.quest.4F4D0F44B615AF4C.title: &2Sodium Persulfate and Iron III Chloride
moni.quest.4F4F120AFB3A9250.description1: Now that you have &6Energetic Alloy&r, it's time to make some better cards!
moni.quest.4F4F120AFB3A9250.description2: Each time you upgrade your Cards, you'll also get more of them. Neat!
moni.quest.4F4F120AFB3A9250.description3: Make sure you're using an &3Assembling Machine&r to craft these things. Making them by hand isn't as efficient as the machine.
moni.quest.4F4F120AFB3A9250.title: Energetic Alloy Energy Cards
moni.quest.4F572CA3678CB287.description2: A reagent used in the majority of &6Micro Miner&r missions.
moni.quest.4F572CA3678CB287.description3: There are several ways to produce &6Quantum Flux&r. All are viable, so figure out which one works best for you.
moni.quest.4F8B4DCE7C340418.description1: &2Double Plates&r made from &6Iridium&r for Tier Five and Tier Eight Micro Miners.
moni.quest.4F8B4DCE7C340418.title: &2Iridium Double Plates
moni.quest.4FABACAB7C4A74AC.description1: &2Use the Stem Cells and more advanced materials to build a Neuro Processing Unit. This is used in the first Wetware Circuit.
moni.quest.4FABACAB7C4A74AC.title: &2Neuro Processing Unit
moni.quest.4FAFF184242F5EB8.description1: Run the plates through the respective &3Inscribers&r with &aPresses&r to make the printed plates, then combine the plates and circuit to form the Accumulation Processor.
moni.quest.4FAFF184242F5EB8.subtitle: &6Accumulation Processors&r are made from a &6Black Steel Plate&r, a &6Silicon Plate&r, and any tier three circuit.
moni.quest.4FAFF184242F5EB8.title: &9Accumlation Processors
moni.quest.4FC24CBCD13C3D08.description1: &6Rare Earth&r comes from either centrifuging certain Impure Dusts, or processing those same Purified Dusts.
moni.quest.4FC24CBCD13C3D08.description2: The sources are essentially &6Redstone&r, and everything inside of &6Bastnasite&r veins.
moni.quest.4FE53F31E68F4C1C.description1: &9With EMI, instead of showing you a separate recipe for every tool-resource combination, tools are instead grouped. You can use any tool from that group - for example, the &6#forge:tools/hammers &9group means that any &aHammer &9can be used there.
moni.quest.4FE53F31E68F4C1C.description2: First, make a &aHammer&f (not a &aMining Hammer&f, mind you... six ingots, not plates). Hammers can be used to turn &etwo ingots into one plate&f. &6Plates&f can make a &aFile&f, Files can make &6Rods&f, etc. Use EMI to work your way down the list of tools.
moni.quest.4FE53F31E68F4C1C.description3: &6Wrought Iron&f is probably your best bet for a tool material right now, but better materials will become available as you progress.
&6Iron&f is probably your best bet for a tool material right now, but better materials will become available as you progress.
moni.quest.4FE53F31E68F4C1C.title: Some Starter Tools
moni.quest.500B77982B9CDF9B.subtitle: &oThis step requires an Extractor at voltage &lLV&r&o or higher.&r
moni.quest.500B77982B9CDF9B.title: Resonant Ender
moni.quest.500E619D568C07C2.description1: &2Technically not new to CEu, but it was disabled in the original version, and it had much less functionality in CE.&r
moni.quest.500E619D568C07C2.description2: The Arc Furnace allows you to make &6Annealed Copper&r, which will be used in the MV Age. It can also make 2 pieces of Glass from 1 Sand. Later, it can make &2Tempered Glass&r for use in higher-tier recipes.
moni.quest.500E619D568C07C2.description3: The Arc Furnace also functions as a &auniversal recycling machine&r. Pretty much anything can be recycled into ingots and dusts of its base components.
moni.quest.500E619D568C07C2.description4: All of its recipes require Oxygen.
moni.quest.500E619D568C07C2.description5: Most Arc Furnace recipes use exactly 30 EU/t, so you can get a lot of mileage out of an LV one. However, many recipes take long enough that you may want to upgrade at some point.
moni.quest.500E619D568C07C2.title: &2Arc Furnace
moni.quest.502AB887CB316377.description1: The reaction that produces &9Bio Diesel&r is also the only source of &9Glycerol&r, which is an easy way to make &9Epichlorohydrin&r, an important ingredient of &9Epoxy&r.
moni.quest.502AB887CB316377.description2: &9Glycerol&r is also used in the production of &9Glyceryl Trinitrate&r, an important step in making &6Dynamite&r, which can be used later in the &3Implosion Compressor&r.
moni.quest.502AB887CB316377.description3: Even if you're otherwise going all in on petrochemistry for Epoxy, you'll probably end up with some Bio Diesel as a result of making Glycerol, unless you're using &6TNT&r.
moni.quest.502AB887CB316377.description4: Bio Diesel can be used for power, but it is probably better to convert it to &2Cetane-Boosted Diesel&r.
moni.quest.502AB887CB316377.title: Bio Diesel and Glycerol
moni.quest.503CA19637471E6E.title: &9Reinforced Backpack
moni.quest.5054D3FA7E96EB83.description1: These will be your first major use for &6Holmium&r.
moni.quest.5054D3FA7E96EB83.title: &9Dimensional Processing Unit
moni.quest.50591843C8501055.description1: &bGregTech&r adds an &einteractive in-world preview&r for all &bGregTech&r multiblocks! &6Shift-right-click&r a placed controller &ewith an empty hand&r to activate a hologram depicting the default layout of the structure to help you with building. As you place blocks, the structure will be validated and the &efirst incorrect block&r it detects will be highlighted in red.
moni.quest.50591843C8501055.description2: &6Sneak-right-click&r to cycle from the full view through each layer. When on the final layer of the preview, this will remove the preview.
moni.quest.50591843C8501055.description3: &6Sneak-left-click&r to go back to the previous layer, or close the preview from the full view.
moni.quest.50591843C8501055.description4: In the &eJEI previews&r for multiblocks, &6left-click&r and drag the mouse to rotate the preview.
moni.quest.50591843C8501055.description5: Additionally, you can &6right-click&r and drag the mouse to pan the preview or &6shift-right-click&r and drag to zoom in or out.
moni.quest.50591843C8501055.description6: Some blocks in the multiblock preview have additional tooltips to provide more information on how the multiblock can form.
moni.quest.50591843C8501055.title: Multiblock Machine Previews
moni.quest.508452E1A3E09B56.description1: Overclocking aside, as you continue to progress in &5Monifactory&f, materials made in the &3Electric Blast Furnace&f will take longer to complete. &eMore advanced coils allow for the furnace to &eget hot enough to process more advanced materials&f, &2and they also granting energy efficiency bonuses and speed bonuses to overclocking.&r
moni.quest.508452E1A3E09B56.description2: Despite this, you'll still need to continually expand your smelting and power generation infrastructure.
moni.quest.508452E1A3E09B56.description3: You don't have to get all four of these Electric Blast Furnaces completed and running just yet, but be prepared to make many of them over the course of the pack.
moni.quest.508452E1A3E09B56.description4: &2As a reminder, all blocks and hatches can be shared across EBFs, except Maintenance!
moni.quest.508452E1A3E09B56.title: &2More Blast Furnaces
moni.quest.50FB5E0B0E0B142F.description1: You can make a net-positive &6Pulsating Prediction Matrix&r setup that uses &6Enderman Data Models&r to produce &6Ender Pearls&r. A Self-Aware &6Enderman Data Model&r can supply enough &6Ender Pearls&r to support the running of 6.2 other models.
moni.quest.517A89E954C7EA74.description1: An &3MV Electrolyzer&r allows you to process recipes that require up to 128 EU/t, and can optionally overclock recipes costing at most 32 EU/t.
moni.quest.517A89E954C7EA74.description2: This means you can split more kinds of things for useful products.
moni.quest.5199E6FAA4B699CD.title: LuV Power Storage
moni.quest.519A11FDC6A7EF21.description1: Circuits along this line are UV, and can all be substituted in recipes.
moni.quest.519A11FDC6A7EF21.title: UV Circuits
moni.quest.51A463024F35DC2E.description1: This is the highest tier of polymer. It is used in crafting &2Advanced SMD components and ZPM+ Machine Hulls,&r among other things.
moni.quest.51A463024F35DC2E.description2: This polymer can require up to &914 steps&r to create from scratch, but multiple steps are able to be skipped through distillation of various liquids. &6Check what steps you can easily skip!&r
moni.quest.51A463024F35DC2E.title: &2Polybenzimidazole (PBI)
moni.quest.51F895647CB242F1.description2: Or you can heat &9Acetone&r, or a few other approaches. Check out &bEMI&r for the various options.
moni.quest.51F895647CB242F1.title: Ethenone
moni.quest.521977C7165229F1.description1: Now you can craft the &6Quantum Processor Mainframe&r, the first Tier Seven circuit.
moni.quest.521977C7165229F1.description2: These are required for crafting the Ludicrous Voltage (LuV) &3Circuit Assembler&r.
moni.quest.521977C7165229F1.title: &2The First Tier Seven Circuits
moni.quest.5228EFF7200B4C91.subtitle: &oThis step requires a Forge Hammer at voltage &lLV&r&o or higher.&r
moni.quest.524E7A937C2D9DDD.description1: Allows for the creation of HASoCs.
moni.quest.524E7A937C2D9DDD.title: &2Neutronium Boules
moni.quest.527F56DFAD5E20EC.description1: &9Gregtech Axes are able to veinmine an entire tree at once!
moni.quest.527F56DFAD5E20EC.title: &9Tree chopping
moni.quest.52837FD72580F141.description1: With ten slots for Storage Cells, you can store a huge number of items inside this single block, and search through them all with a &6Terminal&r. You just gotta make all those Storage Cells.
moni.quest.52837FD72580F141.description2: If you somehow run out of room, you can make another ME Drive for even more slots! So many cells, so many items!
moni.quest.52837FD72580F141.subtitle: *Slaps &6ME Drive&r* this bad boy can fit so many &6Storage Cells&r in it!
moni.quest.52837FD72580F141.title: Digital Storage For Days
moni.quest.529D50CE814AF449.description1: This pack has &aSnad&r, which is simply a sand-like block that instantly grows sugar cane/cactus on top of it when it receives either a block update or a redstone update.
moni.quest.529D50CE814AF449.description2: The sugar cane it produces can be used as a fuel for your dynamos, and later you can even brew it for &9Biomass&r.
moni.quest.529D50CE814AF449.description3: This quest calls for a &aRedstone Clock&r because it grows Snad even on the fastest setting - vanilla Observer clocks pulse too quickly.
moni.quest.529D50CE814AF449.description4: To collect the sugar cane, you can use a piston and an observer.
moni.quest.529D50CE814AF449.description5: For now, a &3Vacuum Chest&r should help keep the floor clean, and causes less lag than Hoppers. A &aVoid Upgrade&r in a &6Storage Drawer&r will automatically delete any items that overflow the drawer's capacity, so it's a good way to ensure you don't crash your server from accumulating a massive sugar cane pile before safer block breakers are available to you.
moni.quest.529D50CE814AF449.rich_descrip: If the noises are annoying to you, take a look at
quest to see how to mute them.
moni.quest.529D50CE814AF449.subtitle: Yes, Snad.
moni.quest.529D50CE814AF449.title: Snad
moni.quest.52B20235882063BF.description1: Combine several components into a catalyst.
moni.quest.52F1953ED72A8AA6.description1: The &3Advanced Microverse Projector&r is a more powerful projector required for sending &6Tier Four&r through &6Tier Six Micro Miners&r into microverses.
moni.quest.52F1953ED72A8AA6.description2: Initial missions can operate on &eIV power&r, while &eLuV power&r is required for later missions. As with the prior projector, this structure supports overclocking and the position of buses and hatches can be swapped with any &6Microverse Projector Casing&r.
moni.quest.52F1953ED72A8AA6.description3: &6Sneak-right click&r the controller to enable the in-world preview.
moni.quest.52F1953ED72A8AA6.title: Advanced Microverse Projector
moni.quest.5301E546BAA69844.description1: You might want to save your &6Coal Dust&r for circuits and use &6Charcoal Dust&r instead. Later, you can also process either &6Coal Coke Dust&r or &2Diamond Dust&r into &6Carbon Dust&r, which can be used for other alloys.
moni.quest.5301E546BAA69844.subtitle: You already have &6Steel&r, but it can be made faster in the &3Alloy Smelter&r, at the cost of EU.
moni.quest.5301E546BAA69844.title: &9Alloying Steel
moni.quest.53205E306EE07F6F.description1: Cards to carry even MORE RF power.
moni.quest.53205E306EE07F6F.description2: You're making these in an &3Assembling Machine&r, right?
moni.quest.53205E306EE07F6F.title: Vibrant Alloy Energy Cards
moni.quest.53347AAAE4495F95.description1: &2Initial circuit components are a bit more difficult in CEu, and you need Arsenic in addition to Gallium.&r
moni.quest.53347AAAE4495F95.description2: For &9Gallium&r, you may, ranked from worst to best:
moni.quest.53347AAAE4495F95.description3: - &3Electrolyze &aSphalerite&r for a low chance of small dust. Note that you lose on direct smelting value.
moni.quest.53347AAAE4495F95.description4: -&r Put &aCrushed Bauxite&r in the &3Chemical Bath&r. Note that this requires &9Sodium Persulfate&r.
moni.quest.53347AAAE4495F95.description5: - Obtain it as a Byproduct of &aSphalerite&r Ore Processing, in the &3Thermal Centrifuge&r or &3Centrifuge&r.
moni.quest.53347AAAE4495F95.description6: &2For Arsenic, you must centrifuge Realgar Dust, or (more involvedly) flash smelt Cobaltite Dust in the EBF, and electrolyse the resultant Arsenic Trioxide.
moni.quest.53347AAAE4495F95.description7: Combine both in a Mixer to make Gallium Arsenide.
moni.quest.53347AAAE4495F95.title: &2Gallium Arsenide
moni.quest.5357A16B5BF62C96.description2: It might seem crazy right now, but you'll want a dedicated &3Chemical Reactor&r for pretty much every chemical you want to process. You probably want to hold off on doing that until you've got a solid base of autocrafting though... it stings a lot less when you can just request crafts of Chemical Reactors from your AE2 system.
moni.quest.5357A16B5BF62C96.title: MV Chemical Reactor
moni.quest.536CEDA3142BCE63.description1: Circuits along this line are LuV, and can all be substituted in recipes.
moni.quest.536CEDA3142BCE63.description2: The pattern stays the same: the rightmost circuit comes in larger quantities and is overall easier to produce.
moni.quest.536CEDA3142BCE63.description3: Make sure to set up wetware board production as soon as possible! They take a very long time to make.
moni.quest.536CEDA3142BCE63.title: LuV Circuits
moni.quest.53C00EA9D9BEE776.description1: The Second Micro Miner! &2You'll need that Phosphorous in the LV Field Generators.&r
It is also a primary source of &6Stellar Creation Data&r, which will be useful much, much later.
moni.quest.53C00EA9D9BEE776.description2: &9Don't forget that you can automate Extended Crafting recipes before you get PackagedAuto by converting your Extended Crafting tables into autocrafting tables.
moni.quest.53C00EA9D9BEE776.description3: This Micro Miner can get you:&6
moni.quest.53C00EA9D9BEE776.title: &9Tier Two Micro Miner
moni.quest.53EC3831D66769CA.description2: This alloy is cooked in an &3Electric Blast Furnace&r and cooled in a &3Vacuum Freezer&r.
moni.quest.53EC3831D66769CA.title: High Speed Steel Type G
moni.quest.542F0090D8975D3C.description1: In &9Monifactory&r, all dimensional transit is done through the power of &6TelePastries&r. No Portals here!
moni.quest.542F0090D8975D3C.description2: This quest is repeatable and gives you a free cake to the &2Overworld&r or &7Void World&r every hour. You can also refill your cakes with the items indicated in their tooltips.
moni.quest.542F0090D8975D3C.description3: &cDon't forget to have a way to get back!&r If you do forget, click on the Emergency Items heart on the right side of the quest book screen.
moni.quest.542F0090D8975D3C.subtitle: Cakes are quantum objects!
moni.quest.542F0090D8975D3C.title: Cake Based Dimensional Transit
moni.quest.5430ED88A8D10502.description1: You might want to get yourself an anvil instead of breaking and crafting new tools every time. Anvils&f spawn abundantly in &bLost Cities&f buildings, so go and snatch one!
moni.quest.5430ED88A8D10502.description2: Put a damaged tool and some material it's made of inside. For example, you'll need to use &6Wrought Iron Ingots&f to repair tools made of &6Wrought Iron&f. The only tools unable to be repaired are the Mortar and the Plunger.

Put a damaged tool inside and put some material it's made of. For example, you'll need to put &6Iron Ingots&f to repair tools made of &6Iron&f. The only tools unable to be repaired are the mortar and the plunger.

Put a damaged tool inside and put some material it's made of. For example, you'll need to put &6Wrought Iron Ingots&f to repair tools made of &6Wrought Iron&f. The only tools unable to be repaired are the mortar and the plunger.
moni.quest.5430ED88A8D10502.description3: Also, you can now repair your free &6Mining Hammers&r with some &6Diamonds&r!
moni.quest.5430ED88A8D10502.subtitle: &3Anvils&f can be used to repair almost all &bGregTech tools&f!
moni.quest.5430ED88A8D10502.title: Proper Tool Care
moni.quest.544E87F5E356FE10.description1: &6Nichrome&r is the third coil material available, increasing your EBF's operating temperature to 3600K so it can process more advanced materials.
moni.quest.544E87F5E356FE10.description2: Notice that an &6HV&r &3Assembler&r is required to make them. Each tier of coil requires their tier of Assembler - we won't remind you again.
moni.quest.544E87F5E356FE10.description3: &93600K&r is now also hot enough to grant a single &9100% efficient overclock&r to 1800K and below recipes. This means that one overclock will grant &94x speed&r instead of the normal &92x&r. In effect, you will get an additional 2x speed boost by overclocking once.
moni.quest.544E87F5E356FE10.description4: This means that the gas-boosted recipe for &6Aluminium&r will get cut from about &e7s&r to &e3s&r at HV. Once you upgrade your EBF to EV power, &6Stainless Steel Ingots&r will get cut from about &e37s&r to &e9s&r! It's well worth upgrading the EBFs producing these materials to &6Nichrome&r once you can afford it.
moni.quest.544E87F5E356FE10.description5: Later coils will give similar bonuses. Additionally, the EBF's temperature will increase by &9100K&r for each voltage tier above MV, which could make a difference for future materials.
moni.quest.544E87F5E356FE10.title: &2Nichrome Coil Blocks
moni.quest.545CCC24D9401794.description1: Using plain &3Steam Dynamos&f is pretty inefficient.
moni.quest.545CCC24D9401794.description2: It's strongly recommended to upgrade your Dynamos into &3Steam Boilers&f and &3Steam Turbines&f. The ratio is always &a1:2&r if all machines are equally upgraded.
moni.quest.545CCC24D9401794.description3: This greatly increases the overall efficiency and the amount of power produced, from &a40 RF/t&r per basic steam dynamo to &a320 RF/t&r per set of three augmented machines.
moni.quest.545CCC24D9401794.title: Boilers and Turbines
moni.quest.54B7849F647CE74B.description1: The IPMEPS is capable of altering the laws of physics on a microversal scale, thus allowing the production of previously impossible materials.
moni.quest.54B7849F647CE74B.subtitle: The final Micro Miner!
moni.quest.54B7849F647CE74B.title: &9Tier Twelve Micro Miner
moni.quest.54C3B1B782FDF57F.description1: Glowing! &2But all the GTCEu machines glow already, so...&r
moni.quest.54C3B1B782FDF57F.description2: Wires made from &6Lumium&r transmit IV power losslessly, and it forms part of the basis for &6LuV Machine Hulls&r.
moni.quest.54C3B1B782FDF57F.title: Lumium
moni.quest.55074143B559493F.description1: Having unlocked &6Signalum&r, at long last you can make &aSignalum Integral Components&r!
moni.quest.55074143B559493F.description2: Dynamos operate at &a500% of base power generation and fuel burn rate&r.
moni.quest.55074143B559493F.description3: Machines operate at &a500% of base speed&r.
moni.quest.553F85782265C350.description1: Firstly, you will need a &3Matter Condenser&r. Stick a &664k ME Storage Component&r in, change the mode to 'Singularity', and stuff lots of items (or fluids) in, &9done easily with an infinity cell&r.
moni.quest.553F85782265C350.description2: If you don't have that, you can provide it with the output of regular &6Water&r or &6Cobblestone&r generation methods.
moni.quest.553F85782265C350.description3: After you have made the &eSingularity&r you will need from the &3Matter Condenser&r, you need to set up a &aQuantum Ring Multiblock&r. Build a 3 by 3 vertical ring with your &6Quantum Rings&r, leaving a hole in the middle. Finally, stick your &6Quantum Link Chamber&r in the hole, and connect it to your ME system. If you built it correctly, the textures of the rings should combine, leaving you with a &aMultiblock&r.
moni.quest.553F85782265C350.description4: Next, create a pair of &eQuantum Entangled Singularities&r by throwing Ender Dust and a Singularity into the vicinity of an explosion.
moni.quest.553F85782265C350.description5: &9Now that you have Quantum Entangled Singularities, put one into the&r &6Quantum Link Chamber&r&9 of the &r&aQuantum Ring&r&9, and the other in the&r &6Wireless Terminal&r!
moni.quest.553F85782265C350.description6: You should be good to go! You can now access AE2 anywhere, including in different dimensions!
moni.quest.553F85782265C350.subtitle: Accessing AE2 from anywhere is a bit more expensive and complex, but it's well worth the effort.
moni.quest.553F85782265C350.title: &9AE2 Everywhere!
moni.quest.5543D84CB5E37E01.description1: &aMV Batteries&r function essentially the same as &aLV Batteries&r, only stronger. They also need to be put into &3MV Machines, MV Battery Buffers&r or &3MV Turbo Chargers&r.
moni.quest.5543D84CB5E37E01.title: MV Power Storage
moni.quest.555BEBF7FD6012B7.description1: This is an even larger Extended Crafting Table, capable of handling 9x9 recipes.
moni.quest.555BEBF7FD6012B7.description2: &9PackagedAuto is now available, so just use that to automate these recipes.
moni.quest.555BEBF7FD6012B7.title: &9Ultimate Crafting Table
moni.quest.5567F5E5926664F4.description1: A hefty amount of &6Silicon Dust&r and a pinch of &2Gallium Arsenide &rcooked in an &3EBF&r will net you a &6Silicon Boule&r, the starting point for &6Circuit Wafers&r.
moni.quest.5567F5E5926664F4.description2: Make sure your power system is up to the task. These take &27.5 minutes and 1,080,000 EU&r to process.
moni.quest.5567F5E5926664F4.title: &2Silicon Boules
moni.quest.5601A05D8361551D.description1: &6Monic Processor Mainframes&r are unique in that there are no subsquent circuit themes, and thus no other kinds of Tier Twelve circuits.
moni.quest.5601A05D8361551D.subtitle: The Final Circuit!
moni.quest.5601A05D8361551D.title: &9The First Tier Twelve Circuit
moni.quest.563B797BC7E2F3E3.description2: Alloying some &6Lithium&r into your &6Ferroboron&r results in &6Tough Alloy&r, a common component in &bNuclearCraft&r blocks.
moni.quest.563B797BC7E2F3E3.title: Tough Alloy
