moni.quest.0F048CED8D4C6A43.description2: Those materials can be quite expensive, so you'd best get started early!
moni.quest.7AEA6EF1408B003B.description4: With a &9Tier Three Rocket&r you can make it to &6Mercury&r and &6Venus&r. Before you go, make a &eNetherite Space Suit&r, otherwise the atmosphere will &cburn you to death&r. Mercury has &6Blazing Pyrotheum&r, &6Sodium Persulfate&r, and... &6Mercury&r. Venus has &6Sulfuric Acid&r, and lots of &6Galena&r, and &6Apatite&r.
moni.quest.2E269D0B496C380C.description2: Be warned, however: &cit'll become very difficult from now on&r. Solar panels' costs skyrocket, and yet the most powerful solar only produces slightly more than one amp of &4UHV&r.
moni.quest.68E87B959F6E9216.description1: In the Steam age, &9Steam&r is used for power instead of &eEnergy Units&r.
moni.quest.33DEFDF888BEBE67.description1: Hope you liked Fission, because this Solar panel requires a lot more of it.
moni.quest.604CCBE824D03A74.subtitle: The First of Many
moni.quest.2053CCD1FF775DD5.description6: It is recommended you get a &6Rock Cycle Simulator&r and a &6Large Maceration Tower&r if you choose to take this approach.
moni.quest.0EAD0ACBDD153198.description1: A historical fun fact: &aSolar Panels&r used to be the best option for power generation before Fusion, until they were nerfed and &aFission&r buffed in their place.
moni.quest.63B27CA5BB60B740.description1: &bMV&r opens up chemistry and distillation, unlocking more efficient fuels.
moni.quest.11124D8CC9403E67.description2: This tier of Assembling Machine unlocks &6Monic Circuits&r, as well as handling crafting recipes up to 8388608 EU/t. It can also optionally overclock recipes that consume up to 2097152 EU/t for improved speed at the cost of relatively more power.
moni.quest.6E27637A9C94A0AA.description2: In this age, you can start making Multiblock versions of most of your machines, delve into &aFission&r, and if you're dilligent begin work on &aPlatline&r.
moni.quest.6C028CD89745098E.description2: In this age, you'll gain access to &bApplied Energistics 2&r, make your first &6Silicon Wafers&r and expand your growing collection of machines.
moni.quest.6974AA409CC355E6.description2: This enables you to produce all byproducts from &9Oil&r instead of just one.
moni.quest.2B67C83223AFB5B0.description7: If you want &eEU&r instead of &aFE&r, then &2Solar Panel IV&rs and above can be converted to their GregTech equivalents in an &3Atomic Reconstructor&r.
moni.quest.6B4A50B6F9F835EF.subtitle: &oThis step requires a Fluid Solidifier at voltage &lLV&r&o or higher, or a Rock Breaker at voltage &lHV&r&o or higher.&r
moni.quest.61301FBD825F8280.description3: &eIf only there were a better way...&r
moni.quest.677D081CD7612FB0.description2: First, it's a multiblock. This means it takes up more space, requires a &6Maintenance Hatch&r, and costs a significant amount of Titanium.
moni.quest.68E87B959F6E9216.description3: All three boilers can be upgraded to High Pressure boilers upon gaining access to &6Steel&r, which more than doubles their &9Steam&r production.
moni.quest.2861BA7C235C52A3.description2: MV and higher cables are made in an &3Assembling Machine&r, with liquid &9Rubber&r and &6Wires&r. &2Keep in mind that you can't combine cables into thicker cables, so you have to make the thickness of cables that you will use.
moni.quest.0A34290F579BB4E2.description2: この時代では、拠点を改修して生産能力を高めるために時間をかけるべきです。今後は素材の需要が急増します。自動クラフトが完了するまで何時間も待つのはつまんないでしょう？
moni.quest.0B5613CC79261800.description1: &2With LV power, you can only get Aluminium Dust from electrolyzing Sapphire Dust or Green Sapphire Dust. Once you make an MV Electrolyzer, you can get it from a plethora of other raw resources, such as Clay.&r
moni.quest.11124D8CC9403E67.description1: With your &2Omnium&r-based machine hulls, Assembling Machine built, and &6Dimensional Processor Mainframes&r squared away, you can finally get on the path to making a Ultra Extreme Voltage &3Circuit Assembling Machine&r.
moni.quest.11B25506F679ACBD.title: &cZPM&r Age
moni.quest.2053CCD1FF775DD5.title: Fission for Power
moni.quest.34F0E33D33EB82E2.description1: If you're looking to get into power generation with a &6Gas Turbine Generator&r as early as &7LV&r, your best fuel options are &9Methane Gas&r centrifuged from biomatter, or &9Coal Gas&r from the &3Pyrolyse Oven&r.
moni.quest.7AEA6EF1408B003B.title: &9...and Let Me Play Among the Stars
moni.quest.7D72B3FF808CE13C.description1: The &6Large Gas Turbine&r is a big upgrade to &6Advanced Gas Turbine Generator II&rs, providing &e8x&r as much power for &e8x&r the fuel consumption.
moni.quest.6BA0B1B3AB853F9A.description1: &9Exoskeletons&r increase your movement speed, letting you get around your factory even quicker.
moni.quest.6BA0B1B3AB853F9A.subtitle: Make it quick!
moni.quest.6BA0B1B3AB853F9A.title: &9Exoskeletons
moni.quest.08948A23B3A17923.description2: ノード自体がワイヤレスであることに加え、特定のノードのスループットをアップグレードするのは、&eカードを交換するだけなので簡単です。&r
moni.quest.1CF77095C203454F.description1: &2Upgraded form of the Alloy Blast Smelter.&r
moni.quest.1CF77095C203454F.description2: Accepts any &6Parallel Control Hatch&r, parallelizing up to &e4096x&r with the best hatch!
moni.quest.1CF77095C203454F.description3: The &aMega Alloy Blast Smelter&r is quite big! It's not as wide as the &aRotary Hearth Furnace&r, though.
moni.quest.1CF77095C203454F.title: &2Mega Alloy Blast Smelter
moni.quest.3E6A5A8270F2B722.title: All About Energy!
moni.quest.701E607E9A035299.title: All About Items!
moni.quest.34B614453B9682C7.title: Fluid Pipes
moni.quest.1F0EE20B26083680.description1: &2Electric Pumps are used to transfer fluid to and from machines, into fluid pipes,fluid tanks and drums.
moni.quest.34B614453B9682C7.description2: All Fluid Pipes have a &6limit&r to how much they can transfer. The first Fluid Pipes you get will only be able to transfer a &6small&r amount of fluid per second, but later on Fluid Pipes can move &6hundreds of buckets per second&r!
moni.quest.1F0EE20B26083680.description3: Unlike fluid pipes, Electric Pumps &9don't have a temperature limit&r, only a limit on how much fluid they can move per game tick. Each new tier of pump you get, up to &3UV&r, will transfer &64x more fluid&r per tick than the last tier.
moni.quest.6DBD1492197AC92D.description2: Each Tier 2.5 Mission requires &68 Quantum Flux, several buckets of lava&r, and &6a block&r corresponding to the type of mob drops it returns.
moni.quest.34B614453B9682C7.description4: The last restriction pipes have is whether or not they can transfer &6Acids, Cryogenics, Gases, or Plasma&r. If a fluid pipe is not rated to transfer the latter and you attempt to do so, &cyou will lose the fluid and the pipe&r. Only &6Neutronium&r and &6Duranium&r fluid pipes can transfer all 4.
moni.quest.22A4734F1B1F379D.description2: This chapter will be split into 3 distinct sections: &6Items, Fluids, and Energy&r.
moni.quest.7B7279E41C7CEE99.title: Lond Distance Fluid Pipes
moni.quest.1C0B4DC262FDB94E.description1: &bGregTech&r adds several ways to manage fluids. There are options are including, but not limited to:
moni.quest.1F0EE20B26083680.title: Electric Pumps
moni.quest.34B614453B9682C7.description3: Not only do all pipes have a transfer limit, they also all have a &9maximum temperature limit&r. If you attempt to move a fluid that's higher in temperature than a fluid pipe is rated for, &cyou will lose the fluid and the pipe&r.
moni.quest.1F0EE20B26083680.description2: &6Electric Pumps&r can be attached to &bGregTech&r machines, tanks, drums, hatches and pipes as covers. To access these you can either shift+right click with an empty hand, or right click with a &6screwdriver&r in-world. You can also access them in a machines GUI.
moni.quest.33F610CF136278AE.description3: This Micro Miner can be used to obtain &6Holmium, Quasi-Stable Neutron Stars, and Creative Computation Data&r.
moni.quest.22A4734F1B1F379D.description1: As the name would suggest, this chapter is all about &6Logistics&r. How to route and manage everything your base needs.
moni.quest.6DBD1492197AC92D.title: &9Tier 2.5 Micro miner
moni.quest.6DC635766CD40FFF.description3: &9In Monifactory, RTM Alloy replaces Tungstensteel in coil progression.
moni.quest.1C0B4DC262FDB94E.description5: All of these are &2very useful&r tools, and will be used extensively throughout the game.
moni.quest.3E6A5A8270F2B722.description2: While this pack may have several mods to transfer power, this chapter will only focus on &bGregTech&r power transfer.
moni.quest.6DBD1492197AC92D.description3: This &9Micro Miner&r offers a way to easily get some basic &6Mob Drops&r.
moni.quest.6DBD1492197AC92D.description4: While this Micro Miner can return several different types of mob drops, it is the only miner that can retrieve &6 Blaze Rods, Blizz Cubes, Blitz Motes, and Basalz Shards&r.
moni.quest.1C0B4DC262FDB94E.title: All About Fluids!
moni.quest.22A4734F1B1F379D.title: All About Logistics
moni.quest.1F0EE20B26083680.description4: Single block &bGregTech&r machines can auto-output fluids on one side, so you don't always need a pump to export fluid from a machine.
moni.quest.3E6A5A8270F2B722.description1: If you want to know how to &6generate&r power, check out the &2Power Generation&r tab. This chapter will teach you how to move that power around.
moni.quest.34B614453B9682C7.description1: &2Fluid Pipes are used to move various liquids and gases from one place to another. Fluid Pipes come in several sizes, and different pipes can handle different types of fluids.
moni.quest.5D1DAC23C6B89AC4.title: 元素番号083番:ビスマス
moni.quest.2D9A95AC50BCB988.description2: &9Stabilized Microminers&r still consume inputs like normal Microminers, however after completing a mission they &6no longer need to be repaired&r, and can be reused right away.
